data.name: NEW MATTRESSES 3-story condo @ Riverside
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfection service included in cleaning fee.

Overlooking the picturesque Elk River and both Fernie and Three-Sisters Mountains.

You are in the heart of Fernie country - minutes to Fernie Alpine Report; minutes to town.

Enjoy this well maintained hideaway in the Rockies.

All New Mattresses (Fall 2020)

Top Floor: Enormous Master Bedroom has Queen bed, 2-piece washroom, an over-sized gable dormer sitting area with desk, storage and clothing closets and magnificent 25 foot vaulted ceiling. Great views of Elk River, Three Sisters and Mt. Fernie from your bedroom window.

Main floor: Has hardwood floors, Dining Room, Livingroom (with Shaw Cable/T.V./DVD, iPod stereo and fireplace), Kitchen (fully stocked), and 3-piece washroom. Accessory upgrades throughout.

Lower Level: Has two single beds, full-size laundry facilities, T.V./VCR/dvd and boot/glove drier system.
Exterior: Personal ski/snowboard locker and private patio overlooking river.

Beautiful wood and river rock accents, with superior upgrades throughout. Includes all furnishings, dinner and cookware, linens, towels etc. Full-size stove, fridge, microwave and dishwasher. The entire unit is approximately 1,100 square feet, and is in new condition. Includes cable T.V. and wireless web access.

5 minute drive/shuttle to Fernie Alpine Resort or town, and located on shuttle route (winter). Short stroll into town on the new riverside pathway. You will love the location beside the river.

For allergy reasons, pets and smoking must be strictly excluded. For those with sensitivities, our home has always been pet- and smoking-free

This unit is ideal for a family and, with no other units above or below you, the surroundings are quiet. Children are welcome, and the unit includes a playpen/crib, child table and chairs and electrical sockets have been protected.

Guests have access to the entire unit.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Literally right next to the river. Halfway between Downtown Fernie and the Ski Hill (5 minutes to each)

Ski Hill shuttle pickup just outside the door in the winter. 5 minute bike ride to town!

The upstairs bedroom is open to the main unit separated by a stairway. No door. Also the sleeping area in the lower area is also not separated by a door.

City of Fernie Business License # 001982

reviews.comment: Joel was a great host, very accommodating and quick to respond. No complaints, would definitely stay here again in the future!
Joel's place was extremely clean and in a perfect location. Would recommend to anyone going to Fernie to check his place out.
This is a great location between town and the ski hill.
Clean, Joel was easy to get in touch with and understanding when we added a guest to our itinerary. The pullout couch could use a new mattress as you can feel every spring in the current one
Very comfortable, quiet  and cozy great for families.
Had a great stay in a rest location
Perfect place for our family of four. We appreciated the fully stocked kitchen, the extra sitting area and the gas fireplace.
Very clean

Overall a nice place, but it is in an entirely residential complex.  One neighbor had garbage piled up and another was a little noisy later on.  No showerin the upstairs ensuite so a little inconvenient to have to shower on the main floor when there is other people in the lounge area. Overall though a nice convenient location and we would use again.
Second time weâ€™ve stayed here. Perfect place for our quick family vacation. Very clean. Easy check in. Updated wifi.
Great location
Great spot. Worked well with our two young kids. Hope to return soon.
Love this location, right by the river! The condo is efficient  and well appointed. It has spacious sleeping spaces. A quick drive to all of the fun adventures and a great price! I highly recommend!
Joel's place is well laid out with plenty of room for privacy if needed. The kitchen is stocked with spices, tea etc which was much appreciated. Location is very close to town.
It was perfect for our family.  The teenagers had their own space downstairs. Close to the hill and town. Was as described. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location to the ski hill.
Nice cozy and comfy condo. Close to the ski hill.
We stayed here for a 3 day ski getaway in Fernie. Joel's place met all our needs and he was super responsive by messaging for any questions we had.
Great stay, great views
overall a good place to stay at for a group of 3!
Joelâ€™s place was great. Accurate description of what you get. Very clean, lots of kitchen ware, plenty of beds, close to down town and the hill. Highly suggest if youâ€™re in town for some skiing.

Joelâ€™s place is perfect for a ski vacation and to use as base camp in the summer. One bedroom downstairs has twin beds and the other bedroom is upstairs with a queen bed and full pullout bed in the couch. Bath and shower are on the main floor and there is an additional toilet and sink upstairs in the master bedroom. Three levels are stacked on top of each other, but it works well. We had a great time!  Floors on the main level are laminate, so tracking in snow is not a huge concern. 
This place worked great for us!

Our family of 4 had an absolutely amazing long term stay in Joel's place. It was super clean, very well stocked, with lots of space, easy parking, and it's less than 5min drive to the ski hill on the left, and to town on the right. Thanks Joel!
Was a nice place to stay in Fernie, very roomy. The fireplace makes it nice and cozy. Bed very comfy and shower really nice.
Nice place.

data.name: Beautiful suite on the river at base of trails!
data.address_address: 441 Riverside Way, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
One bedroom suite with 360 degree views of the stunning Elk River and Fernie's world renowned Ski hill. Suite has it's own entrance, with large deck, full bath, living room and all the amenities of home, less than 5 minutes from everything. Ski hill shuttle picks up at front door. There is a mini fridge and a microwave. While the couch does flip out and allow for sleeping, it is not the most comfortable!

This is a lock off suite from a main adjoining unit. It has a private access, but no kitchen.

Full access to this main lock off suite with living room, bathroom, hallway and bedroom.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Located in the "Riverside" area of Fernie at the base of Mt. Fernie provincial park and the Fernie Nordic Centre. It is conveniently located half way between the ski hill and town.

Parking is available in the main parking lot and on the street. The ski shuttle picks up just down the street in the winter. Access town via the trail network in the summer.

This unit is accessed via a flight of outdoor stairs.
City of Fernie Business License # 001922

reviews.comment:
Good location, view is really good. Derek was quick in response. 
Suggestions: It would be really good if there was drinking water in suite.
It is a great little place with a beautiful view.  Nice and clean and well priced.

Derekâ€™s place in Fernie is great! It was sparkling clean and as well as a little sitting room with bar fridge and tv, it had a cupboard with a coffee maker & some dishes & cutlery. We enjoyed morning coffee on the patio while admiring the gorgeous view of the mountains!
It was a great stay and we would definitely book this place again!
A wonderful location for a visit to Fernie. Easy/contactless check in.
Cozy little apartment right next to the river, and down the street from a great Indian restaurant.

Great location. Just a quick drive to downtown Fernie. The river was super close and was a great place to cool off on the hot days! Derek was super quick to respond to messages during our stay and  supplied us with what we needed in a timely manner. Couch/futon was quite uncomfortable for the little bit of tv we did watch during our stay. Would definitely stay here next time in Fernie ðŸ˜Š
Fantastic location for my biking visit to Fernie. Unit was comfortable, clean and spacious. Would highly recommend and would stay here again next time I am in town.
Amazing place, easy walk or drive from town. Smooth check in due to door code, easy communication. Clean and great size !
I liked how easy this place was to find and get into! Having river access was great too. Super quick drive to get in to the downtown area was another great convenience!
Super quick to reply. Everything was clean. Close to the ski hill. Good indian restaurant walking distance.

Very homey! Stayed here for almost 2 weeks and the space was very nice. The river is literally steps outside your doorstep and close to many local walks and amazing views. 
Comfortable bed, in a nice quiet complex. Parking is great, you donâ€™t have to worry about not having a spot and the street is very trailer friendly.
Great place to stay, super close to downtown but still has a nice view of the river and the mountains, very quiet area.
Derek's place is exactly as advertised, great spot to stay along the river.
Enjoyed my stay at Derekâ€™s place. Well maintained in a great location

Great spot close to the hill and town for a weekend or week long getaway.
The only downfall is the lack of kitchen or laundry, which is fine for short term stays where youâ€™re happy to mostly eat out.

We enjoyed our week at Derek's suite. Derek is a very friendly and responsive host.

The proximity to the ski hill and views of the mountains are fantastic!  

The suite is clean and was very quiet. It was small, but if you're planning to be out all day that isn't an issue. 

There was hardly any cutlery - we brought our own. We also had to buy our own dish soap and a sponge.
Totally recommended! Nice play to stay! There was everything we needed, super close to ski hills, very quick responses from host, east check in. Whatâ€™s else needed? :) will definitely return
Perfect reasonably priced stay close to the ski hill!

Great space for two people! A nice sitting area with a couch, TV, microwave and bar fridge. Comfy bed and full size bathroom! Not the closest to town centre but Derek is a great host and the value is great for the condo! Did not hear any noise from other tenants in the building! Would stay again for sure :)
Clean accommodations and a courteous host!
Dereks place is good for a weekend getaway. Great location.
Close to town

data.name: NEW MATTRESSES On the river 3 story townhouse
data.address_address: 516 Riverside way, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
On the elk river between the ski hill and downtown Fernie (5 min), this 3 story townhouse is on the banks of the Elk River, has a nice patio out front (summer only), fast internet and is right at the base of Mount Fernie Provincial Park and the Elk Valley Nordic Centre.

This unit is good for anyone with pet or smoke allergies as the owners are very sensitive and every effort has been made to keep it an allergen free home.

Just across the street is an amazing Indian Restaurant!

This three level townhouse on the banks of the Elk River has an enormous master suite upstairs with a dormer and vaulted ceilings. It also has a half bath and its own TV. On the main floor is an open concept kitchen/living/dining area with new leather couches and chairs.

Downstairs are two singles that form a king.

There is also a full in suite laundry.

Guests have access to the entire unit and the patio out front. (summer only) There is also a full in suite laundry.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The Riverside Mountain Village area is located conveniently between the ski hill and downtown Fernie. 5 minute drive to each. This condo is situated right on the banks of the Elk River with a large grassy area with benches and picnic tables to enjoy as well as walking paths along the river.

In the winter there is a ski hill shuttle service in front of the building. In the summer it is a short 10 min bike ride along a path into town and to all of the bike and hike trailheads.

This is strictly a no smoking and no pets house. The owners have severe allergies. Please respect this.

City of Fernie Business License # 001971

reviews.comment: Great location :)
Great pad. Nice and quiet.
Good value place. New beds are comfy.
Great little place! Super close to the Mountain resort and a short walk into town!

We stayed at Sheila's place for 6 nights.  We were in Fernie to ride our mountain bikes.  Her place is a perfect location,  you can easily ride to all the trail heads especially the ones in Provincial Park.  The place was clean, very quiet, spacious to stretch and relax.   
Kitchen was well stocked as well if you are planning on cooking your own meals.  Overall, we had a very comfortable stay.  Thank you!
We were really happy with Sheila's condo. It had plenty of room for our family of 3 and was very convenient for skiing at Fernie. Would definitely rent it again!

Clean, easy check in and great communication. 

Highly recommended
Good value, quick response to issues
Beautiful spot at the base of the mountain. Had everything we needed. We will be back!
Had a great time, great place!
Great location, very well equipped kitchen, bathrooms and bedrooms and great service. Canâ€™t think of anything missing or that could be better.
Great spot in a great community. Didnâ€™t stay long with a late check in and an early check out, but we will be back!
Bel emplacement, bon rapport qualitÃ©-prix, propre avec de bons matelas
Nice place, comfortable home.
A fantastic option over staying in a hotel.  Loved the location right on the river.
Very nice place, close to the river. Private, quiet and very clean. We loved our stay and will return
Nice place, well used. Kitchen well equipped. Spacious bedrooms and comfy beds. Great value. Cooled of nicely in the evenings even with 30+ temps. Will stay again!
Thanks!
Great location in between town and Fernie mountain resort. Very clean and roomy, would stay again.
Location on the river is beautiful as is the view out the lounge room windows.  Having laundry facilities and detergent provided was a nice bonus and we really enjoyed the unit for our stay.
Great place, comfortable and quiet and clean.   Donâ€™t miss this one
Great place! We have used them twice and always had great experiences. Love the location and the views are amazing!

I headed up to Fernie for the July long weekend with my husband and another couple to attend a wedding. Sheila's place was perfect for what we needed at a very very affordable price for the long weekend. It was close to everything and was very clean. Sheila is a wonderful host with amazing communication!! I would definitely recommend her place and look forward to staying again on our next trip!
Prettig appartement, goed bereikbaar in een mooi skigebied en voor mij persoonlijk de ligging in Fernie vlak bij de Elk rivier als vliegvisser zeer aan te bevelen!
A well equipped and comfortable house which fully met our needs, on our road trip through the area.
Convenient location near the ski hill.  Beautiful views of the river from the loft bedroom.  Cozy, and warm!

This was in a great spot near the river. There was snow everywhere when we were there in late March and it's in a quiet area. 

You need a car but it's close to snow and town. There is a lot of room with 3 storeys to spread out and having a laundry is a special bonus. 

These were the softest towels we have had anywhere. They smelt good to. 

There was a dishwasher if needed, 2 tvs and 1 1/2 bathrooms. Good heating made for a pleasurable stay.

Family of four enjoyed our stay at Sheila's place. It was clean and comfortable - sheets were crisps and towels were soft. The kitchen was stocked well with the common supplies - salt and pepper. Do need to bring your own cooking oil - we forgot. Place is close to the ski hill and downtown. Sheila was very responsive and the communication to access the place was accurate. Thanks for having us!

Great location near the river and base of the ski hill, easy check-in/out, straight-forward parking. Basic amenities in the place but all you really need is there. Enjoyed the fireplace which gave off a lot of heat and helped dry mittens/hats/etc. Comfortable beds. Overall good value.

Great location and lovely unit! Some friends and I were in Fernie for a ski trip and found Sheilaâ€™s place. You are minutes from both the hill and town, as well as anything else you need off the highway. The beds were super comfy and there were towels a plenty in the washrooms (and so fluffy!). The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a few meals. Sheila and her team made check in and out super easy, and I canâ€™t recommend the spot enough. Perfect way to experience Fernie!

The perfect location for skiing, only minutes from the hill and from Fernie. The place is just as described. A great functional kitchen with evening you need for a great family meal. Lovely fireplace that gives a great ambiance. Amazing hosts that worked with us and answered ALL the questions we sent even while dealing with the app issues.
Good clean place to stay.  Not super fancy.
Great place by the river just outside of Fernie. Comfortable loft upstairs and room for kids downstairs. Easy access to everything great about Fernie.
Enjoyed our stay!
Very nice condo, clean, warm, and very friendly people in and around the condo complex. We definitely would stay there again. Thank you to our hosts.

Great value for the size. After several nights in cramped hotels this was a welcomed reprieve for us. With lots of space for a family of four and all the amenities of home we enjoyed our time here. Shelia is a lovely welcoming host with great communication. We would recommend a stay here to others.

The townhouse was the perfect space for our familyâ€™s weekend getaway.  The bedrooms were spacious, and the kitchen had everything we needed. The complex is just next to the river, so we often sat outside enjoying the beautiful mountain and river views. Awesome stay for families!
Sheilaâ€™s place has everything you need for a great trip to fernie! A short bike from downtown and lots of trails. Great value- Absolutely recommend.
Nice condo unit. Was perfect.

Great location right next to the river, and only a 5 min drive from downtown Fernie. Place was very clean and even though there was no AC, the lower room was nice and cool for sleeping. I appreciated having on-site laundry and would definitely stay here again next time.

Great, convenient location - right across from the provincial park! Parking right outside the suite - at first, I was worried that there was no air conditioning but the north facing unit cools down nicely in the evening so AC really isn't necessary. Kitchen had all we needed to make a few meals and the beds were comfortable. Nice set up and very clean - would stay here again!

This place would be fine if you are a group of people wanting a ski getaway and dont care about where you are staying, but if you are a couple/small family looking for a comfortable, homely break then this is not the place for you. It is so worn out and tired with scuffs and chips over the walls in the living area, the place was not clean with hairballs on the floor, the sofa had leather peeling off as you sit on it, there were random holes in the wall stuffed with tissue paper...need i go on! Oh yeah and the so called bbq on the patio was not usuable as the burners were rotten and had collapsed. It clearly hadnt been used in a long time as it was dirty and had leaves etc in it. It was not a nice outdoor space! Its a shame as we had just come from a gorgeous place we found on airbnb having had 5 nights there and which we gave a raving review, and then to come to this was a total let down. We checked out after 1 night and found something better.
Great location! Convenient store right across the road. Beautiful river right there. Comfy beds!
Very good place to stay enjoyed it.
Great place. Right on the river. We had coffee each morning watching the river flow by. Wonderful for a family.
Great spot! Definitely take a (very) quick stroll down and hop in the river
Very nice and comfortable place steps from the river, and easy distance to the town. Definitely will need to come back here again!
The condo was a great home base for our hiking adventures.
Great cozy place as advertised. Value was very good. Perfect spot for a fly fishing trip. Right on the Elk River. Good mix of young people and families in the immediate area.
Everything was as expected. Super cozy and everything we needed for our stay! Would return anytime

My family and I spent a weekend at Sheila's condo and found the space to be fine for our needs. We appreciated that it was clean and comfortable (the beds and pillows were great) but it is very basic, nothing fancy and looking a little worn (the leather sofa is very scuffed up). The bedrooms are huge while the living room and kitchen are very small. We would look for something roomier with more amenities and comforts if we were contemplating a longer stay. Make note... no dish cloth and tea towel provided, and we could not find a scouring pad for pots, a tea pot (always a bonus for us tea drinkers) or vegetable peeler. Many other kitchen tools are available but not those listed here. We enjoyed the location and Sheila was very pleasant to deal with.
The apartment was clean, quiet and well stocked. A very short drive to the ski hill. Would stay again!
Good size place for 2-3 people. Alright location, door is a bit hidden. Sofas in rough shape but other than that well stocked on kitchen supplies, comfy beds, and good views over the river
Very Close to Ski Hill!
Great place, very clean and super slick check-in/out. Sheila is very nice. Easy to get to ski hill
Shelia is very helpful, very happy with my stay.
Very clean place, close to the hill
Shelias place way okay. The place smelled like someone had been smoking in it. The beds were very comfy!
Accurately described in the description would stay here again.
A bit hard to locate, but the place was affordable and the location was in a good spot. Beds and bedding were very comfortable.
Good pad in Fernie.
This place was perfect for a weekend in the mountains.
Good place but no accommodations for any changes in plans.

amazing location, not even a minute from the river, you can sit outside and eat watch the mountains and river. very close to downtown. the town has a superstore and all the necessary stores.
the mezzanine was beautiful and had a great view.
Nice place to stay. Would recommend it

We had a great stay, it was exactly as listed, and fully stocked to meet our needs. Very clean, easy check in, and plenty of parking.

Location is beautiful but a bit of a distance from town if youâ€™re wishing to walk in. Wasnâ€™t a problem for us though, less than a 5 minute drive!

data.name: Riverside 4 Bedroom, 3 Storey Townhouse
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Steps away from the Elk River, this beautiful three storey townhouse is located 5 minutes between both the ski hill and historical downtown. It is right at the base of Mount Fernie Provincial Park and the Elk Valley Nordic Centre.

This the perfect spot for mountain adventurers who ski, bike, hike and/or fly fish.

The main floor consists of an open concept kitchen/living/dining area, two bedrooms, and two full baths. The second floor has a bedroom with a double, full bath, and separate living space with a tv, sofa, and balcony. The third floor loft contains two single beds, a queen bed and a playpen (located in the closet) with a tv.

There is also full suite laundry in the basement.

Guests have access to the entire unit, two balconies, and the main floor deck with patio set

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Both Fernie Alpine Resort and historical downtown are a quick 5 minute drive away. A shuttle to the ski resort is available; pick-up from the Stanford Hotel just down the road.

https://tourismfernie.com/maps-travel/transportation/local-ski-shuttle

Skis, boards, bikes and other large sporting equipment may not be stored indoors.
City of Fernie License # - 001990

data.name: Riverside 3 Bedroom, 2 Storey Townhouse
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Steps away from the Elk River, this beautiful two storey townhouse is located 5 minutes between both the ski hill and historical downtown. It is right at the base of Mount Fernie Provincial Park and the Elk Valley Nordic Centre.

This the perfect spot for mountain adventurers who ski, bike, hike and/or fly fish.

The main floor consists of an open concept kitchen/living/dining area, two bedrooms, and two full baths. The second floor loft contains two single beds, a queen bed and a playpen (located in the closet) with a tv. There is also full suite laundry in the basement.

reviews.comment: This was an awesome place to stay. Lots of space and had everything we needed.
Perfect little getaway spot just on the outside of town.  Easy access to everything!!
Great, clean condo! Just a short little bike ride to downtown. Would recommend.
Nice clean place good location! Would stay here again!
it was perfect thank you for everything. This is a must on your trip.
A well kept home with a great host.  Would stay here again.
Very nice place. We enjoyed our stay!
Great host.
This place is great! Great price. Would be excellent for skiing.

Wonderful house! Very clean. Had everything we needed. Loved it there! Only draw back at the moment was that they are doing construction close by, so sadly wasnâ€™t as peaceful as I was hopping! But once they are done with that it will be so wonderful again.

We had a great stay at Jenniferâ€™s condo. It was cozy, clean , and well appointed. Communication with Jennifer was easy and prompt. My three boys loved staying all together in the upstairs loft room which was very spacious with plenty of beds. Would recommend!
Jenniferâ€™s place was great! Nice and clean and Jennifer was quick and easy to communicate with.

Highly recommend, clean, comfy and quite.. easy check in and check out.. 
all amenities we needed

Very nice space ! Would definitely stay again ! 
Excellent host !
Absolutely amazing

Jenniferâ€™s place is super clean and spacious, in a good location for skiing and other activities in Fernie. The beds are super comfortable and the linens are high quality. The coffee maker is old-style but fortunately thereâ€™s fresh ground coffee available 24x7 at the convenience store nearby. The upstairs (loft) beds are great but itâ€™s a huge walk up the stairs and thereâ€™s no bathroom up there which makes it a challenge for late night bathroom visits. Also, bring soap and shampoo since the soap there isnâ€™t good and thereâ€™s no hair products. Jennifer was super responsive and the check-in super easy! I recommend Jenniferâ€™s place and would stay again!
Amazing place! Super close to the ski resort and right by a very nice gas station! Please was very clean and had all the amenities youâ€™ll need for home cooked meals.
Great condo and location for a weekend getaway ski trip
sweet little place for anyone who wants a place to crash after big days out in the snow!
Clean and modern house.

Really beautiful place close by the hill but still close to town. Hockey rink isnâ€™t too far away either which is a nice bonus. Place was clean and Jennifer was great about getting back to us very promptly. Overall great bang for your buck staying here.
Very clean, comfortable place, 10-minute drive to the skiing hill. The condo has a well-equipped kitchen if it is important for you to be able to prepare your own meals.
A very clean condo, well stocked with dishes and towels. Easy to find, easy to check I. And out. Owner responded quickly to any questions.
Great place to stay. Jennifer was very helpful and adding a couple extra days was no problem. Good house, would be perfect location for a ski holiday. Would stay again and recommend to others
everything is just as in the pictures, pleasant ambience and even more comfortable bedðŸ˜Š I definitely recommend this home for a visit
Thumbs up!

reviews.comment:
Jennifer and the agency were real quick to respond to any messages. 
Very close to the ski hill. 
Very clean.
Jenniferâ€™s place was great to stay in. It was easy to access, clean and comfortable.
Great value and nice and clean!
Great all around place to stay 4 fully grown people, would highly recommend... the place is 100% worth the value ($).
Nice and clean but a little on the high price compared to hotel room with more services but do recommend for a short stay
Clean, spacious room with two comfortable beds. Everything was clean and tidy.
Amazing place to stay!
Modern, no frills suite.
Perfect location to head to the ski hill in the morning. Lovely little place, and a communicative host.
A great place to come crash after a day on the hill!! Comfy and clean.
Great location with great parking! Host was fast to respond and super friendly!
Neat and clean,  quiet, stylish place to stay.
Logement conforme aux photos et Ã  la description. TrÃ¨s bon emplacement, proche de la ville de Fernie.

Really nice place. Perfectly located halfway between DT Fernie and the Alpine Resort. Nice quiet place away from traffic specially if you have young kids. The room itself was spacious and clean. Would highly recommend to anyone.

Me and my wife spent part of our vacation here and we loved it. Amazing view of the mountains in the morning, nice patio for breakfast and meals, and great location - especially if you want some hikes at Island Lake Lodge which we definetly recommend.
Great spot for a quick stay clean, and bright.

We were more or less just sleeping at Jennifer's place.   It was clean, convenient, and quiet while we were there. Communication with Jennifer was quick and easy. We had no problems or concerns.  It is set up a lot like a hotel room with 2 queen beds and a small bathroom, exactly as shown in the pictures.  It was all we needed.  The beds weren't the most comfortable but they were good enough (maybe just a matter of preference-they were not run down or old) and all the linens were of good quality.  There was some closet space and a small fridge and microwave that came in handy.
Comfortable and clean. No complaints.
The space was clean, easy to check-in and very spacious. Perfect for my needs. Thanks again!

We stayed with kids for a few days and our stay was great. Room was everything that we needed and super clean! Location is great and close to everything else. We definitely will be back.
Thank you

A good place to stay for a couple or small group. If youâ€™re out all the time like we were and just need a place to sleep, this is it! There may be some noise issues if the people that are next door are loud. Other than that, the neighbourhood is quiet. Jennifer was quick to answer any concerns that we had.
Great

This is a great place for nearby owners who want to 'host' more visitors than their homes
comfortably accommodate.

Great location, 5 minute drive to the ski hill! Our host was great at communication with quick response time. The condo is attached to an adjacent condo, and those people werenâ€™t the most quiet. But despite that we had a great time, thanks for hosting us :)
Best air bnb Iâ€™ve ever stayed at for the price I paid. Well done!
very cozy and clean. easy check in and out and communication was quick and easy. over all a wonderful stay
This was such a great place to stay!! So warm and inviting, the perfect place to relax after a day on the ski hill!!
Decent value and location - bedroom door is adjacent to a shared space and if that space is occupied expect to hear those people/activities.
Great location and close to the ski hill, soft towels, clean and comfortable stay. Would come here again!

This suite is basic but very clean, and the location near the main road in Fernie is great. We unfortunately had a hard time getting a hold of Jennifer during our stay to ask questions, but that was our only issue with this room.
Comfortable beds. Good location, close to everything. No coffee maker in the room. Ants in the room, but ant traps were out to try to control the issue. Friendly neighbours.
Good place to stay

We stayed at this place second time and it feels like home. Soap same like I have at home, got Netflix, awesome too. Pillows and beds are comfortable and everything are super clean! We enjoyed our stay again and definitely will be back
It is a nice clean place to stay with kids. Really calm and safe.

The place was very clean and tidy. We only stayed there for one night.

Itâ€™s a nice place to stay for short time. Since it was during hot summer days, the place was warm. Luckily there was a ceiling fan, but we left the windows open for more air circulation, and we heard lots of noises from the trains passing by. If you keep the windows closed you wonâ€™t hear them.
A simple yet very comfortable space which was a fairly easy walk into town. We were very grateful to our hosts for contacting us after our stay about a charger we left behind... thanks Jennifer!
Jenniferâ€™s place is a great place to stay.... very centrally located and a great price.
Great and affordable
Check in was super easy and convenient. Quick and clear responses and details. Place was clean and exactly as advertised. Only a few minutes to the ski hill which was a huge bonus as well!
Amazing location that is close to the ski hills and shops. The host was quick to communicate whenever we had a question and was very very find. Very clean place! Highly recommend staying here.

Jennifer's place is a spacious lockout with two queen beds and large bay window. Location is fantastic and parking is ample. We had another unit rented nearby and this place worked perfectly as a bolt-on for grandparents who came to help out with the kids. The only downside of this complex is that it can be a bit noisy if neighbors are unaware or inconsiderate. But the reasonable price and incredible location more than offset. Would definitely stay again.
Very nice place, I recommend it for sure !!!

Amazing location between the hill and downtown! $11 taxi ride to downtown/6 min drive. A little chilly at times due to gusts under the door, but access to your own thermostat helped! Really enjoyed our stay, Jennifer was an absolute delightful from start to finish. Very understanding and went out of her way to accommodate when I (very stupidly) booked the wrong dates. Thanks again!
Great spot!
Good place to hang out while skiing. Well run operation.
Nice view of the mountain out the front window!  Great value for the money at Jennifer's place!
Jenniferâ€™s place was very clean and a nice little place to stay at! It is the perfect location from the ski hill and to downtown.

My 1 week stay at Jenniferâ€™s was perfect! Everything was exactly like in photos. The bed and pillows were so comfortable and the view  of the mountains was amazing! Fernie is one of the best mountain towns I have ever been to!
Great value, nice clean rooms and very communicative host.
This is an excellent place to stay for a weekend getaway! Its exactly as advertised, in a great location, and Jennifer is very easy to communicate with.

reviews.comment: As other reviews have said, it suited very well for a couple but we imagine it may be a bit pokey with more people. We found it to be clean and fresh but, again, be sure to bring your own cutlery and plates as these are not supplied (we did find some plastic plates left in the drawer, but they were small and we try not to use disposables!). Nice view from the window, good proximity to nature. It is close to other units, so there was some noise from upstairs but only during the day; nights were quiet (except for the train, but you'd hear it anywhere in the valley!) Overall, a nice little place to stay during a visit to Fernie :)
Space was adequate for our needs. Easy check in.
Jennifer's place was great! I would recommend it and go back anytime.
No
Great clean unit in Fernie, was perfect for our stay and great communication. Thank you.
Perfect little place to stay for 2! Great and fair price. Overall a great stay that met our needs
A great jumping off place for doing all the great activities Fernie has to offer. Was there with me and my two young kids - plenty of room and good value.
As my first Airbnb experience,  I must say I was very pleased.  Cozy and comfortable with great views.  Enjoy!!
Beautiful location and a quaint little stay! Very clean and well-presented. Walls are a bit thin, so if you're travelling with children or are next to children, keep that in mind.

Overall a decent place to stay but for the money, we expected a better fold out sofa. I wouldn't even put this one in my basement for people I didn't like. The bed was ok so if you are just 2 people, it's ok. Also no cutlery of any kind so bring your own.

We stayed for 2 nights with our 2 children (7 & 10) during summer. 
The couch is ok for children to sleep on, maybe not as comfy for adults. The bedroom is nice, and the bed very comfortable.
The location is nice, great view. The patio is nice to eat, you have the sun in the late morning and in the evening too.
There are fans in the home in case it's hot.
You can enjoy walking along the river too. 
Great reactivity of the facility team when needed.

I would like to start with positives. If it's only 2 people planning to stay at this place you won't be disappointed. Good location with beautiful views, easy check in and check out through the door code.
Nice place for weekend getawayin mountains. 
Unfortunately we were 3 adults staying there. Description says there is couch with hide in bed. First it's pretty small and I can't imagine 2 people sleeping on it.  Secondly the mattress is so thin you can feel every single spring and makes it impossible to sleep on it. I ended upsleeping on the floor as more comfortable and less hurtful option.
Perfect location, great patio with great view. Close to train tracks so the occasional sound of trains but very pleasant stay.
Small, clean, hard to find. No small coffee maker.

The suite was exactly how it is described, there were no surprises which was great. The suite was very clean, the check in/ check out were very easy, and the suite had a very simple decor. There is no kitchen but we were able to use the patio table on the deck and there is a mini fridge. Itâ€™s perfect for anyone looking for a quick night stay or for a busy weekend. We would stay again.
Exactly as advertised
Everything when off quite smoothly

This was a perfectly fine place. Exactly what was explained in the ad. 

My issue is with Airbnb. The whole point (initially) with Airbnb was that it would be less expensive than a hotel. So, they have the owner price their space at $55/night and then there's a service fee and a cleaning fee and an admin fee, and a fee for climbing the stairs and a fee for using the lights and ...and...(a bit of hyperbole but you get my drift). 

By the time all was said and done the ACTUAL cost was $86/night for a 5-night stay (for a nice place with a small fridge and mic). 

For $80/night (taxes in and NO hidden fees) we could have stayed in a hotel with a fully stocked kitchenette. A hotel just simply tells you what the charge is PERIOD. 

It's become way too much work - getting an apples to apples comparison. We thought we had done our homework - really disappointed in the final amount.

This is not an inditement on the place  - just on how airbnb gets owners to price is very misleading.
Jenniferâ€™s place was great, close to the mountain, close to town. Has great views and was very clean. Will stay again. Thank you

A portion of a townhouse condo conveniently located between the town of Fernie and the ski resort.   The apartment is clean and comfortable.  It's situated at the end of a townhouse block, so on one side there is an entrance deck looking out toward an amazing mountain view.  The unit is on the second floor - neighbors above and below.  During our stay it was quiet.   It's a great value - particularly during a peak winter ski week.  The unit consists of a living room, bedroom and bathroom, although there is a hallway connecting all the rooms that is very handy for keeping bags and equipment - plus there is a lot of closet space.    There's a fridge and a microwave (bring your own plates and utensils).    My only complaint is that the foldout couch is extremely uncomfortable!
Great stay and fantastic value.
Recomend this location to family and friends.

Clean and plenty of space for just me.
The neighbors were to load and up late as I need to get up early and go to work. I'm always conscious of others.
Cleanliness.

Really good location and great value! 
Check in was incredibly easy and Jennifer was quick to respond to messages. 
Highly recommend!
Clean place and I would recommend to anyone!

I really enjoyed this place, very nicely laid out, you have a door separating the entertainment room from the bathroom and bedroom.  The condo was spotless and there was some really nice local soaps in the bathroom.  My favourite part of the day was having coffee on the deck in the morning while looking at the mountains and planning our day hike.  The view from the deck is amazing with the cool crisp mountain air.  Check in was really easy and Jennifer is really quick to respond and offered her assistance if we needed anything.  We would definitely book here again.
small but adequate for a short stay. Basic fridge/microwave makes for limited food options but as a solo or short term couple stay, it works.
Nice pad. Excellent mountain views from the deck.

As stated there are a lot of stairs!  Do not book if youâ€™re not prepared for them. Lol
No coffee maker in the room and no coffee shop within walking distance other than the Circle K gas station coffee. 
It had snowed the day of my arrival and the stairs had been cleared and heavily salted so they were in great shape. 
The deck at the top had not been shovelled, sanded, or salted and had been walked on by the neighbours creating an icy, snowy, slick top of the stairs and walk to the entrance.  The deck has a coating and is not a wooden surface so it was quite slippery where it had been packed down and become icy. No shovel or salt/sand was provided to rectify the issue on my own & no one cleared it in the 2 dayâ€™s I was there.
It's a nice clean place
Lovely place in a beautiful area of fernie ! Such a relaxing area and happy to go back (:

If you have a clear day, you will be surrounded by gorgeous mountain views through the windows as well as the shared deck! Perfect location between town and the ski hill making it easy to spend time in either location without feeling 'stuck' on the hill or driving for too long to get to the ski hill. There are some stairs to get up to the unit outside, but they were always clear of snow and well lit after dark. Great space for a shorter stay and the fridge made it easy to bring a few groceries to make lunches! Jennifer was super communicative and easy to get in touch with before our stay and a excellent host.
Really great!

Great location and wonderful views from the deck.  The unit does not have a full kitchen but there is a microwave and refrigerator.  Unfortunately no dishes and cutlery. There is also much more room than seen in the pictures.

Although it had a mini fridge and microwave, a coffee pot or kettle would have really added to the place for those early mornings to get to the hill. Great location, clean. Very convenient  for skiing and easy in and out the front door, no long walks with luggage.

Derek is a great host, the communications and check-in were super easy! The place is convenient if youâ€™re looking for something close to the ski hill. The wall are as thin as paper though, we could hear the guy next doorâ€™s spoon when he was eating his cereals in the morning. I would still go back, We had a great time!

Not recommended if you drive an RV or camper van. We felt quite unwelcome by the neighbours. This space is in a condo building with rules around parking anything resembling a camper van. We have a high roof cargo van that isn't even used as a camper van and management put a notice on our windshield.

One neighbour came up and angrily told us we were not permitted there and cut me off every time I tried to explain that we were paying guests. A few other neighbours glared at us simply because we drive a van.

The lock on the door died and we were locked out of the unit halfway through our stay. We asked for a refund because we couldn't get in, by no fault of our own. We were still charged for that night.

Otherwise, the unit was very clean, the scenery is gorgeous, and the unit is sufficient if all you need is a place to sleep/shower without cooking.
Had a great stay, convenient check-in & checkout, great location. I would definitely stay here again next time Iâ€™m back in Fernie.
Great place had an awesome stay

data.name: Private Entrance Studio Suite: AC, Cable, Mtn View
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Convenient, updated, private suite & entrance with mountain views & river access 4 minutes to downtown Fernie or ski hill. Bike or walk out the front door to Fernie's world-class trails, rivers, & fishing. The suite is quiet & spacious w/ deck out front & private entrance. Enjoy the comfortable queen bed, hardwood floors, full bathroom & shower. Additional amenities include A/C, Wifi, TV w/ cable, desk, microwave, fridge & ski locker. Great Indian restaurant next door.

Mountain views, privacy, comfort, and convenient location all make this place an ideal choice for your Fernie visit.

Full private use of bed and bathroom suite. Small shared deck out front. This is a top-level unit, so guests must ascend a flight of stairs (~20 steps) to access-great exercise! The unit also has shared walls with neighbours, who are quiet and respectful. If you have any questions or concerns contact us 24/7 on AirBnB. Enjoy your stay!

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

With Fernie's world class skiing, biking, fishing, and trail system right out the door you needn't travel far to enjoy Fernie. Dining options include a quick 4 minute drive or 8 minute bike to historic downtown Fernie, or enjoy phenomenal Indian cuisine right next door.

During the ski season, a ski shuttle can pick you up just steps away (https://tourismfernie.com/maps-travel/transportation/local-ski-shuttle). Otherwise the river and trails are right out the door.

Pros
* Super spacious studio!

Cons

* The listing clearly states AC, and whilst this is technically â€œcorrectâ€ we had no access to the control panel. Super misleading, and frustrating. If I had known prior to booking, I possible wouldnâ€™t have booked.

reviews.comment: Cosy clean and comfortable!! Perfect for a family!!
Very quick to respond. Great place for a family getaway. Very clean.

Guyâ€™s place was very close to Fernie Alpine Resort and a short drive to downtown Fernie, it was a great place to use as a base. 

The place was spotlessly clean and check-in was very convenient. Good check-in and check-out times.

Highly recommended place to stay.

We celebrated Thanksgiving weekend at Guy's place and had a wonderful stay. There were 4 adults and there was definitely enough beds for everyone. The beds were comfy and the bath towels were so soft! 

The kitchen space was a bit small, which we expected based on the photos, but it wasn't a problem for us. The kitchen was stocked with all the pots and pans that we needed including salt, pepper, olive oil, and sugar. 

Guy was very responsive and communication was great. Also, the self check-in/out process was so easy and fast. We really liked that!

Fantastic value for the price. We would certainly stay here again. Thank you Guy!

This condo is an excellent place to stay while in Fernie. Our family of five had plenty of room to spread out and relax between adventures. The beds are comfy and the linens are great quality, especially the towels. Just a quick drive from downtown and close to the Alpine Resort. We had everything we needed and enjoyed our stay very much.
Great location for staying close to Fernie and enjoying the outdoors

Guy has an overall great condo! The location is great, close to the river and not too far from town. The condo had everything we needed, and was in beautiful shape when we arrived. The beds were comfy and had great linens too. We also loved the vegan soap! Thanks for everything!
Very clean and comfortable stay for our family of four. Nicely located between the resort and town.
Great location, cleanliness and quick communication made our stay great. Thanks Guy!
Nice space with lots of room and beds. Very clean with 3 floors and a TV on each floor!
Good place.
Great place. Everything was clean and the communication was quick and easy. Would definitely recommended this to anyone who wants to be close to the hill and town with a quiet location.
Nice place! Would stay again
Nice spot with a good location, Guy was very easy to deal with.
We had a fantastic stay.
The place has a great scenic view of the mountain and the cleanliness is outstanding! Would go again if we were in the Fernie area.

Guys place was really great. We were pleasantly surprised over how spacious and cozy it was. Tv in both bedrooms and a chrome cast. So close to the slopes and grocery store with car and nice neighborhood. Felt like being in the mountains back home in Sweden, which we love. Great great great
Great place to stay for a weekend trip
Good place
Great place to stay. Really comfy beds, clean and close to the ski hill. Perfect
Super comfy beds.  Great location. Quick responses from host.
Excellent and clean

Everything as described with a very prompt and professional host. Great location... less than 5 mins to both the mountain and the town. Clean space as advertised. Will plan on coming back next time we're in Fernie!
Endroit charmant, trÃ¨s confortable (lits moelleux!), qui rÃ©pond Ã  nos attentes! Il ne manque qu'un ouvre-bouteille pour le vin ðŸ˜‹. Merci Guy!
Was an awesome place and great location!
Perfect location if youâ€™re staying for a boarding trip. Close to the base of fernie resort and also close to the town of Fernie for going out in the evenings.
Was very clean, had necessary amenities, and was a great location. Enjoyed thoroughly!!
Good stay
This was a wonderful place! Everything was so clean, very comfortable and well stocked. Staying here for 10 days was quite the vacation! Thank you, Guy!
Great stay while working out of town! Would highly recommend, all the amenities youâ€™ll need.
Breathtaking! Will definitely be back!!
Perfect for our trip.  Very clean and had everything we needed.  Very easy check-in process.
Great location in between resort and town. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Endroit bien situÃ© pour le ski Ã  Fernie, entre la montagne et la ville.
Great spot in Fernie, especially if youâ€™re into mountain biking or skiing. Would def recommend

Great place, spacious and clean. Everything is thought through. We were staying during summer heat wave the bottom floor was satisfactory chill. 
I'd stay there again and recommend staying
Very Clean well appointed townhome on the Westside of Fernie. Perfect for our family of five. Very close for mountain bike trail access and hiking (berry picking). Served as the perfect base camp.
Nice place; very clean. Close walk to the river. Communication was excellent.

This unit is well stocked and comfortable for a short stay.  There is no air conditioning and that is not really stated on the listing but the fans do a decent job of cooling the place down at night.  It is a great location to experience all that Fernie has to offer.
Nice place and clean
A nice place to stay.

Good location to the ski resort, easy check in (all by automated message), clean and comfortable, full kitchen. TV's on all 3 floors was nice, we could put a movie on for our kids upstairs and make supper on the main floor. Parking can be difficult during peak times of the day and all units have stairs. When we arrived the stairs were quite slick but salt was close by.
Nice place! Close to ski resort and a good price for what you get.

Guyâ€™s place was the perfect spot to rest our heads after skiing. Guyâ€™s unit has everything you need, well equipped kitchen, comfortable beds and the house was clean upon arrival. Great location - only 5 mins to the ski hill and 5 mins to downtown Fernie. Guy is a very responsive and accommodating host. We hope to be back soon!
Great place, good location to ski hill and very good communication
The condo was very clean, comfortable and spacious. There were only 2 of us but we booked this spot because of the great location and unbeatable value.

Nice location , house was clean & tidy .
Host was excellent
Great value for a convenient location just a short drive into the downtown and steps away from trails.
Awesome place!!
Big, well appointed townhouse with full kitchen and bbq.  Great stay!

data.name: Ski in condo with great views at Timberline Condos
data.address_address: 4559 Timberline Crescent, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

Freshly furnished with new couch, beds, bedding, TV's and local art. This 2 bedroom Timberline Condo can be skied back to and is only a short walk to the lifts. Access to one of the multiple hot tubs is just down the hall!

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The sauna and hot tubs are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo suite is located on the main level in the Timberline Lodges complex at Fernie Alpine Resort. The condo sleeps up to 6 guests with 2 Queen master bedrooms each with their own ensuite, and a sofa pull-out in the living room. The suite features a full kitchen, comfortable living area, with brand new couch, 2, 4K HD Smart TV's with cable and Netflix, Wi-Fi, and a gas fireplace. The condo has stunning mountain views that can be enjoyed from the large windows in the living room or from the private balcony.

Guests can also enjoy access to the facilities at Timberline Lodges including hot tubs, BBQ's, sauna and more! The complex also boasts a day spa onsite offering massage and other spa treatments.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Timberline Condos are located at Fernie Alpine Resort. They are a ski-in complex, with a short walk to the lifts.

Fernie's historic downtown is an 8 minute drive. During winter months, you can also use the ski shuttle to town which picks up just a short walk away.

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

reviews.comment: Great location, lots of space ( we sat 13 people for dinner ) between the dining table and additional table in the second bedroom ). Very easy access on the main floor for hauling in groceries and our luggage. Will definitely look at renting this one again on our next trip to Fernie.

We  had a great time at thomasâ€™ place as family of 5 (2 adults and 3 children). Nice spacious and light condo, the 2 queen beds were very comfortable and everything sparkling clean. 7â€™ walk from lifts - made it a nice warm-up before our ski trip. Shared hottub is just around the corner and not busy when we stayed.
We had a few small questions upon arrival which were responded to very promptly! Would definitely recommend coming back!
Awesome place.
Clean, tidy and excellent location for a day skiing at Fernie. The hot tub was amazing after a big day on the slopes!
Bright, well equipped condo, great location.
Great spot to rip Fernie. The ski in is easy to access. Small walk to hill but that is standard for most accommodation on the mountain. Fit the needs for our group of 5 well! I would recommend.
Great place, a bit far of a walk to the lifts - but the shuttle or driving and parking in lot 4 is perfect! Kitchen is well stocked with knives, pans, etc! Great for family stays
Great location, cozy place, and owner is very easy to deal with! Would recommend and stay here again.
Great condo that is just a short walk from the resort. Thomas was incredibly responsive to all our questions and was a great host. I would recommend this if youâ€™re visiting Fernie!
great location and value.
Great place.
Lovely spot, nice and clean, short walk to the lifts and village!
Awesome place to stay
Worked great for our family of 4. Timely communication, very clean.

reviews.comment: This is a well equipped ground floor unit in a convenient location for activities at the resort.  It has everything you need for a comfortable stay.
Very nice, clean accommodation. Located right next to the hot tub as listed. Hopefully guests will obey hot tub hours. Bedroom window is right next to it.
Our family stayed at this condo during the winter. It is in a great location for accessing the ski hill. We enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub at the end of the day. Would definitely stay there again.
Place was great!  7 minute walk to the hill and the place was as described.  BBQ and hot tub were nice to have.
Clean, cozy and in the mountains... what more do you need? :)
It was a good experience
Fantastic location and beautiful space. I was very comfortable here and was sad to leave. I would certainly come back.
Very much enjoyed our stay at Liam's - great place and great host!
Nice clean spot with everything we needed and comfy beds. Good times. Thank you Liam!

Liam's condo is located in a great location just below the base of the ski hill. It's only a few minute walk to all the nearby amenities and chairlift. The inside of the condo was well laid out, cozy, and has plenty of space for up to 4 people. Liam was fast at responding when we had issues turning on the fire place and helped us sort out the issue in short order. I would recommend this place to anyone who's looking for a place to stay in Fernie.
Great place & great host!
We had a lovely stay in Fernie, the place was perfect for what we needed, with a short walk to the hill.
Everything worked out like it is supposed to.
Liamâ€™s place was great. Very quiet and cozy. It had everything that we needed. Liam was very helpful with any questions that we had. We would definitely stay again.
Killer location and proximity to the ski hill was really great. Clean and cozy!

Great spot! Short walk to the hill and great sheets. Only thing to note is that the hot tub is closed during covid (sadly) but there is a bathtub in the place. 
Liam was a great communicator !
A comfortable place to relax after a day of skiing !!  Would definitely stay again!
Great unit! Will come again
Nice spacious unit just a short walk to the hill!
Clean and conveniently located condo.  Perfect for a stay up at the hill.
Thank you!
Great place!
Has all the comforts and amenities you need for a mountain getaway!

We had a great stay in this little two bedroom ground-floor unit on the ski hill. Lots of beautiful walks through the woods! I would definitely recommend staying here. Liam was very helpful and quick to respond.

The suite features a full kitchen, comfortable living with new couch, 55" 4K HD Smart TV with Netflix, Wi-Fi, and a gas fireplace. There is a second bedroom that is "locked off" from this main unit. It may have guests in it, however it has its own private entrance. The sound does travel easily between the units.

reviews.comment: Great price, clean house, warm hottub what more do you need

Super clean, amazing views, incredible location! This is the perfect escape from the city! We loved our stay! The kitchen is equipped with everything you need! 
Would definitely come back again!
Excellent space! Very clean. Exactly as described and as you see in the pics! Highly recommend!

The location was beautiful and if you want to pay to be close to the ski hill or mountain biking trails it makes sense. There were a lot of extra little amenities for cooking and the linens and towels were very nice. The place was a little dated and there is no bath tub. Also the balcony is nothing to write home about.
Was amazing. Awesomr view great wifi netflix on tv. Tons of space
The location is great, just a few minutes from the mountain. Check in was super easy and Thomas was very responsive.
Great location, great views and nice building.  Close walk to the lifts and outstanding views.  would recommend and we will stay again next time.

The apartment really has an awesome view, the aparment has all needed fot either a weekend getaway or, in our case, a longterm stay. Equipment and furniture are new, anyway some spots make you realize its an rental property and not somebodys home.

Communication with the host, check-in and all the process was efficient and easy.

We recomment the place and would like come back.

This was a fantastic condo that was especially clean and convenient and helped to make our ski vacation very relaxing at the beginning and end of our day. 

Thomasâ€™s directions for location and access worked very well. The kitchen was well equipped, the hot tub was nice and hot, the building and area itself were very quiet, and it was a quick and easy 5 minute walk to the first chair.  

It was bright and comfortable with lots of surfaces to dry ski gloves and helmets, hang items, etc.

We would absolutely stay here again.
Great place with a beautiful view. Very much enjoyed the stay.
Awesome spot
Had  a great stay!
Great spot, excellent value on the hill for sure.  Recommend this place

This is a great little spot and its walking distance to the ski hill. We were able to walk home for a relaxed lunch then head back up for afternoon runs. Everything was super clean and worked well. Thanks for having us!
Nice place.

Guests can also enjoy access to the facilities at Timberline Lodges including hot tubs, BBQ's, sauna and more! The complex also boasts a day spa onsite offering massage and other spa treatments.

reviews.comment: Small simple space that is exactly as advertised. Hot tub was wonderful after a insane powder day on the hill. Check in was easy.
It was the perfect little spot. We had an amazing day on the hill followed by peaceful evening.

This is a very clean and comfortable place. It is a hotel room with a bathroom and a spacious bedroom with a TV set. It was what I needed and Thomas was easy to communicate with. You have complete privacy but it is easy to reach Thomas if you need anything
Great Location

Clean place. A kettle or microwave would be great. Walls between the room and the main unit are quite thin, so you are able to hear talking, coughing, showering, etc. in the other room. We had to leave the room after two nights of our five night stay due to there being many bugs flying above the beds in the room during the night. The bugs were crawling all over the ceiling and beds, which made for a very uncomfortable stay. The host did nothing about our issue, and seemed not to care much. No refund or compensation for leaving early and having to deal with the bugs.
Loved the place! Very cute and comfy! Thomas was great as well! Very informative and ensured everything was great, also a quick replier!
Our check in was super easy, didn't spend much time in the room but it was exactly as advertised and a good place to crash after a long day.
Nice place to stay. Feels like a hotel.

convenient, efficient, clean and simple. 
Affordable housing without unneeded frills!
Great location. Everything was clean and as advertised. Thomas was very hospitality and was great with communication. Great value for the price.
Very Good value for the room.

Great location, lovely views, more spacious than we expected, and the room was clean and well kept. Check in went smoothly and we had no issues. Thomas responds quickly which helps as well! It would be nice to have some coffee in the room :).
It was good. No fridge so we brought a cooler
Great location!
Clean place. We enjoyed the hot tub and the view! Points for the awesome soap/shampoo provided!
It was great! So close to the hill!
Good location, short drive to the hill.
Great location and good value!

Great location! Just a short walk to the hill and the price is hard to beat. Thomas was super quick to respond to my request to book and the check in and directions were extremely easy to follow. Itâ€™s a smaller room but itâ€™s got all you need when going for a quick ski trip.
If you are a skier or snowboarder and looking for a place to stay in Fernie overnight then this is the best place for you : clean,close to the hill,hot tub and convenient
Great location just a 5 minute walk to the ski lift.
Great place to stay after a day of skiing or hiking!
Go for it
Great location and good value. Would stay here again!

You can expect to pay way too much for what the room actually is and probably wonâ€™t receive the amenities he claims are there (the listing shouldnâ€™t be a generic thing. When things arenâ€™t open like the hot tub itâ€™s disrespectful to say it is and even worse to charge your normal rates.) 
There were lots of problems though and you can find better places with more around the hill so take your business elsewhere
Good value

Great location right on the ski hill. Quick drive to town, and lots to enjoy in the immediate area.
Would happily stay here again!
Clean room , very comfortable bed for a good price  . Looking forward staying there in the near future.

Read the listing very careful. This was beyond bare bones, which I would have seen if i scrutinized the listing. No coffee maker, only one side table, no temperature control and contrary to the listing, shampoo was not provided (it was just soap).

We also had major noise issues. People partied until 1am in theconplex, it was extremely loud, and since there is no manager on site, there is no one to enforce or control the noise rules.
Enjoyed my stay - was in a great location and was the right fit for what I was needing during my stay in Fernie. Thank you! Will book again!

Room was nice, location was perfect. Lodge guests were quiet at night had no issues with that. only thing I would recommend would be to bring a hot plate or microwave if your staying for a few weeks, i was left eating cold meals for 2 weeks as there was no microwave to heat food. Other then that it was a great stay!
A good time
Great location that is close to the hill.

We sent Thomas a message regarding having an issue with our TV remote and we were told someone will come have take a look at it. Shortly after, we heard the lockpad on our door unlock itself and before the person had swung open, I opened the door and there was a man standing there stating we had trouble with our lock. I told him "no we have a problem with our remote and can't get our TV to work". The guy took the remote and brought it back stating he had changed the batteries. In the end, the TV never ended up working during our stay regardless of changing the batteries. We told Thomas about the TV not working and hopefully got it fixed for the next tenant. Our overall experience made us feel uneasy since the guy unlocked our door without knocking as common courtesy regardless if there was a tenant or not, and he did not apologize for doing so. It made my fiancÃ© and I feel comfortable that there was no way to lock our door from the inside of our rental after what had happened. It was strange. And obviously the sense of trust was an issue now. In hindsight, the location of the place is optimal as it is walking distance from the ski hill.

Everything was as expected and disclosed in the ad. No hot tub access due to covid, but that was clearly disclosed in the listing. Amazing value for a place to stay within walking distance of the runs. Would stay again as great value for price.
Nice place right by the mountain. Thomas was quick to respond to any questions and gave very detailed check in/ check out instructions
Excellent place for couple if you plan to ski on the hill! Minutes to the lift and you canâ€™t beat that. Will definitely come back again.
Great spot to stay for riding the hill. Would be nice if a microwave was added but itâ€™s as advertised and only a short walk up the road to the chair lift.
Great communication. Walking distance to the hill

Great communication. Awesome location.
Clean and comfortable place with great value. Will definitely book again.
Great spot to stay on hill for 1-2 people. Totally separate from main unit.

We had a wonderful time in Fernie. Thomasâ€™s place was easy to find, check in to and very clean. A great place to stay for a nice price and short walk to the ski hill. Thomas responded quickly to any questions we had and everyone was exactly as described. We would 100% stay again next time we visit.
Great place to stay for skiers. Super clean. Comfortable bed. Wonderful views of the mountains from the window. Would definitely stay here again.
Great place

reviews.comment: Nice place good location, dishes and fridge not cleaned
We stayed two nights during the summer. The unit was cleaner and spacious. We enjoyed our stay thoroughly. Highly recommended.

This is a great location. Itâ€™s not in town, but it is up on the ski hill. We loved being able to get out and see the ski resort anytime we wanted. And town is only a few minutes away. Very comfortable space. Nice, updated, clean. Reasonable price.

The place was great.  Crystal responded to any questions almost immediately.  It was very clean and spacious for 2 adults and 2 teenagers and just a short - very short - drive to the ski hill - I even walked it the one day in about 10 min.  Would stay here again.
Lovely spot - cosy, great location, kitchen well stocked with necessary untensils, cookware/bakeware etc.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The sauna and hot tubs are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Other features of the condo include a fireplace in the living area, air-conditioning, and an in-suite laundry. The master bedroom features a Queen bed, and there is an additional sofa pull-out in the living room.

The second bed/bath is locked off from this main unit is a separate suite with it's own private entrance. Sound does travel easily however.

We partner with FernieDirect to offer 24/7 local support during your stay!

Great place to stay in Fernie!
Excellent place to escape, relax and have fun.
Condo was immaculate. Check-in was a breeze. I'll definetly look to stay again when the snow falls !
Great space for a great price!
Clean and spacious, and amazing location!
Spent 2 nights here for our anniversary and was very happy. Check in was easy, host was always quick to respond to any messages. The bed was very comfortable as well. We would stay again
This place is nice and clean. Only a 3 minutes walk from the hill. Super convenient.
Wonderful place near fernie resort base.
Very clean and modern ~ I will definitely stay here again when I visit Fernie
We had a wonderful stay! Easy to find, main floor unit was great. Super quiet even with lock off. Everything you could ever want or need. Communication was great. No concernsðŸ‘ðŸ¼
We loved our time in this mountain side condo. Very comfy bed, good space and well equipped. We left something behind and Crystal went above and beyond to return it to us.

We had a great time staying here. Perfect space for a few days in Fernie. Sparkling clean. Super easy check-in. Beautiful views. WiFi was great too! Small A/C unit cooled it down nicely in 30+ weather when we needed it.
Great cozy space!
While I was looking for places in Fernie, Crystal was the quickest to respond by far. Fair price. Close to town. I will be sure to reach out next time I'm visiting.
A lovely, clean, well appointed condo in a great location.
Great place to stay

Such a great location, with all the amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. This is one of the best locations on the mountain for ski in accommodation, as well as for the warmer months. 
Clean and well appointed with all the touches needed for a great stay.
Lovely mountain stay.
Everything a person needed was right there.  Very clean, very spacious, and very quite

reviews.comment: All good but no coffee for coffee maker & no A/C
Our stay at Crystal's was great. The room was clean and in a great location on the skii hill. She made check in and check out very easy. I would recommend staying here when passing through Fernie.
Super clean place, at a more than fair price! Couldnâ€™t ask for anything more. Will be trying to stay there again on the next trip to Fernie!

Crystalâ€™s place was very clean. Checking in was a breeze. I would just like to mention that the photos does not give your place justice. The place is better in person. I would definitely book this place again if I come snowboarding this winter.
What a beautiful and bright space, amazing location, and clean too!  We really enjoyed the out door hot tub.
Nice clean room, great jacuzzi. Perfect for o e or more nights
Clean condo and nice hot tub. Cups for water and coffee would be nice and it was hot in the condo even with the window open so a fan would be nice
Was a really nice stay

Perfect location for us... We went to a wedding at the Griz and it was a short walking distance from there. Super easy check in. It can get a bit hot in there and I dont think there was AC, so I would suggest bringing a fan.
She was very responsive. Beautiful room & location. I would definitely come back
My hubby and son stayed her on a mountain biking trip and it was perfect!  Nice be located so close to the hill!
This was a wonderful space to sleep in just like a hotel.

Overall the room is okay. Two twin beds pushed together was a bit strange. The room is very small and cramped. Radiant flooring in the bathroom is amazing. Room definitely needs to be updated/maintained better.

Great little place for 1 or 2 people and very economical. As it is a joined room we did hear the neighbor's dog barking while they were out so we were more mindful of any noise we made. Read the other reviews as they helped us a lot in packing - I recommend bringing cups, coffee/filters, and a fan since it does get a bit warm (also adds white noise). The beds were comfortable and room was very clean. There is a large smart TV on the wall (not in the pics) so you can use your Netflix, etc. We cooked on the BBQ which worked well - just bring your own cutlery, etc. The mini fridge worked well including the little freezer at the top. It took us a while to find the garbages but did on the last day by the property behind us. Quick walk to the ski hill and convenience store. Overall a great place to stay and we will be back!
Very clean and great location!
Lovely Clean one bedroom condo close to Fernie ski hill.
Place was a good value and Crystal was good with communicating.
A perfect place to come back to after adventures in the mountains and going to the lake with super easy check in / check out!
Air conditioner was a major issue. On top, an unresponsive host. Wont recommend!

Suite was exactly how it looked in the pictures- location was good and check-in was effortless! Crystal was great at responding and answering all my questions. A small table fan has been added to the room which was great- helped with the warm evenings! Was a nice, basic, hotel like place to stay. I enjoyed the suite, had a microwave, fridge and a coffee pot, at a great nightly price. Also used the BBQ both nights which was ideal, as I love to BBQ! Bring all your own kitchen wear as there is none in the suite. Overall would recommend the place to others and would absolutely stay again!
Good place good location
Place is as described. No problems with place.
Great stay! Will be booking this spot again when back in Fernie!
nice and affordable place to stay on ski hill.
Great location, super clean, very quiet building, cozy stay!
Good place to stay.

data.name: Private Garden Suite
data.address_address: 52 Mount Proctor Avenue, V0B 1M3, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This cozy studio suite with its own private entrance opens onto a shared deck which overlooks the back garden. There is a private bathroom, double bed, and kitchen area with microwave, sink, fridge/freezer, and single induction hob. A closet offers plenty of room for storage, and with prior arrangement we offer garage space for skis, bikes, etc. There is a gas fire place which is especially useful in the winter and a dining area which can double up as a work space.

The deck and back yard is available to use and you can access the park through the back gate

When I'm home, I love to socialise with guests, but also understand when personal space is needed. I am available to answer any questions you may have.

An early morning stroll in the beautiful James White Park backing onto the property is the perfect way to sample our fresh clean air. Otherwise access the hiking/ biking or cross country ski trails from here, or take a quiet stroll into our cute mountain town where you may sample some delightful eateries or peruse the variety of stores which are especially enticing to outdoor enthusiasts.

We are about 20 to 30 minutes walk from the historical downtown which can be accessed by road or enjoy a walk along the trail, from the back garden. There is limited public transport in Fernie, so a car is useful, or many of the young skiiers hike to the hitching spot just outside city limits (30 minutes)

I normally live here but may not always be around during your stay. Ryan and Jen live in my basement suite, with their gorgeous and friendly dog, Haggis. They don't use the main house, but you may see or hear them from time to time, and they occasionally use their bbq on the deck outside your suite. There is also an Airbnb rental in the main part of the home.
For this reason it is important to respect the parking areas, and quiet time. There is a spot allocated to this space, facing the LEFT garage door as you face the house.
