reviews.comment: Very cosy and quiet. Suited for what my husband needed for his work trip. Thanks so much!
This place worked well for someone who had never visited the area before and needed longer term accommodations.

We visited Fernie for 5 days over the winter. Cheryl was quick to communicate, keeps her unit clean (sheets, towels, dishes all sparkling), and has a convenient location with easy access to the park behind, and in close proximity to downtown. Like most areas in Fernie, you will hear the train, but after a couple days you do adjust to it. 
In our opinion the unit could use a little TLC, particularly the kitchen. The hot plates worked well, but if you plan to cook, bring your own oils, spices etc. The unit lacks good sound insulation, so we felt uncomfortable with how easy it was to hear all the conversations, foot steps, etc within the home. For a quick stay it may not be an issue for most people, but with a longer stay, we almost felt as though we had a bedroom in a house instead of a private suite, particularly because there is no TV to stay entertained in the evenings. 
All in all, we had a good stay, enjoyed how clean the space was, and appreciated how easy it was to access the park behind.

Thank you for sharing your home and hospitality.
We had  wonderful stay and experience in Fernie .... in the town, Nordic ski area and Elkford has a hidden Nordic Trail up Boivin Creek which is an absolute gem.
It is walking distance into town and you have the wonderful trail right out your backyard.
Again thank you and good luck with your adventures.

My boyfriend and I had a great stay at Cherylâ€™s place in Fernie! It was a quick drive to the alpine resort, places to eat, downtown, the aquatic center. It was clean with a lovely fire place. All communication was clear and quick. We had a wonderful time on our get away!
Cheryls place is a perfect spot to stay when exploring the mountains in fernie. Minutes away from the downtown area. Easy check-in, cute little space with the fireplace!
Great place to stay
Nothing fancy but very clean and comfortable.  A tad noisy from adjacent parts of the house but quiet during the night.   Good place to stay in Fernie.
Very cozy, suitable for a single or couple, in a quiet residential area.

Cherylâ€™s studio is clean, roomy, and comfortable . The gas fire was much appreciated , and we made use of the convenient hooks to hang our coats near the fire. The kitchen is well equipped to do basic cooking and we appreciated having a full sized fridge for our supplies. Cheryl is a gracious and welcoming host. Thank you for having us.

Cheryl's place is a cute studio suite that is perfect for two people on a ski vacation (or biking) in the Fernie area.  Its in a nice quiet spot, adjacent to a beautiful walking trail, and only a few minutes from downtown and the ski hill.

Cozy little studio at great location next to a park and close to downtown Fernie. Cheryl is an excellent host, always helpful and super quick in responding. Easy self check-in. Great value for money!

We stayed for three weeks in December while snowboarding in Fernie Alpine Resort. Especially enjoyed the fire place, which made the studio very cozy on snowy winter nights. Also: lovely details like a locally made soap in the bathroom as well as coffee and tea in the kitchen.
Would definitely come back!
Cheryl's place was very clean and cozy. Perfect for adventuring in Fernie!
Great little suite... very clean.   The host was super quick in all responses.
Great place!
Cheryl was very friendly and hospitable. The suite was clean, cozy and well equipped. If you're looking for a convenient place to enjoy the town of Fernie from, this is a great choice.

We spent a night here on our way to Waterton NP. We were glad that Cheryl could accommodate us on short notice and checked in with us to make sure all was well.
We really liked the location. Access to the river walk was right outside of her backyard. We really enjoyed our evening stroll towards town.
Fantastic place. Very cozy and nice. Very clean and very easy to access. Cheryl is an amazing host and I will definitely be staying here again.

I had a very good experience staying with Cheryl. She was very quick to respond to any questions I had, the place was very clean and had everything we needed. It's a bit tucked into the residential but it backs right on to the river park which is amazing. I greatly appreciated the self check in. It made the entire process very smooth and I didn't have to stress about an exact time to be there
We chose this place based on value. What you see is what you get. Host was very accommodating and pleasant. Space was clean and a short drive to downtown fernie

What an amazing place to stay! I was at Cheryl's for two months when I was on a work contract in Fernie and couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.  Lovely, quiet neighbourhood with the park metres away. The suite is cozy and very comfortable. Cheryl went above and beyond; a very gracious host. I was sad to leave!
Great place and Cheryl is awesome
Clean, private, convenient. Cheryl is a wonderful host with excellent communication.
Great little place to stay at. The host is easy and quick to communicate with. What you see or read is what you get. Worth every penny. Would stay here again in an instant.

Our stay was good! The location was easy to access, clear directions and accurate description of property. The accommodation was clean and tidy with everything in working order. Very pleasant surroundings as well.
Cozy little place that offered everything I needed. Beautiful gas fireplace and great locationby the river. Cheryl went out of her way to made my time perfect.

A great and cozy place to stay. Close to all amenities downtown as well as the ski resort. Thoughtful gestures by the host made for a warm welcome. If we are ever in the area again we will definitely stay here.
Nice spot by the river and cozy with the fire place
A very simple space with a hot plate. It has everything you need including a fireplace. Cheryl was super accommodating and helpful.
Loved having the fireplace!
A lovely, quiet space with a huge garden just off a walking trail.  Simple, rustic, comfy bed & fireplace, friendly host.  Everything I needed for a solo retreat!

I had a great stay a Cheryl's place. The unit is a section at the back of the house on the main floor which backs on to a very nice patio area, which gets lots of sun during the day. The space itself is very well done. It has everything you need and nothing you don't. You do hear people from the adjoining rooms from time to time. Nothing very loud, but I would recommend bringing a portable speaker so you have the option of playing some soft music. The location in town allows quick access to the bike trails. I rode everyday without using my car. Very good experience. Cheryl was very friendly and accommodating. Would stay there again.
Good place to stay, walls are a bit thin so you can hear the tenants upstairs and in the basement suit. Other than that great place to stay

data.name: Legendary Griz Inn Sport Hotel 1 Bedroom Condo
data.address_address: 5369 Fernie Ski Hill Road, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
The best place to stay on the mountain is at the Legendary Griz Inn. This condo features full service, with access to an outdoor hot tub, pool. It's exactly where you want to be when the sun rises on the Lizard Range at Fernie Alpine Resort. Ski in, ski out and get everything you need with this perfect accommodation.

This is a classic 1 bedroom condo in the Griz Inn, featuring updated bed and dressers. Cozy meets functionality in this suite, with a basic full kitchen and one full bathroom. Close access to the Rusty Edge Bar and Grill, the infamous Griz Bar, and the ski/bike maintenance shops at the ski hill.

Guests have full access to this 1 bedroom condo and all hotel amenities.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

A classic condo in a perfectly-located hotel, with access to numerous trails, ski hill runs, and other recreation activities associated with the mountain.

Parking is included.

reviews.comment: Was in a great location and place was clean. Would be a great place if you were going skiing
I love this place. Had an amazing view especially when itâ€™s raining and proper facilities for long stay.

Honestly, I booked this place for 7 nights but only got to stay for 1. Due to no fault of Robert, Fernie alpine resort shut down. Its a shame cuz roberts place was right on the mountain. I got there at night on my first night and went to sleep. When I woke up I found out that the mountain closed so I got my money back for the unused nights and left.
Fantastic condo! Very comfortable with everything you need!

We  had a decent stay at the Griz Inn. It was close to the lifts, and a great location.  The hot tub and pool were excellent. The walls and floors are very thin, though, and it's right next to a stairway, so we found it quite noisy with people walking around in ski boots. The view faces the parking lot and garbage area. We were surprised that the check out routine involved removing all the garbage and recycling from the room - especially given the hefty fee and cleaning fee paid. It was a decent accomodation, overall.

Robert's place was just great for our family. Location on the mountain is unbeatable. The Mighty Moose poma and the Elk chair are just a few metres from the Griz Inn. The kitchen has everything you need and the pool and hot tub made our kids happy in the evening. Robert answered all our questions very quickly. We would definitely come back again.

La cuisine est Ã©quipÃ©e avec tout ce dont nous avions besoin. La piscine et le spa ont rendu les enfents heureux aprÃ¨s les journÃ©es de ski. Robert a rÃ©pondu Ã  toutes nos questions trÃ¨s rapidement. Nous retournerions dÃ©finitivement chez Robert.

This condo is in a wonderful location, and includes all the amenities of home.  We found it to be clean and well cared for.  When we had questions or problems, Robert was extremely quick to respond.  If you are looking for a one bedroom condo at Fernie, you can't go wrong with this one.
Great spot for a ski weekend.  The unit was comfortable, Robert was great and the location canâ€™t be beat!

This is a wonderful place to stay when skiing at Fernie! It is clean, comfortable, and the Elk Chairlift is right outside the building. The kitchen is really well equipped for an AirBnB, and the hot tub is excellent.

Robert is a great host. Although we didn't meet him, he was available via email to answer questions when needed. His location is very clean and has all you need to cook your own meals while at Fernie. The location at the base of the mountain is ideal. I totally recommend renting with Robert if looking for an affordable option at Fernie. We will be back.

Roberts place at the Griz Inn was the perfect balance for value for cost. It provided everything we needed to make a comfortable stay for me and my family. The place is a little run down but you can't beat the price. All in all we would definitely stay again.

Nice place that was very clean and as described. Check in/out instructions are very clear and cover everything you need to know. During our stay we had a few questions and they were answered very quickly. Would stay there again.
Great Location right next to lifts. Easy ski-in Ski out access.
Very convenient location for skiing. Nice to have the Rusty Edge restaurant right in the building.
On hill accommodations were very good.  Summertime is pretty slow at the resort - plan to go to town to get meals if eating out.  Services limited.
Great clean place, excellent host definitely recommend  this place
Great place !!
Great place, super fast communication, over awesome experience.

Nice place close to the mountain. We were able to walk to our event next door at Lizard Creek. Pool and hot tub were nice.  Walking distance to a nice restaurant. We were there in summer and it was warm at night (fine once we could cool it down with the windows open). Has A/C in the main space but didnt really get the bedroom cool. We stayed with our toddler and had lots of room for the playpen.  Space is a bit dated but everything works and was fine for us. The TV has netflix and is easy to use. We would stay again.

This was Our very first experience with air bnb.  It was at the Griz inn hosted by Robert. It was rough intro. The place was clean but in major disrepair.  The recommendation that AirBNB leaves is to treat the place like it's Your own.  I almost went straight to the hardware store to start repairs.

1- security lock had been kicked off the back door
2- Air Conditioning didnâ€™t work (it was + 32) but it did leak all over the inside of the window sill
3- the tub didnâ€™t drain - I filled up during showers.  The shower curtain was too long, and was underfoot during showers.
4- The tap water was so salty it was undrinkable
5- cupboard doors were falling off
6- blinds were broken
7- screens were missing from windows
8 - Hot water at the kitchen tap disappeared after 10 seconds of running.

We're not commonly critical people, but our experience could have been so much better by paying the same price, at another venue. (the cleaning fee bumps the daily costs up to 95 bucks).
Great place

Bon rapport qualitÃ© prix.
Great location and Host
Great place to stay and great value! Hope to stay again.

The condo, while on a smallish side, was more than enough for the three of us. It was clean and well stocked with all the necessities. If you don't care about the views of the ski hill, it's nicely tucked away at the quiet side of the building...... there's a bar/restaurant at the front and it can get noisy at times.
Also it's a true ski in/ski out with one of the best micro locations on the hill. Would definitely visit again.
Robert's condo was the perfect location, a true ski in/ski out. The bed was comfortable and the pull out sofa was functional. A good choice for 2 people looking to stay on the hill.
Perfect spot to stay in Fernie! Charming condo right on the hill.
Affordable ski in/out with kitchen.

Robert's place was the perfect spot for our Fernie adventure. Full kitchen, living room, balcony and right next to the Elk quad and Mighty Moose poma lift. The Rusty Edge and Big Bang Bagels are inside, right downstairs.

Location, location, location!

Roberts place is truly ski-in, ski-out, as close as you can possibly get to a mountain. The ski lockers are super convenient, and the hot tub is fantastic! The kitchen isvery basic, but the whole unit is as described- nothing fancy but comfortable. Would stay there again!
Great place, ski in/out is awesome and the hot tub is great. Weâ€™ll be coming back for sure.
cozy little apartment right on the hill.  everything my husband and I needed for our holiday.  location was great.

We had a great stay at Roberts place. The place was very clean, bed was way too comfortable (didnâ€™t want to get out!), and most importantly it was so close to the chair lift and runs. The pub is downstairs but we didnâ€™t hear any noise at all. Also, the hot tub downstairs was lovely at the end of the day. Would definitely stay again!
Very convenient ski-in/ski-out location. Quiet, clean, enough space for a family of 4. Really enjoyed a hot tub and swimming pool after a great day on hill.
Nice little appartement. Had everything we needed for a comfortable stay (the kitchen had everything) and fast Wifi. Make sure you have a car as it is quite far from town. Would recommend :).
Great place to stay in Fernie. I was there for a work trip and book last minute. They were very accommodating, Very clean, with everything you need.

Very nice, comfortable and well equipped apartment with a decent view of the mountains to the South. Visited during the off-season and it was an incredibly peaceful place.

Stayed in Rob's apartment as a base for mountain biking around Fernie and had a fantastic time.

Would definitely stay again!

Robert's place was exactly as advertised. The space had everything we needed and offered exceptional value. It's definitely not the most updated or huge space, but it was clean, comfortable and well appointed. Did I mention the value? Would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay and even extended it an extra day here. We stayed in the off season so it was very peaceful and quiet. The place was very clean and although a bit outdated, super comfortable and cozy. We never ended up using the kitchen as we went out to eat but the kitchen was fully stocked with everything we would have needed to make any meal we wanted. We really enjoyed the pool and hottub, and loved that you booked your time slot and it was private and you had it all to yourselves. We just wish the hours for the pool were extended as it was only open 9-5. But it was easy to book in as it wasn't busy. 
The Rusty Edge wasn't open as it was offseason as well but that was ok as there is plenty of restaurants in Fernie.
This place would be amazing in the winter when the hill is open! We definitely would love to come and stay again!
Everything is exactly as set out in the description and the reviews.  Great value and clean.
quick to respond, kitchen is bursting with useful and  well maintained tools, the location is a nice starting point for many romantic walking trails. perfectly clean and great water pressure
A great, cozy headquarters on the hill. Although a bit "dated" the place was clean and cozy. Hot tub was great!  Best of all, it is about 100 Steps to the Elk Chair.
All the basics and great location.
Great location for skiing!
Great location and Robert was quick to respond to all of our questions. We would stay again.
This condo is just as advertised. Location is great and has all the necessary items for a convenient stay.
Great location and cozy! Will definitely stay again!
Great location!!
Great place - excellent location and very clean and well equipped. Exactly   as advertised!
Great experience overall. No complaints about our stay. Location was perfect and the view is fantastic. Will definitely be coming back!

Robert is a fantastic host! All of our questions were answered promptly, and we felt so welcome even though we didn't meet Robert in person. The condo was very clean and looked exactly like the photos. This is a great place to stay (and a great price as well)  if you're looking for a ski-in ski-out option in Fernie!
great spot right on the hill close to everything
We loved staying here in Fernie
perfect location for pole position on a powder day, then ski straight to the patio for a beer and finish with a soak in the hot tub facing polar leak.
Great location and extremely convenient check in!
Great location and host communication. Condo was exactly as expected. Thank you to Robert.

This spacious well equipped modern 2 bedroom Condo is conveniently located just 3 minutes from town and 5 minutes to the ski hill.
Amenities include an amazing steam room, an indoor heated pool, a large outdoor hot tub and gymnasium and to top it off, underground parking.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The pool, gym, sauna and hot tub are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Special, extra spacious 2 bedroom unit. Huge bathroom!

Full access to all building amenities including steam room, pool, sauna, hot tub, gym and underground parking.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

reviews.comment: Great spot, close to the hill. Would recommend staying here
Had a great stay at Deeâ€™s place. Itâ€™s just minutes from the ski resort and close to town.
Great place to stay, minutes from the ski hill. Well maintained, comfortable condo.
Great location, communication and this place delivers on what is promised! Wonderful - Fernie is a special place and this condo was the prefect base from which to explore it!
We enjoyed our stay at Deeâ€™s place.  Close to the ski area, clean, kitchen set up very well, comfy and cozy.  Laundry facilities were excellent.  Liked the workout facilities as well.

Very nice place to stay! Other people in the condo are very friendly, underground parking is very helpful, good amenities inside building, and great location. Comfortable beds, very clean, the fact that coffee is stocked is very nice. Would stay again!

Great location for heading to the ski hill, super easy check in and check out.

Great place very well equipped with soaps Scott towels etc did not have to buy all of those things Dee responded very quick very specious clean 15-20 min walking distance to downtown would recommend the place to all my friends â¤ï¸

would stay again great place

data.name: Spacious Riverside Chalet
data.address_address: 41 Rivermount Place, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Amazing corner unit with a warm mountain town feel, located in a secluded area of the Riverside development half way between the ski hill and downtown Fernie. Nearby to the Elk River, this unit has everything you need for comfortable and functional space. Featuring a one-car garage, open concept living room and kitchen area, and a beautiful king master bedroom with ensuite.

Beautiful mountain views with gorgeous vaulted ceilings, an incredibly well-equipped kitchen, cozy living room, and a fire place for those chilly nights in.

Full access to the entire townhome except for a couple owner lock off closets. Private parking garage, deck with BBQ, in suite laundry

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Riverside is located half way between the ski hill and downtown Fernie. Access to trail networks and the Elk River just steps away, making navigation to and from town easy and enjoyable.

Parking for 1 vehicle in the garage, 1 in the outdoor parking stall. Additional parking on the street on a first come first serve basis.

City of Fernie Business License: #001976

reviews.comment: Great host, quick responses when there are questions. The house was clean and roomy, only minutes from everything in Fernie. Be aware the streets are narrow and donâ€™t allow trailer parking. If you are towing a trailer you have to park down the street a short distance.
Amazing place!! Will come back.
Great location and view! Great set up, lots of walking paths near the house. Cozy and homey feeling! Will be back again!

Our family of 5 stayed here for nearly a month while work was being completed on our home.  It was truly a home away from home and we have nothing negative to say about this place.  It is incredibly well stocked - kitchen, bathrooms, even the living room with games and cards and puzzles.  It was incredibly clean.  Beds were huge and warm and extremely comfortable.  Smart TV had netflix, disney plus, amazon prime, etc.  You are only a quick drive away from the ski hill or into the town proper, or you can walk or bike along the river to get into town.  It was amazing.  Do not hesitate to book this place for a large group of family or friends.  Thank you so much Betsy!
Great location. Great hosts and great view. Very accommodating on timings. Highly recommend

We stayed here for a four day ski vacation at Fernie and Castle Mountain.

Condominium was well-equipped, very clean, and location great for skiing.

Betsy was very responsive

Great place
Great location near the ski hill, comfortable, spacious, and very clean! I would definitely recommend Betsyâ€™s place if going to Fernie for a group or family trip.

Betsyâ€™s property at Pinnacle Ridge in Fernie was an excellent place to stay for a winter ski trip in Fernie. The photos in the listing are very accurate and the place is spacious and very well appointed. Plenty of sleeping space would also make this a great option for families. One minor downside is the location is a bit further away from downtown entertainment and restaurants and walking is not an option. With no ride sharing services and limited taxi service in Fernie transportation is a bit challenging.
Great place
Nice location and easy to find.
Amazing space, very open and bright. Lots of room and super clean. Would stay here again. Betsy was a great host.

This is a super condo. Great location-across the field from the river. The condo was extremely clean. We cooked all of our meals in the condo, the kitchen was very well equipped. An ideal condo which is very good value.
Beautiful space, easy to access with everything you'd need.  Great place and I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
Itâ€™s beautiful and the area is great!    So comfortable!
Amazing place.  Loved it!!

We stayed at this townhouse for an extended long weekend with our 2 young children and it was perfect. Exactly as advertised. Loved sitting on the little back deck at night with a view of the mountains. Everything was very clean which felt good during a pandemic.
Beautiful property with plenty of space and a large kitchen with everything we needed. Chalet was easy to find and check in/check out was simple! We would happily visit this property again.
Great place to stay, offers a good location to the ski hill and local rivers for fishing! Check in was easy and it had everything we needed. Would recommend.
I love the leather couch. This home is super nice.
Beautiful place! Very clean, lots of room and great for family gatherings.

Betsy's  place was warm and cozy. The place was nice and clean (she even had the beds made like a hotel), she had everything  that we needed at the house and as an added bonus had heated floors! The place itself is easy to find and in a very quiet neighborhood.  The only difficulty we had was parking. There is a garage , but neither of our SUVs fit, so one of us had to park on the street a short walk away.

Betsyâ€™s place was perfectly suited for our family trip.

Highly recommend
We had a lovely stay, beds and bathrooms were clean and welcoming. Everything was great there were no issues
Beautiful place! Was perfect for what we needed!!
Great! Exactly what was described! Everything was clean and comfortable and really enjoyed that there was a heated garage for all of our snowboarding equipment
Was a very beautiful spot to stay very clean Was very easy to communicate with owner there was six of us in the space was more than enough to accompany all of us was a five-star experience
Our second stay, very clean, super nice owner, good location for ski!

Excellent property! Kitchen is very well equipped, living spaces warm and comfortable and beds are high quality. Everything was super clean and we felt at home immediately. Highly recommend staying here.
Fantastic accommodations! Highly recommend staying here if your ever in the area!

data.name: Spacious Stone Creek townhouse on the ski hill
data.address_address: 5423 Boomerang Way, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
3 bedroom ski-in townhouse a short walk to the slopes. The first floor includes a spacious open living room, dining and kitchen area, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with underfloor heating. The upper floor includes the master en-suite bedroom also with underfloor heating. This mountain townhouse also includes a private parking space, hot tub and BBQ on the balcony overlooking the wild forest. Also includes ski locker and private entrance. Perfect for your mountain getaway.

Updated furnishings and decor throughout create the ultimate cozy retreat at Fernie Alpine Resort

Full access to the entire condo. 2 closets are locked off for owner usage in the master bedroom.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The townhouse is situated in a quiet and secluded part of the ski hill and yet is a short walk to all the venues that the ski hill offers.

The hill has restaurants and bars . There is also a grocery store on the hill ( The pantry) which is well supplied with the essentials and is 5 min walk from our place.

reviews.comment: Cozy place, 10 min walk to the lifts, ski in location
We spent 5 days at Elisabeth's place and enjoyed every minute of it! It was a quick drive to the base of the ski hill and had all the amenities we needed.
Exactly what we wanted!

I would recommend this place to anyone going to Fernie. The unit is approximately a 15 minute walk from the mountain or a short drive to the parking lot. The place was very clean and included all of the essentials. The private hot tub on the balcony was an absolute treat and was perfect after a long day of skiing. 

Elisabeth was also a fantastic host and was always available to answer any questions. We could not have asked for a better stay in Fernie!
Amazing Airbnb!  We have three little ones and it was spacious and had everything we needed.  A great mountain spot and close to everything!  Loved our stay in Fernie.  Will be back!!

Stayed here for long weekend, exactly as the photos itâ€™s super cute!

Loved this townhouse! Easy to get to, lots of space for all of us, and loved the private hot tub. Kitchen is well equipped with pots/pans for cooking, and when we had food delivered the driver found the place easily. There is a flight of stairs up to the main floor, as well as another flight of stairs to the upper bedroom. Communication was quick, and check in was easy. We appreciated the extra parking spaces (we drove separately) as we know these spots arenâ€™t necessarily always included in a busy complex. Great spot. Everything you need for a mountain vacation in Fernie! Would be happy to stay again!
Wonderful for a family stay, Thanks for your hospitality Elisabeth. Great Ski destination!

Is a good place to stay for access to the mountain! Ski in is great! A cozy place to stay.
It's a bit of a walk to the ski hill so we drove down anyway. Good place to stay though.
Lovely place. Nicely decorated. Hot tub was fantastic. Good size. Would book again

data.name: Downtown Luxury @ 901 Fernie
data.address_address: 901 2 Avenue, V0B 1M0, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Look no further than 901 Fernie for luxury and convenience. This stunning unit at 901 Condos is located on Victoria Avenue in historic downtown Fernie. Immerse yourself in classic mountain culture, and savour those vast mountain views from your doorstep. This unit has everything you could possible want - and more.

This two-story unit features a master king suite with private patio full of mountain vistas, and ensuite bathroom. The beautiful open-concept kitchen and living room opens to a natural gas BBQ overlooking Fernie Alpine Resort. The second bedroom features a full private bath, and the twin room has a bonus pull out trundle bed for an extra guests (bring your own bedding for that). Take advantage of the underground parking, and make yourself at home.

Full access to the entire condo as well as the underground parking, indoor hot tub and gym!

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

901 Fernie is a unique place to stay, and is Fernie's only downtown accommodation. Once an old schoolhouse, the building was transformed into these incredibly luxurious apartments. Look to Spa 901 for relaxation, or walk to the nearest trailhead for a mountain ascent before catching a cocktail downtown after your hike.

Park underground and leave your car there for the duration of your stay. It's a short and pleasant walk to all downtown shops and restaurants. In the winter, the local ski shuttle pick-up is just across the street.

data.address_address: 1300 Riverside Way, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

This massive end unit has the most space of any unit at Riverside. You will love the ample space to enjoy your stay in Fernie. 5 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms spread over 3 floors with 3 outdoor patios! Spread out, relax and enjoy your vacation in Fernie!

This is the largest square footage of any condo available at Riverside. Not only are there lots of bedrooms, they are all very big and there are multiple living and dining areas.

The secondary "lock off" suite has a private entrance and is not included in this rental.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Riverside condos are located half way between the ski hill and the town of Fernie. (5 minutes to each)

The ski shuttle picks up just down the street. In the summer there are pathways that connect to town and the ski hill.

The lock off suite can be booked separately and may have other guests staying in it. Although it is completely separate and private, noise does travel between these units easily.

reviews.comment: This is a great space. Lots of good comfortable rooms.  Lots of great outdoor furniture.  Excellent place to stay
We enjoyed everything about our stay! The place was very clean and had everything we needed for our trip! I have nothing but good things to say :)
Beautiful home, perfect for our group size and needs. Close to the ski hill and had all the amenities we needed. Very good communication. Thanks Ashley

This is a very large unit that can fit a large group while still having room for both privacy and lounging. The kitchen has a full set of equipment for making meals as a group. Cozy living rooms with fireplaces. Minutes from the ski hill.
Our stay was awsome lots of space clean had all we needed

The home is very spacious with plenty of bedrooms, bathrooms, and living room spaces (the basement living room was a great place to hang out in with lots of couch space). The 3 outdoor patio areas were a bonus too. The kitchen is well equipped which was great for home cooked meals and the entire home had air conditioning which definitely helped with the hot weather.  Would book again in the future!
Well kept and clean. Would stay again.
The condo had lots of space for large group (8), and had everything we needed for a great stay.  Would definitely stay again if I am in the area.
Awesome place, lots of space and very good value.

Our experience at Ashley's place was extremely memorable. I came to Fernie after driving across Ontario with a group of 6 (in total 7) for a place to stay for about half of our online remote university semester. I did a lot of research on places all over Canada and came across Ashley's place in Fernie that was perfect for what we required and it was within our price range, albeit the upper end. Ultimately, we decided on Ashley's place because of Fernie and the house checked all the boxes. Ashley was very responsive and helpful in the preparation for our arrival, including temporarily upgrading the internet package. When we first arrived at the townhouse, after a stunning drive into the mountains, all our expectations were surpassed. The place was exactly as shown in the pictures and extremely clean and well set up. It was way more spacious than we expected from a townhouse and the views from every patio/balcony/deck was just amazing. Not to mention the couch in the basement which is genuinely the best couch I've ever experienced. During our stay, Ashley was incredibly responsive and helpful (especially as we worked out some internet issues and minor repairs) which kept the stay running smoothly. One thing I will warn groups about is how thin the walls are and how easily sound travels, so definitely be mindful of your volume after quiet hours. In terms of the location, it was perfect for us. My group loved the close proximity to so many hiking/biking/walking trails, the river and the downtown area was a very short drive away. There is also a gas station conveniently located around the corner that got a lot of our business during our stay. All in all, there is nothing I would change about our experience - I have nothing but positive things to say. If you are debating on where you want to take your next vacation/study term/getaway, I hope you highly consider Fernie. The town has everything you need and so many unique small businesses, too. Everyone always looks happy and active (despite being right in the middle of a pandemic) and with the amazing views 24/7, it's so easy to feel like the town is home quite early on. After all, there's a reason you hear of A LOT of people that came to the town "temporarily" yet have ended up staying for years or decades. In my eyes, Fernie is a one of a kind place and if you choose to visit, you can be sure your stay at Ashley's place is the perfect place to make the most out of your short term or long term stay.
Great place with plenty of room! Would definitely recommend if heading to the Fernie area.

Our extended family stayed at Ashley's place for four nights. We had a great time. Everything was clean and well maintained. As family with kids, we enjoyed having two living rooms, well equipped kitchen, and lots of space for play and relaxing after long days of skiing. We will remember a big, wooden dining table that allow us to have family dinners by the fireplace. We will consider staying at Ashleyâ€™s place again when we visit Fernie.
Great location, lots of parking for a trailer along the street, lots of room for a group. Had a great stay!

Everything was good except the wifi .. we had poor connection throughout our stay .. they tried fixing it but it didnâ€™t work .. we ended up using our phone data. 
Response very quick though !
Beautiful home with a great view!
Lovely house! Great location.
This condo is beautiful! Perfect for a large group and in a great spot if youâ€™re looking for something close to both the town and the ski resort! Would 100% recommend.

A beautiful, extremely clean, place.  We went for a snowboarding trip and it didnâ€™t not disappoint.  Lots of room at the front door for gear, coats, etc.  There are two different living rooms and the bedrooms are all good sizes.  The beds were extremely comfortable! Lots of room for sitting in the dining room as well.  Nice little back deck with bbq/patio set and a picnic table down on the lawn.  I highly recommend this place and hope to be back myself! Only a quick drive to the hill!

This place is very large and comfortable and functional for a large group! Easy access to bike trails and ski hill and town. The living areas have the most comfy sofa sectionals and the decks are lovely for eating and relaxing

serious and clean place

Ashleyâ€™s place was in a good (and quiet) location. We had easy and convenient check in/out. The room had basic amenities, but we knew that when we booked with her....very cost effective accommodations. Iâ€™d book again!
We found the place extremely loud, we were woken by the neighbor's kids screaming early in the morning dirty bed coverings and over-represented.
Great hotel style room, everything was better than expected. My only nitpick is that the water tastes a little chlorinated sometimes. Right by the Fernie resort too

Basic, good location.
Great place and location and  Ashley was a great host.  Will be back :)
Great location! 5 minutes away from the ski resort and itâ€™s just a left turn and youâ€™re there! Would definitely stay again
Great hospitality, would highly recommend!

Ok stay here. 
Ashley was nice during check in and was quite responsive. Beds were comfy and we had a Roku to use which was nice. 
However the internet is not secure and hardly works. I was unable to work from there for most of the time and had to travel in town for work. 
Further, there are really no amenities so you are unable to cook. Microwave and fridge are tiny, and there was no kettle. 
Parking was difficult, we almost always had to park on the road since the lot was always full, especially on weekends.
Not a lot of closet or drawer space either (about 5 hangers per â€œclosetâ€ and no drawers, just night table) 
The â€œbalconyâ€ was just a shared patio out front which was covered in snow so we didnâ€™t exactly get to use it either. 
This room is also connected to another full house where noise travels very easily, you can pretty much hear everything (movies, cooking, footsteps, conversations). There is actually a door that connects the two units on the inside and although it didnâ€™t happen, itâ€™s easy for someone to just walk into our space.

Finally, a red flag here is that Ashley requested additional payment via e transfer (violates airbnbâ€™s policy) for damages that we did not cause. 

All in all it was alright, we had fun as Fernie is beautiful :) however I feel like it the value is not there as we paid around $2k for three weeks and would prefer staying in town for that price next.
Really enjoyed staying at Ashleyâ€™s place! Great location, super easy check in, and exactly what we expected. Would stay again!
Spacious hotel-style suite with a large bay window. Great location right between town and the ski hill. Lots of lovely places to explore nearby with the Elk River mere steps away!
Great value!
Amazing value, clean and comfortable, and Ashley was very quick to respond to any enquiries I had.
Great place - clean, good location if you want to be close to the ski hill. Ashley was very responsive. Five stars.

The room was very nice and clean and the view was so beautiful. We had a very restful time during our stay. We had to leave early due to health reasons and even though we didnâ€™t ask for it, we got a refund for the nights we didnâ€™t stay. It is so refreshing to know that you deal with people who care about the well-being of their customers and support them when in need. Big thank you!!

Room was good for what we needed. Just needed a place to sleep and it satisfied that. There was a screen missing from a window making it hard to leave a window open to cool the room down. Tv was a bit hard to set up/connect so we could watch something at bedtime. Room was clean and a nice little tail close by to walk in the mornings.

reviews.comment: Nice place
Great place to stay. I hope to stay here again
Good space for a family of four.  Bunk beds were great for kids having their own beds.  Easy check-in even with late arrival.  Great mountain views.
Great location close to town and the ski hill
Fun place to stay.

Nice condo with good size bedroom - we had 4 ladies for a girls trip and found it was enough space. Kitchen was well equipped with pans, dishes, coffee pot, kettle... if you cook much you might prefer your own knives. The hot tub, sauna and games room were all closed because of Covid-19 so none of that was available. The shared BBQs were still available.
Great to be right on the hill with nice views.

This is a great place if you are looking for a quiet, relaxing getaway. It was very clean and has everything you need. The only downside is that noise does carry easily from suite to suite as we came to find out so be mindful of this. There was a baby next door to us and the sound wasnâ€™t muffled.

Great location and value. Responsive lister. Unit has no A/C so is hot during the day (late August), but would be fine in shoulder/winter season. Can hear conversations through the room-adjacent door, but not a major issue. Overall great value and good process.
Great space and location. This unit feels slightly bigger than similar units. The bdrm has a queen and bunks which was perfect for us. Would recommend this space
Nice Place. Right on the hill. Clean.  Good host.
Nice location
Chrisâ€™ place was clean, homie, and perfect for a short or long term stay. Would definitely recommend to anyone in need of a place to stay in Fernie

We really enjoyed our stay! It was a great unit and a very convenient location. There was lots of space in the unit and there was a beautiful view to wake up to everyday! Communication with the owner was excellent.

reviews.comment: Everything you need!  The bed was super comfy and the view was great!!
Very nice room and would stay again:)

There is an adjoining door to the living room of the next door rental.  Which means if their up late so are you.   Room was hot 24 C had to open the hall way door while sleeping to try and cool the place down.
Great communication with the host, and had no troubles getting in once we could find the place. Overall a decent experience, just a bit overpriced for what you get.
Great location and value. Common door was just as advertised.
Great value and location. Very functional space and I would definitely stay here again.
Great place for our retreat by Fernie Mountain, would stay again!

Nice, clean hotel style room, with the usual amenities plus microwave and fridge. The complex is very nice, and the folks there real helpful. It has a nice hot spa out front and is very close to the mountain. Shuttle busses can take you into town from right out front. My only complaint was it is the master bedroom of the adjoining suite with a separate entrance. Their is absolutely no sound proofing. In the door which is locked  and You can hear every word people are saying next  door. Luckily it was empty all week but on Friday some guys checked in. They werenâ€™t particularly noisy or rowdy, just three guys coming back In the evening talking in conversational levels. I couldnâ€™t sleep for two hours until theyâ€™ve retired for the night . I would be sure you check that the suite next door is vacant if you want just the bedroom.

Everything was great for our stay! The bed was super comfy, looked exactly as the pictures described, easy to find with clear instructions, host was very responsive and clear, couldn't have been better! We found plates, cutlery, and cups under our sink, which was a nice touch, I might clarify with the host that they have those stocked as we were informed there were just a few cups. Coffee maker was nice, coffee and filters would be nice though. Walls are a little thin, however they have a quiet time policy so we had no problems!
Clean space, comfy bed, exactly how the photos show. Great location, short walk to the lifts. Good for a single or couple for a short stay. Really enjoyed my stay
Clean room with an awesome view, great walking trails around. Awesome host!!
Perfect place if you plan on skiing or biking at fernie resort
Clean and cozy room! The bed was amazing after some big hiking days!

My wife and I were passing through Fernie and we needed a place to rest our heads for a few nights after some long days spent outside. Chris was quick to answer and he got everything lined up within 15 minutes. The bed is very comfy, the room is clean, and the location works perfectly as a hub for any activities you want to experience in the Fernie area.
Great place with easy access. Comfort bed. Would definitely stay again.
TrÃ¨s bien situÃ©!
The room is as advertised, very clean and comfortable.

We had a great first weekend in Fernie staying in this room. We really appreciated the mini fridge and cutlery that was provided in the room, it allowed us to make some of our meals rather than eating out which cut down on the overall cost of the weekend. The room was very easy to find and both check in and check out were simple and we had no issues! Chris's explanations were very thorough and easy to understand. We will be returning!
Place is very clean and would recommend for anyone to stay

The place was ok. Air circulation was poor in the room and there was no place to step out ie balcony etc. The place had a cooped up feeling to it. Water pressure in the shower was poor and erratic for hot and cold. TV was very basic and no coffee or tea provided. So it was a very average experience, nothing bad but not great either.
Great location if you are looking to be on/near the hill. Close to town.
A fabulous room located walking distance from the ski hill. Great value! Very tidy and clean.
Nice, clean and cozy place to stay. Would definitely recommend it!
Nice place, just missed not having deck access, and elevators.
Nice and quiet. Very comfy bed. Fernie is fantastic for flyfishing, mountain biking, and hiking. Will definitely stay here again.
Nice place! Great for a few days, everything is as described on the listing.
The room is good and the host is accommodating.  Bring your earplugs because their is little to no sound dampening between the neighbouring unit.
Good space for a short stay at Fernie Alpine Resort. The apartment is a bit dated but everything works as expected.
Very clean and sunny. Top floor walk up at the end of a long hallway makes it a bit of slog to get to. Enjoyed to though.
very accommodating and easy check in. will be staying again if we return to the hill!
Super clean and really close to the hill.

Nice place! Will mention it to others. Chris was really prompt on communication.
Be aware though - noise does travel through the adjoining room.
Great place overall. Chris answered all my questions in a timely manner. Only issue is that noise carries into the apartment from the attached suite. Overall I would stay here again.

Great location - ski in and out. Chris was accommodating and had very quick responses. Itâ€™s too bad hot tubs etc are closed right now. And as others suggested, you can expect noise through the walls.
Nice room and comfortable bed.

Perfect for what we needed.  Quiet, cozy & relaxing. It is a bit toasty, but Chris took care of that by having a fan on hand. Bed was super comfy. View from the room was beautiful. Never stayed in a lock off before so didnâ€™t quite know what we were getting into, but 10/10 would stay here again! Thanks Chris!
If your looking for a place in a great location, with amazing prices, and an amazing host. Look no further. Ill be booking here again for my next stay!

Chris is amazing
Great location
Great stay
Very good location, host was very nice and great communication to make our stay amazing.

reviews.comment: Clean and stylish, check in was super easy. Would stay here again
Great space and location. Quick response to questions and requests.  Overall a great spot in Fernie.  Building has lots of amenities.  Overall a great stay!
Very clean and a great place to stay!

A great little place in Fernie with everything you could need. Well stocked kitchenette, underground parking, bbq on the deck. Small and cozy bachelor layout unit but perfect for a couples trip and you get more space and amenities than a typical hotel room.

We thought that this was a great place to stay and advertisement was accurate. In fact the rental space exceeded our expectations.  We would definitely stay here again and would recommend Bob's rental space to anyone considering I stay in Fernie
Great amenities, close to ski hill and downtown!

Lovely studio apartment with enough space for two people and their ski belongings. All appliances were fine. It was nice to have 2 chairs to sit in to watch TV as well as the two chairs at the eating table. The bed was comfy.  Loved the access to the hot tub. The SaveOn grocery store was just under 2km away and so a walkable distance-as was the main downtown area of Fernie. We would stay again.

Nice place to stay
Great location, close to town and ski hill.  Clean and comfortable room.
We had a wonderful stay in Fernie. This studio is just a few minutes from downtown with wonderful views of the mountains. It's a perfect spot for relaxing after spending your day adventuring.
Amazing Place! Stayed here for over a month and had everything we needed. Perfect location (between the town centre & the alpine resort). Host is very responsive. Would definitely recommend!
Good quaint apartment right off the main drag, exactly what I needed for 2 nights
We had a great stay! Will stay here again for sure!
It was a good weekend away! Nice little place!
Very nice little place. Was perfect for my husband and I
Spent a month working remotely and snowboarding. Wifi was perfect for remote work, walking distance to town, and an easy commute to the hill! Would recommend and stay again.
Good for two and host was very responsive.
Great location with all the comforts of home.

a great location with easy access to everything Fernie has to offer. 
I would consider staying here again.

Great, self-contained suite in Fernie, ideal for short or longer stays. The well-stocked kitchen has everything you need to prepare proper meals, and the bed is comfy. Communication with Bob was quick and easy. Highly recommended!
Excellent, clean and well appointed place to stay in Fernie. Great alternative to a Hotel.
Nice, spacious condo with great amenities and easy check in/out. About 15 minutes walk to downtown  Would recommend for a summer visit or a ski weekend.

Accurately as advertise. Space in this  2 bedroom seems to be bigger than most. 
Convenient, tidy and safe. I would recommend.
Very convenient place and great facilities with gym, swimming pool, outside hot tub and ski locker.
Great pace, had a good time!
Super close to the Mt, clean and comfy beds
We used the place for skiing and enjoyed our stay...great steam room!
Good host. Clean unit with comfy beds. Spacious and had everything we needed.

Great apartment,  located in a comfortable place. Clean.
Mark answered our emails right away. 
Will definitely rent it again.
Great condo. Much larger space than can be found on the hill. Had a couple of minor issues that Mark was quick to respond to. Would definitely return.
Very clean and large rooms. Underground parking is convenient.
Second time we stay at this apartment.  It suit all our needs.
all good
Great communication.  Easy to book

Place was sparkling clean, and in a good location. Mark was quick to respond each time, and kept us informed before arrival, and sent checkout list prior to vacating. Place was pretty quiet at night as well!

We enjoyed our stay at Silver Rock Condos. The place was very clean and the location is great and accessible. The secure underground parking was a plus where we felt comfortable storing our bikes. Other than a few very minor things, this place was great, and we would book there again!
Nice, quiet, clean condo. Was comfortable and accessible. Spacious. Right on the highway (easy to access, but not noisy)
Great place ! Great location
Great place.  Good price.  Too bad pool closed.
Great space and location, very easy check in
It was a great stay
Check in was easy, everything was clean. 3 minutes from the ski hill which was great, and a 10$ can to downtown.
Very quiet and comfortable.
This is a nice unit and a nice building.

This spot is a great location if your coming to explore all that fernie has to offer, mark had very simple and to the point check in instructions. The suite was a good space for two couples with a bathroom for each couple and a great space to sit down and gather for food/drinks, We will come again!
Great place , comfortable and clean . Highly recommended!
Mark was a great host, i have stayed in several of these units and Markâ€™s was one of the more well kept ones.

Stay was quite and was centrally located with easy accessibility to and from downtown. Some basic amenities were not serviced and cleaned property compared to a high price I paid. Overall it was an ok stay.

This 2 bedroom condo quietly sits on the backside of the building away from the noise of the road in front.  The balcony view is of the mountains and trees.
We have no complaints about this Airbnb and everything worked just fine - in fact we enjoyed ourselves so much we added another month to our stay (total 2 months).  
The beds & linens were very comfortable, 2 full washrooms, fully stocked kitchen and supplies, large washing machine & dryer inside the unit, the A/C worked quickly to cool all the rooms, excellent WiFi and 2 large tvâ€™s with full cable, large dining table that also works very well as a work station.  
The underground secured parkade is cool in the summer and has a place for bikes.  The building residents are quiet and respectful.  We would be happy to rebook Markâ€™s unit for our next Fernie visit.  
Highly recommend!

reviews.comment:
A fantastic place for families, close to the ski hill and with all the amenities you could need.  Sparkling clean with a great pool and hot tub.

Communication was friendly, fast and accurate.

Check in was extremely easy.

Aidan dealt with any issues quickly.

We'll be back.

This space was more than we expected for our work related  stay.
 Very clean,cozy and comfortable with all the familiar comforts and more.
  We hope that we would be able to stay here again next time work/pleasure brings us out here again.

Aidanâ€™s place was very comfortable for our family of 4, the beds were comfortable and it was nice to have an equipped kitchen to prepare our meals. Itâ€™s close to town, and trails for hiking and biking are all so accessible!
Worked out great for a week in town.
Nice place easy access to the resort and provincial park
Nice location easy access to resort and provincial park
Great spot that's not too far away from downtown Fernie!

Nice and comfortable apartment for our family of four. 

The apartment was a perfect location for our week of skiing in Fernie. Easy access to the ski resort, heated garage under the building makes it easy to leave in the morning. 

Beds are quite comfortable and we all slept very well. The living room is nice and a good place to relax by the fireplace at the end of the day. The kitchen is a bit small but contains everything needed to cook on site. 

Overall a good place to stay.
Had a great stay with our family in Fernie!
Super nice condo with all the necessities.  Nice outdoor hot tub, small workout room, indoor pool.  Everything worked well along with great location.
Comfortable place to stay for a ski weekend!

We had a very comfortable stay. The bunk beds were perfect for the children and the master room lovely for the adults. It was good to be  able to cook for ourselves. We would like to stay again when next in Fernie.
Aiden's air bnb comfortably accommodated myself and 4 friends. Had everything we needed, and was in a good location in town. Unfortunately we missed out on the hot tub, next time!

We enjoyed our stay at Aidan's place. The location was good - only a short drive to the ski  hill. The apartment was as described, modern and very well equipped. We definitely enjoyed the hot tub after a day of skiing. Check in was easy, which we appreciated due to our late arrival. We would stay again.
Aidan's place was great. Close to the hill and town. The hot tub, pool and steam room were great after a day on the hill! Communication was fantastic.
Bunk beds were a huge hit with our kids. Lots of space for the entire family
Very nice condo in fernie - great host.

Lots of room, easy to access as it's close to end of building and ground floor. Close to downtown so quick to get to restaurants etc with easy highway access. Have stayed here more than once and always satisfied! Aidan is easy to get ahold of if needed.
Great location and super clean.  Aidan was quick to respond and we had an enjoyable stay in Fernie!
Had a great time.  Very clean condo.  Close to downtown and hiking trails.
Aidan was very easy to deal with and his place was exactly as we expected!

We really enjoyed our stay, the condo is ground floor which makes access easy. Clean and comfortable. Aidan was very responsive to our inquiries. Road noise is noticeable on the patio but didn't bother us at all inside the unit. Close to downtown and to many hiking trails. Would stay there again.
Fantastic place to stay. Very conveniently located and incredibly clean. Will definitely stay again!!

We stayed in Fernie, BC for four nights/four days and found this condo excellent.  Located a few minutes walk from an excellent restaurant - Bridge Bistro, and close to hiking trails - even the TransCanada Trail!

Underground parking was a bonus as it snowed the last night.  Neat and clean with good amenities.  Of course the pool/Hot Tub was unavailable, but we knew that going in.
Perfect place for a visit to fernie
Great place to stay
Place was very clean and exactly like pictures! Host was great to deal with

The location is great! Easy to get to the ski hill. This property has easy access to ample underground parking. The space is well appointed and suitable for a family of 4. We would rent from Aidan again. He was very quick to respond to any questions and minor issues.

Great communication! Answered every question I could think of within seconds. Great location, right off highway and 5 Min from ski hill! It was very reassuring for a stay during COVID as the unit was very close to the exterior door. Great COVID rules and policies in place and everyone was following them.
We had a great stay in Fernie, the condo is exactly as described and is kept very clean. Aidan was quick to respond to any questions! Overall had a great experience, and look forward to returning.

A great stay just minutes away from the ski hill!  The bunk bed was a great feature for our two kids (age 5 & 8), as it gave them a private play space.  Parents:  This is the greatest travel hack ever, as the kids keep their mess in the top bunk, leaving the rest of the place (mostly) for the adults to enjoy.

The hosts were very attentive; we had a little incident with the BBQ, but the situation was attended to right away, and we felt 100% assured that we were taken care of.

The open parking in the parkade and the ski lockers were a nice touch.  Also, if you're looking for some great local recommendations for restaurants, cafes, or other entertainment, Aiden's got all the info for you.  We'll definitely stay again next time we're in Fernie!
Great place, affordable for a family to stay. Linens were a little tough, some quirks of the place, overall just what we needed for a quick trip.

reviews.comment: It was a beautiful place deffinatley worth staying there
Great place for a group stay! Clean and comfy.
Great room and Easy to access. Clean and comfortable.

I would recommend Sarah's place it was spacious, clean and a great location. Very well maintained, with great amenities. Great communication and very quick to respond to any questions we may have had. 2 bedrooms and a loft, with a dining area and kitchen; our stay at Sarah's place was very comfortable with teenage kids. Location is great, not too close to town (not that town is busy haha) and very close to mountain biking or the ski hill. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks!
Great view and quiet condo. Sarah was great to communicate with. Weâ€™d stay there again!
We had a great time, the place was comfy and very clean. Very easy to access.
The place is absolutely beautiful. Great location, great views off the balcony and plenty of room for the whole family.

A lovely space close a short drive away from the ski hill. Beds were very comfy and condo was well-supplied with everything we needed for meals. Check-in was a breeze and the underground parking was a nice perk.
Satisfactory for a few days at Fernie.

Great place and good location in Fernie. The place was quite and very clean. The amenities were great for after a day at the mountain. There was tea but coffee was not stocked. No big deal... I will use this place again next time I travel to Fernie.

We had a great stay and would definitely stay here again.  All the information provided in the listing is accurate.  We really liked the location, it was perfect for us.  Sarah was quick to respond to any messages we sent.  We look forward to going back to Fernie.
A lovely, large 2 bd with loft bd and full kitchen. The outdoor hot tub was great after a day of skiing. We liked the large open concept living space with a view of the mountains.
Great place to stay for a ski weekend.  Myself and 5 friends were very comfortable and happy with the place!
Very comfortable place close to Fernie mountain

Stayed here for a week of skiing with four friends. The condo was perfect for our group! It is located within a few minute drive to town and close to Fernie Alpine Resort.

Sarah was very responsive all the way through and made our check-in, stay and check-out seamless. The condo is well equipped with everything you need in the kitchen, bathrooms and bedrooms. The amenities in the building were great as well with an outdoor hot tub and an indoor pool + steam room. There is a small gym area but we did not have a chance to make use of it. Extra towels for the hot tub were also appreciated.  There was parking available for our rental car which made it easy to get to and from Fernie alpine resort.

Overall we had a fantastic stay and would gladly stay here again on our next visit to Fernie!
Very excited to visit again
Very nice and roomy condo in Fernie.

Sarahâ€™s place was well stocked with everything you might need!  Beds and bedding was super comfy.
Large spacious place with great views.
Great place, would recommend
Great for a weekend with multiple couples, Lots of space and lots of beds! Very close to the mountain resort for those winter or summer adventures
Fantastic place to stay
Good location, nice place, well stocked with incidentals

Sarahâ€™s place was very beautiful and very close to town. A quick walk and you are in town with lots of sights to see. Thank you Sarah for letting my Dad and I use your place for our Father/Son trip. 

Steve
Three great sleeping quarters! Super convenient.
Very clean, great location, easy check-in, and beds were comfortable!
Everything was great!
Very nice 3-bedroom (one in a loft) condo.  Easy location. Would stay again for sure!
Lots of room with 2 bedrooms and a loft. Between Fernie resort and the town.
Had a wonderful stay! Great location! Very clean and well equipped. Fast response. The beds were so comfy. Highly recommended! Canâ€™t wait to come back to stay here again soon!
Very nice spot
Sarah's place was spacious, spotless and well stocked. We would stay here again!
Really enjoyed our stay!
Great communication. Very clean and comfortable stay. Would highly recommend.
Sarahâ€™s place was very nice! Lots of room to hang out after the hill and in a great location!
nice
We really enjoyed our stay. Plus Sarah was absolute gem in communication. Would stay again!
Awesome stay!
Such a beautiful house and beautiful host! Definitely would recommend!
A good place to stay
Fantastic host and a great place to stay, very clean and great location to access Fernie!
Great location, easy check in, and rapid responses
Clean and comfortable ! Would stay again!
No surprises with this unit. Easy access to everything, highly recommended
Beautiful Condo. Close to downtown. Sara is a great host.
Great condo! Very clean and spacious. Has everything you need for a great stay. Loved the location close to town and the ski hill. Would definitely stay again.
Great spot. Located between the ski resort and downtown Fernie so you are a short drive from everything you need, although nothing is within walking distance. Definitely would stay with them again.
Sarahâ€™s place is a great location with the perfect amount of space for a small family! We enjoyed the balcony and the BBQ was a great addition.
Great location and value
Very clean, well appointed and extremely comfortable accommodation! Beds are outstanding. Sarah is very prompt with her responses and is happy to help in any way. We will definitely come back!
Great place and super nice and clean.

This place is great! The unit is exactly as described and the location is excellent for access to all the amazing outdoor activities Fernie has to offer. Itâ€™s also just a short bike ride or walk to downtown.

reviews.comment:
Not one to write poor reviews but this was an exceptionally poor experience. The suite itself had not been properly cleaned - I found a dirty pair of underwear in the bed and the host admitted to not having changed the sheets before I had stayed. 

Additionally, I stayed here for a clinical placement during the COVID19 pandemic so after my first week I was recalled by UBC medicine back to Vancouver. I therefore didn't use 3 weeks of my stay and the host ignored the messages asking for a partial refund - as a student in lots of debt I really could use the money and found it really awful that they wouldn't do this, especially since the suite was already poorly cleaned when I had stayed. Just a surprisingly lack of kindness at a time of distress.

As for the suite itself - it's about as nice as a 2 star motel room with a kitchen. Not worth the price.

A great place to stay in Fernie. The space is well furnished and has a full kitchen,  cupboards are above fridge and microwave - not super friendly for smaller individuals.

Caution for travellers sensitive to scented detergents, carpets, animals, etc.
Nicola was a great host and responded quickly when I messaged her.  Her place was clean and had everything I needed. Thanks Nicola
Perfect place for anyone looking for a weekend ski getaway.  Check-in was straightforward and the place in conveniently located between the ski hill and downtown.
Nicholaâ€™s place was clean, comfortable, and near the ski hill and  downtown. We would stay again.
Very convenient place and great facilities with gym, swimming pool, outside hot tub and ski locker.
love the fireplace, very cosy
Great place to stay.
This place was the perfect, cozy home base for a ski weekend in Fernie.

Small and compact.  After 18 mixed  hours of travelling the entry instructions were clear (thank goodness) and everything worked OK.  The crockery cupboard is a little high unless you are a tall American or Scandinavian.  Rubbish on the balcony, no plug for the bathroom sink and some light bulbs missing otherwise a fine 2 weeks.  Comfy bed, clean linen and towels. Clearly not a much loved apartment  but would stay here again under the same circumstances.
Great space! Great location and super clean.
Great place to stay! Very clean and has everything you need

The place was almost exactly as advertised (some pictures maybe of another suite or old but same idea).
Nicola was friendly, very quick to reply and action when required. 
Location is a bit farther from downtown Fernie but the walk isn't too bad (15 min). The place itself had everything I needed. Was nice to have a full kitchen. It has a very hotel like vibe. With Covid the gym and pool were closed but that is another great perk of this location. 
Some minor areas for improvement:
- cleaning is due for a deep clean. Not a big deal but with Covid, it makes you feel a little weary about the stuff you maybe can't see
- there is a slight smell of cigerette smoke in the room.
 Nicola mentioned this was a problem with the building ventilation they are looking into. 
- the dishwasher is excessivly noisy. I turned it off and hand washed dishes instead. Plan to use when you are going out for the day. 

Overall, for the price I paid it was a good value. I would stay again.
Great place to stay in Fernie! Thank you Nicola!
A great apartment. Perfect for a self-sufficient trip. Clean and honest description/photos.  Highly recommend and would stay again.
very hotel esq. qualities not bad though overall would stay again. too bad pool and steam room were closed.. oh well covid.
Great little unit and perfect for a stay whilst working at the Fernie ski resort for the winter. Had all of the things to make life comfortable for a few months.
Fast response and great location

data.name: Lizard Range Chalet With Hot Tub
data.address_address: 43 Rivermount Place, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This two-story Pinnacle Ridge Chalet has everything you could ever want for your mountain town vacation - warm fireplace, open space, and a hot tub. Beautifully designed to help make your stay with friends or family relaxing and exciting, this spacious home is just minutes from Fernie's characteristic downtown, and close to the powdery slopes of Fernie Alpine Resort.

The chalet features an open-concept main room with cathedral ceilings, a master bedroom with a king bed, and two additional guest bedrooms. The dining room is equipped for eight guests, with the opportunity to add two more. Heated slate floors in entrance way, bathrooms and kitchen, a outdoor barbecue, flat screen TVs, and onsite parking for two vehicles. In house laundry facilities are also available for your use.

You will have full private use of the entire home.
You have use of the common outdoor spaces adjacent to the home, on the side and rear of the unit.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The Pinnacle Ridge complex is wonderfully located in a quiet and accessible neighbourhood, nestled between Fernie Alpine Resort, the Elk River, Mt. Fernie Provincial Park and downtown.

Our home is in a quiet residential neighbourhood. Please keep your music low or indoors. QUIET TIME BETWEEN 10PM & 7AM WILL BE STRICTLY ENFORCED. If your group cannot respect this, it is not the right place for you!

Please note that our house is home to a dog when we are in residence and, despite thorough cleaning, may not be appropriate for someone with a severe pet allergy. (Pets are not permitted when renting due to strict strata by-laws.)

Due to space constraints, there are parking restrictions for recreational vehicles: Max. of 20 ft. long in driveway and no parking along laneways. For more information, please inquire prior to booking.

Fernie business license #002151.

reviews.comment: Had a great stay at a great place, would come back!
Nice spot for the weekend, quiet and comfortable!

It was a great place!
Everything was exactly what we were looking for, and the layout of the place was great. We went for walks along the river which was steps from the condo. 
The place had everything you need to make you feel at home. I would definitely recommend staying here and it was nice to relax in the hot tub after a long hike.
Would highly recommend
Nice place. Great location
The place is fantastic! If you need a place in Fernie would definitely recommend!
Thank you for the wonderful stay at your beautiful and cozy place!
Nice place to stay

Tamiâ€™s townhouse is well-equipped and was super clean. Communication was great and prompt. It worked great for our family; comfy beds, downstairs bedrooms for the kids, a lovely great room with an excellent large sectional. There are only 2 lawn chairs, so we were glad we had brought some. Nice quick bike ride into town and a lovely evening walk over to the Elk River behind the townhouse. Fernie was a lot of fun in the summer...lots of great hikes, beaches and things to do. Thanks for a great get away!

We stayed at Lizard Range Chalet in Fernie during the week of August 8th 2020.  The location was great for us - we biked to all the trails and had easy access to the great hiking trails.  The hot tub was a must with all the activity we did.  As well we had 3 couples and the spaciousness of the condo was perfect.  The garage was also a must as a place to store our bikes/golf clubs and inside had plenty of storage for our gear. I highly recommend this place.
Beautiful home, great space, very clean and well cared for. We highly recommend it!
Awesome accommodations!  Loved the layout and the attention to detail with the amenities. Fully stocked kitchen and lots of cleaning gear for a comfortable long stay. Will stay here again!
It is an amazing space that is very clean and spotless. Lots to do in the town and a great place to stay!
Wonderful accomodation! Close to the mountains, close to town, great kitchen and living/dining areas. The hot tub is a plus for sure. Thanks again!

Great space! Close to the main part of town as well fun outdoor activities. We got to cliff jumping, waterfalls, lakes, etc. all within 20-30 minutes. Very well kept and spacious. Would book again for sure!
Will be going back! Absolutely loved it! Very homey and clean!
We really enjoyed our stay, everything went very smoothly. Easy access to ski hill and trails.
Nice place. Overpriced for 2 people but very roomy for large groups. Heat is not central but fireplace helps. King bed very uncomfortable to sleep in, can feel the springs through the mattress.
Was a great place to stay! Perfect for what we needed!

Well cleaned and maintained, super easy check in. We thought the beds were good quality which is very important to us. The kitchen was well-stocked with cookware and dishes. Overall we were happy with our stay and would recommend it to others.
We had a wonderful time at Tami's place! Very clean and organized! Enjoyed the layout of the townhouse with our children and the hot tub was a nice feature.
Wonderful house in a wonderful place! Will be back for sure
Very nice property. Loved the individual room heating. Make sure you bring your mobile devices and cords if you want to watch tv.
Great place too stay
Awesome place to stay, house had everything we needed and more

We spent 2 nights at Tammiâ€™s condo. It is very spacious, tastefully decorated and and spotlessly clean. There were plenty of nice quality linens, toiletries, and kitchen supplies. The open concept kitchen was great for cooking meals. The beds were very comfortable, and we didnâ€™t hear any noise from the neighbouring condo (despite multiple vehicles being parked out front) We really enjoyed the hot tub, and appreciated being able to logon to our Netflix account on the smart TV in the living room. Overall a great stay - we will be back!
Tamiâ€™s place was great! Lots of space, quiet area, and a great location between the town and the hill.
I loved the natural soaps and unscented linens.
Great place. Highly recommend
Our stay with tami was a fantastic experience we hope to have again. Definitely would recommend!

Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

3 bedroom condo, 2 full baths with private hot tub at Fernie Alpine Resort. Great location for both winter and summer activities and a 7 minute drive to downtown Fernie. Many walking and snowshoe trails close by.

Full kitchen, free wifi, parking right out the front door.

Full access to the entire space including gear storage locker and private hot tub on the deck.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

5 minute walk to Fernie Ski Resort and restaurants near by

1 assigned parking spot plus guest parking spaces.

No sports equipment in the unit. Please use storage locker.

For your safety and enjoyment the hot tub maintenance company may access the unit during your stay.
