reviews.comment: Amazing place beautiful views close to nature. very clean and cozy  highly recommend the place has all you need it feel like home away from home
Really nice place to stay
Great location and beautiful condo.
Nice condo with all the necessary amenities within walking distance to the mountain.
Well equipped, clean and cozy atmosphere. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Nice outdoor hot tub and grill. Nice bathrooms, spacious kitchen and living room.
Host is very responsive. Great location, and the accommodation is great and as advertised.
Beautiful place. Very clean, great location, overall outstanding place.
Great spot! Easy access to the hill, close drive to town. The condo has everything you need for a week! Would recommend and would come back!
Great location & lovely place to stay! Communication from Host was excellent as well!

Simply amazing!! Condo was super adorable, clean and cozy. We loved all the thoughtful and homey touches and the condo was stocked with absolutely anything you'd ever need. Beds are comfortable, plenty of really comfy pillows and blanekts, private hot tub, fast responses when communicating with Cheryl, can't say enough good things about our stay at #8. Can't wait to come back!

The beds were very comfortable. The photos are accurate to the listing. The cleaning and maintenance staff need to be more through, however. I spent 2.5 hours cleaning the kitchen and hot tub before being able to settle in. Be prepared to buy your own hand soap for the kitchen, Keurig cups/pods for the Keurig and bring Lysol to wipe down high touch surfaces. Cleaning staff do not wear masks and there are no 24-hour delays between guests. Scented candles were a nice touch and the pillows and beds were very comfortable. BBQ is great. Location is breath taking. A fully stocked kitchen with condiments and essentials throughout. Stairs are quite steep. Be prepared to bring a baby gate if you have younger ones. Main floor bathroom shower is a bit small with no real shelving to put hygiene items on. Heated flooring would be extra nice in the winter for your ski chalet adventures. Cheryl is very prompt with responses. She had the cleaning staff reenter, a hot tub service person service the hot tub and a freezer repair man enter to resolve a freezer issue we had during our 5-night stay. All issues were promptly resolved. We appreciated this. Stay was nice. We wrote a lovely review in their guestbook.
Great place! Loved the location.
Great location, great place!
Cheryl's place was great.  All amenities my small family needed for the few days we visited Fernie.  Very nice quiet area.  Minutes to downtown Fernie.  Short drive to the lake.
Lovey place that was very clean
A perfect gettaway. A very clean and comfortable place to settle into between the hiking, biking and skiing.
Nice quite location , great place to stay

What an outstanding place to stay! Super cozy and comfortable, very clean. The kitchen was very well-stocked and we had more than everything we needed to make our stay great. Host was responsive, friendly, and made our experience completely seamless. Highly recommended and would love to stay here again.
It was lovely. Hot tub was superb.
Great accommodations!
Love this place. Amazing location my family and I love this place its out 3 time staying here and it has become like our second home
A quaint place, perfectly located and well equipped with everything you need for a great stay.  The hot tub is wonderful too.
Great place to stay at Fernie! True ski-in and ski-out with just a short walk. Great covered hot tub, wide space

Everything you need and more! Great location, close to amenities, ski hill and other activities. Home was very clean and had all the extra little touches to really make you feel at home. Cheryl was quick to respond to any questions that we had and was very helpful. Hot tub and bbq really added to our stay. The home was very clean and well laid out. Would without a doubt, stay again!

the place was fantastic! close to the ski hill very comfy and cozy. 
only complaint is there was a maintenance guy that walked in, in the middle of the day to check the hot tub. Had one of us not been sick and stayed back we never would have known but why would a maintenance guy come while there is guests there, could he not have been scheduled while it was empty the next day?

Loved our stay here for a ski weekend! Super clean and had everything we needed, kitchen was fully stocked and plenty of cleaning supplies too. One of the better AirBnbs I've stayed at... Loved the hot tub and BBQ worked great! Be prepared to still drive to the parking lot if you plan to ski... great stay!
Great house for a family! Well located and has everything you need and more. Hot tub is just what you need after a long day of skiing. Owner was helpful and great at communicating. Highly recommend.

This cozy place has everything that you need for your Fernie stay. It's about a 10 minute walk up to the hill (in ski boots and with kids), but then you can ski right back! Hot tub and BBQ are well maintained, home is immaculate, and has everything that you need for your stay! Loved all of the board games, too!
Great location, walking distance from Fernie Alpine Resort! Cozy home with all the amenities you could ever need!

A great location for a ski trip we enjoyed the nicely furnished space with awesome balcony hot tub with everything we needed. (including a shot-ski!) 

Would love to stay here again.

We enjoyed our stay at #8. Spacious, comfortable furniture and great amenities. Location was good with a short drive to the lifts and the option to ski in. The private hot tub on the deck was perfect after a day of skiing. Would definitely stay again.
The home was in close proximity to the ski hill. Very clean and well furnished.

This place is fantastic, pictures donâ€™t do it justice. More than enough space for three couples, hot tub was full and hot. Cheryl was very helpful with providing all the information we needed ahead of time. Will be staying here next time we go skiing to Fernie!
A wonderful stay at a wonderful place. Smooth everything from arrival to departure. Clean mountain chalet vibe with a hot tub and barbq and well equipped kitchen. The beds were fantastic!!
Please was clean, comfortable and well equipped.  Stairs were a minor challenge for the older people in our group but once in the main floor they were fine.  Hot tub was perfect after a long ski day.
We truly enjoyed our stay.  Thank you

This was a great place to stay with our family of 6. It's a nice quiet location. It is a bit far too walk with skis to the lifts for our youngest child   but there was a great path leading right to the Elk chair. The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen was very well stocked with everything we could need to cook meals!
Nice little cabin on the hill, perfect get away.

Wonderful experience. Cheryl is very quick to respond and to help out if you need anything. Place is quaint and beautiful. Had a home away from home feel. You will definitely have a wonderful time here!

Perfect spot to spend a few days getting away with the family. The condo had everything required for a great stay, with a few bonuses like a hot tub on the deck and lots of streaming options for during downtime. Check in and communication were all seemless, would definitely recommend!

Couldnâ€™t have asked for a better place to stay winter or
Summer
A quaint home in a good location with close proximity to Fernie and the mountains. Has all the necessary facilities, and well maintained property. Hot tub is a nice addition and worth enjoying.

reviews.comment: Great place!

Great place if you are coming to town for an extended stay. We were visiting during COVID-19 so unfortunately the pool, gym and sauna were closed. However, the parkage was fantastic, the hallways and common areas clean. The Unit was great - the photos are very accurate.  The building was extremely quiet!
Great location, beautiful deck with view of mountains. Well stocked kitchen for cooking a meal.  Easy check in and great parking.
This is a great place to stay!  It was very clean, easy to access and quiet.  The bed was so comfortable!  I would totally book here again.

Really nice place with a good view. Supplied tea, coffee, salt, pepper, cooking oil and some pots/pans. 

Everything was fresh and clean and the patio was very nice.
Great spot to stay for value and easy to find.  Christopher was quick to respond
Accommodation was clean and well presented with good amenities and close to both town and ski fields.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice amenities, good kitchen for cooking meals, comfy bed. Plenty of linens.

Really good value for the money. Close to the ski hill which is why we were in Fernie. Very comfortable bed in a quiet building. The kitchen was handy to make some food so we didnâ€™t have to eat every meal out. Christopher used the app to check in with us and make sure everything was going smoothly. He checked in more than once. 
I would recommend this as a quality place to stay and can definitely see myself coming back.

The unit is quite comformtable and quiet, however the it needs a few things to properly accommodate longer stays ie: place matts, larger selection of dishes and newer pots and pans etc etc. The building itself could use some fixing as it is a little run down but overall a decent place to stay and fairly good value for the cost.
Very happy with everything , highly recommending to everyone . Alena & Vladimir   Slovakia

Christopher's place was spacious and comfortable for a studio. It was well appointed with everything we needed for cooking. The bed was comfortable and the balcony was a great place to sit out on. The building was quiet and in a good location. Christopher was quick to respond. We would definitely stay again.

Excellent place! Tub is glorious. Great for a couple. Patio is in the shade which is beautiful. AC was awesome. The kitchen equipment was perfect- had everything we needed to cook. Dishwasher worked good. Bed was comfy. Get this one!
Very nice and a great location!
Great location, awesome building. Easy access to everything Fernie has to offer. Would definitely book again.
Quiet clean location. Great host who responded quickly to messages.
Beautiful condo in a stylish buidling. Christopher was very responsive and was very kind to arrange for me to get back my water bottle I forgot on my way back through!
Excellent location. Excellent parking. Comfortable bed. Sparkling clean. Room temperature was perfect as air conditioning works well. Balcony is outstanding with an excellent barbecue.

Very modern and spacious apartment with all amenities for a great getaway. Walking distance to great food spots. Check-in was a seamless lockbox system, comes with underground parking access. Wish we could have used the pool but itâ€™s closed to Covid unfortunately.
Wonderful place to stay! House already prepped with basically any dish you might need and even some seasoning and tea. Very clean and a lovely place to stay.
Awesome stay!
beautiful place
Very clean and the fully stocked kitchen had everything we needed to have all of our meals. Underground parking is very handy. Would definitely stay at this room or building again.
cozy and stylish.. host is super accommodating.

Very cute cosy place! Christopher was quick to answer any questions that I had and check in was very easy! 

Thanks so much Christopher!
Great space for couples, and really close to the ski hill. Chris was easy to deal with and everything went smoothly.
nice clean and private hotel room

This condo was super clean, with lots of amenities (didnâ€™t have to worry about running out of soap, towels, Kleenex, etc). The resort gave it an awesome mountain feel. Close to a great patio/bistro (about a 10 min walk). Chris was a great host (with quick responses) - definitely would return back here!

Great location...great parking...great amenities and everything you need to make your stay comfortable.

Gayle and Ernie, Parkland County, AB.
Great location in West Fernie. Clean, well kept condo. Chris was great with all communication.

Thank you so much for such wonderful accommodation in Fernie. Such a beautiful design and layout in this condo. The kitchen was very well equipped for cooking and the location was perfect, very comfortable, clean and quiet. So nice to have a balcony. The hosts were so kind and accommodating to all of our needs. Highly recommend!
Excellent! Quiet private balcony was the best
Great location and amenities
A stylish, bright condo, that is exceptionally well-cared for.  Quick responses from Chris, easy check-in and check-out, and great amenities.
Fantastic place to stay! Very clean and the host was very friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend to anyone.
Quiet, comfortable and balcony  (with barbecue) provided a wonderful place to enjoy the view and  morning coffee.

I highly recommend this place! We felt at home , just their one night, but enough to get refreshed before the next destination! We literally requested it while outside the front door and the quick and easy response had us inside in less than 10 minutes!

Host was excellent and very quick to respond especially when we locked ourselves out. 
I would recommend highly.
clean, convenient, outfitted with everything you need to cook for yourself and relax in comfort.

Christopher provided great details for the accommodation. The place was super clean and was perfect place for us to crash after a day of hiking. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a hardy breakfast! Great host!

Chris is a great host. Very responsive and has a very nice place for a short stay. His unit is very clean, great location and is very quiet. I would definite stay here again and would recommend it to others.
Great location, space and host. Smaller space, but has everything you need. Clean comfortable and convenient.  Underground parking is an extra bonus.
Thanks for everything Chris!
This is an excellent choice if spending one night or a week in beautiful Fernie BC.
Christopher is a great host! He responds very quickly and the place is exactly as advertised and in a great location!
Very nice place to stay. Great location. Very clean. Bed was very comfortable.
Really nice place and very clean!!!
Nice clean place
Very clean and easy check in!
This condo is between town and the mountain in a great location.  The place was extremely clean and comfortable.  Host was quick with responses to any questions.
Great little space, perfect for two people. The place was clean and has everything you need. Would stay here again.
A lot of space for two people, well-equipped condo in a good location. Host is helpful and quick to respond.
excellent stay good host
Great clean place. Relaxing outdoor hot tub in the building. Quiet and in a good location. Had a great time
Very clean and quiet. Underground heated parking. Decent cable. Decent little workout area plus pool and hot tub. Will definitely stay again!

Other than the Super 8 or Timber Landing, there no place closer to the hill.  It was nice to have a heated garage with elevator straight to floor!  Has a full kitchen, too.  It feels like a nice hotel room, bed in front of the TV (no spare sitting area or separate bedroom).  Super clean, great bed and pillows - something hard to find with Airbnb!  This was a bit of a splurge for us, but worth it!  Chris was one of the best hosts we've ever had - organized and quick to communicate.
Great place with good location. The underground heated parking was awesome, just hop in and go. Would stay again.
This place is perfect for people looking for a kitchenette. Itâ€™s only 4 mins from the hill. I highly recommend it !
The bed was really comfortable :)  A/C was a godsend!!! No armchair/lounge chair though.
Christopher's place is a perfect base to both ski and to explore Fernie.
Excellent location and very clean and easy. Would recommend this place to anyone staying in Fernie.
Great to deal with !  Small bathroom,very warm room,quiet for sleeping.
Really cozy space with a comfy bed and nice kitchen! Make sure to bring any cooking supplies like oil, etc. as this place only has the basics like pots and pans.
Awesome loft unit!

We booked this suite because it met all the requirements we were looking for travelling with a 15 month old.  The space was more than enough, and having a kitchen area really helped as well. The place was super clean and cozy. the location is close to all the restaurants and local businesses. Check in was easy, and Chris was quick in responding to any questions we had.  We also liked that there was an underground parking especially in the winter months. we would stay here again.
Quick drive to down town. Underground parking and amenities were nice to have.
Great place, located 2 minutes from town. Amenities allow for a relaxing evening after a long day. Friendly neighbours!
Great place, clean and tidy
Great place to stay in Fernie! Canâ€™t beat a super comfy bed with a beautiful view
Awesome place, great host!
Christopherâ€™s place is in a great location: half way between the ski hill and downtown. The space is a comfortable studio with vaulted ceilings. Communication and check in were nicely streamlined.
Super comfy bed and very clean.

A really nice place to stay. Clean and good for a couple. We easily walked downtown and back to enjoy the restaurants and shops. 

The suite is on the back side away from the highway and really quiet. The pool, steam room and hot tub areas were better than the photos. 

I would definitely stay here again.
Very nice accommodations and well located.

Outstanding accommodation. It was perfect for our holiday to Fernie. The apartment is modern, spacious and absolutely spotless. The location is excellent for both the town and the ski resort. Christopher was so easy to deal with - top man.
Great place to stay. Very clean, great amenities, and near city centre. Check in and out was fast and easy.

Christopher's Place is like a little home away from home! The building is beautiful and a quick drive or nice bike to downtown. Accessing the lockbox was simple with the very clear instructions that are provided by Christopher everything was a breeze. The building is clean and when we walked into the room it was spotless! There was a perfect little kitchenette, sleeping area, two seat table and a beautiful deck on the opposite side away from the noise of the highway. A loft just as described, no separate rooms other than the bathroom. The kitchen had everything we needed to make simple meals, full size fridge and dishwasher if needed. The bed was very comfortable with clean bedding. Bathroom has a shower/ tub and was very clean with extra towels. Christopher provided very clear instructions on house rules and check in/ check out procedures. The underground parking was an excellent bonus. The pool was very cold! so we just stuck to the hot tub, both older but nice feature to have. Would recommend Christopher's Place to anyone looking to stay in Fernie BC for any kind of get away. Hiking, biking, skiing or just relaxing. We hope to stay there again in the future!
Very nice place

Great place to stay in Fernie. Check in was super easy and honestly felt just like staying at a hotel. Very reasonable check out requirements and nice alternative to staying at an expensive lodge in the area.
Christopherâ€™s place offered a clean and comfy stay for the two of us. Our stay was great and we highly recommend this place for anyone staying in the fernie area.

We stayed for only one night but wish we could have stayed for more to enjoy the building and all of the great amenities included. The private porch is so serene and lovely for an early morning coffee before starting your day. Check in and check out is an absolute breeze and the place is spotless. Communication with Christopher was incredible. 

Underground parking is fantastic - especially if you do a little wine or distillery visiting and want to keep the boxes in your trunk. Very quiet building! 

Thank you again for having us! We would definitely stay again.

This place was such a great location! Very close to downtown Fernie, and the ski hill. The house was very clean and tidy. Exactly how it looks in the pictures!! We have an amazing stay over the weekend, and are very thankful for the opportunity to stay here! Christopher made this experience very easy and safe! Thank you again!

This is a very clean and well located place, Chris was really communicative and quick responsive.
We highly recommend this place.
Great place to stay if skiing in Fernie

I had an extended stay here due to work. The suite is lovely with everything needed to cook and be comfortable - there's even a gas BBQ on the deck. For folks who ski, there are lockers in the secure underground parking. When I had difficulty with the TV the owner fixed it quickly. This is a great AirBnb!
Awesome stay
A very nice place to stay, especially for a couple or a single person. Christopherâ€™s place is open, airy, and super comfortable. A great place to relax and unwind after a long day!
Great place, kind host and super close to Downtown Fernie! would definitely recommend it.
A great place to stay!
as advertised

Great location with easy access to lots of hikes and downtown. The condo was extremely clean and exceeded our expectations. Christopher was a great host and his communication made the entire trip seamless. Will definitely book again!
Great spot to stay in Fernie!
We only stayed one night but it was nicely located between the bike park and downtown, as advertised.
This is the place to stay when you are in Fernie! The location was perfect and Christopher was always fast to respond and very accommodating. Will definitely return!

data.name: Penthouse King Suite @ Silver Rock Condos
data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

The vaulted ceiling in this penthouse king suite at Silver Rock gives a spacious feel and great views of the Ski Hill and Elk River. Full Kitchen and Bathroom, living room, dining area and a deck with Natural Gas BBQ make this the perfect pad to perch for your perfect trip to Fernie!

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Vaulted ceilings with high windows make these top floor penthouse units extra bright and spacious. Enjoy the King Bed in private bedroom and all the hotel amenities of Silver Rock.

Full access to all of the building amenities including Hot Tub, Sauna, Steam Room and indoor pool. Park Underground or out in front of the building.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

City of Fernie Business License: #002295

reviews.comment: Nous avons adorÃ© notre sÃ©jour, appartement confortable et trÃ¨s bien situÃ©.
Over all a good experience
great

Markâ€™s place offers an amazing view inside and outside the suite. Canâ€™t beat the location, so close to amazing hikes, waterfalls and downtown Fernie. Mark is quick at replying, and super helpful. Would 100% recommend this place. Hope to visit again sometime. Thanks Mark!

Great place to stay in a central location in Fernie! The place was very clean & comfortable. It had all the amenities we needed. The building was nice & it was very quiet during our stay. Mark did a great job stocking the place with everything we needed. The washer & dryer were definitely an extra perk! The views of the mountains from the deck were amazing :) 
Thanks for a great stay Mark!

Great condo, nice to be able to cook sometimes as well, though lots of great restaurants nearby (Blue Toque - use their online wait list, Big Bang Bagels, Happy Cow, food trucks, etc). Nice easy hike is across the highway on MacDonald at the end of Hesketh St that goes along the river and into town. Also great hikes up to Island Lodge (old growth forest trail and lake trails) with a great outdoor patio for lunch at the top in the lodge. Be aware that all condo amenities were closed (pool, fitness, outdoor hot tub, sauna and steam room). Fireplace in the living room does work though. There are 3 luggage trolleys in the lobby by the lockboxes to use when you arrive and depart. Patio has a great mountain view (noisy - bring headphones with you) - there are Highway sounds for any light sleepers - bring a noise machine with you. Construction on bridges at Fernie and Crowsnest Pass go until Fall 2020 which make weekend traffic very slow on Highway 3 (allow an extra hour from Crowsnest to the Condo) - youâ€™ll see it on google maps with wait times listed. Fernie Brewery has a great patio just outside town - bring takeout food with you as they donâ€™t have a kitchen but they allow outside foods. Fernie Distillers has great in-house cocktails.
Great place
Nice place very clean. Good view
Great location for skiing and downtown fun.
Great place with amazing views and amenities. Close to town and mountain.

Mark was a really great host! We were able to check in an hour earlier than expected because we had arrived in Fernie early! We also had everything we needed in the unit. 
Thank you! If we come back to town we will make sure to check back at Silver Rock.
Great stay. Convenient location.
Amazing mountain view! Communication was great and we had a very smooth check in! Good location. We highly recommend you try the food truck across the road! We would stay at Marks place again.

Markâ€™s place was bright, clean, and so very comfortable - exactly as described. The wall of windows is especially welcoming and the bed was super comfortable. Great kitchen with the basics covered. The building was clean and felt very safe amid the coronavirus pandemic. Check in and out was extremely simply and Mark responded to my questions swiftly and clearly. We did not use the pool or hot tub (because of covid-19) so I canâ€™t speak to those amenities. We will definitely return to Marks place! Thank you, Mark!
Excellent location, plenty of room, couldn't have been happier with our getaway to Fernie! We will be back.
Great condo, close to everything, clean and very well kept.
Marks place was great, as portrayed in the photos. Quick responses and great building, atmosphere. Would stay again.
Great place!
Great place for me and my family to stay in fernie. Exceeded our expectations. Thanks for your hospitality.
Great location - handy to everything.  Suite is well appointed with essential amenities. Bed was comfy!

A great spot for being super close to Fernie downtown. Itâ€™s a clean unit and has a full kitchen which is great if you want to cook and store some food in the fridge. A nice touch is the underground parking stall! It had plenty of space for just the two of us.
Mark's place is super clean, nice and it's amazingly located. He's friendly, helpful and replies super fast. We had a great stayed and we'd stay again :)
The place was very clean and comfortable with a great location to access all of the sights and attractions in the area.
Mark was a great host, communication was clear and his condo is very centrally located, which made exploring Fernie very accessible. We will be back :)

We were unexpectedly in Fernie and needed a place to stay quickly. We booked and within 30minutes had all of our info needed to check in. Super easy process Mark was really nice. Clean place with anything you could ever need for a comfy stay. Would stay again and recommend to family and friends!
Great location
Would recommend to anyone.
A great option for a 1-bedroom condo in Fernie. The in-suite washer and dryer are a nice touch for longer stays.
Good location, easy communication, clean place. Would stay again!
Great place to stay!
Mark was easy to work with, quick and easy access. Clean and well maintained place and no clutter.
Really nice space, great views, very quiet building.
Great condo in a perfect location! Only from mins from the hill and all the shops and restaurants in Fernie.
The place was very nice for me to stay as a single person using the space. Would recommend to other singles or couples traveling.
Its a great, clean place. Simple and exactly what Mark said it would be. Mark was instant at his communication for any questions we had. Thanks for allowing us to stay :)

My boyfriend and I stayed here for two nights. The condo is conveniently located close to Fernie resort and close to downtown. The amenities weren't open due to Covid restrictions, but we had a great stay. The place was extremely clean and the bed was super comfortable. Mark was also VERY responsive and helpful. Thanks for your hospitality Mark!
Unit has everything you need and more! Very comfortable bed, napped every day to verify!! Amazing views sunset and sunrise. Very quiet. Perfect getaway for us
Very nice condo, with everything you'd need for a short stay. Close to the resort if you are out for a ski trip
Mark was incredibly responsive to any and all inquiries we had. It was really appreciated.
Great place to stay! Nice central location to mountain, downtown and more. Great space and will definitely stay again!
Great experience

The view of Fernie for breakfast is pretty amazing! The condo was nice, clean and I found everything I needed. The indoor parking space was great; I kept my skis and boot in the car so it was easy to get organized in the morning to go to Fernie. The sound proofing in the building must be good because I never heard anything from neighbors. I would book again without hesitation!
Super quick to respond and complete informed check in a d check out instructions.

We had a nice stay at Markâ€™s condo. Mark was extremely responsive and the location is awesome if you plan to ski Fernie or do any local hikes. Downtown was convenient too and underground parking was a bonus!

Great spot! Super convenient to get into town and close to the hill. Good wifi for working from home. Lovely views from the apartment. Very clean and Mark was super helpful and responsive. Highly recommend!
Markâ€™s place was really clean and close to downtown Fernie and the ski resort. Will stay here again!
Great time away! Great location with easy access to everything you need. Thanks Mark!
Very clean place, mark was excellent at communicating everything we needed to know prior to us even getting to the condo.

data.name: Penthouse! Fireplace, hot tub, 2-story view,
data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Enjoy all of Silver Rockâ€™s exceptional amenities, including heated underground parking.

Plus, our updated 4th floor unit (quiet side of the building) offers the best view in the building! Upgraded decor, covered balcony with BBQ, open-concept living/dining space with gas fireplace, 2-story windows, mountain-view bedroom, full bath with deep-soaker tub, fully equipped kitchen, and in-suite washer/dryer.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Features: Gas fireplace, BBQ, in-suite washer/dryer, cable TV, and free Wi-fi.

Kitchen is fully equipped with all you need to enjoy or entertain.

Comfy queen bed, lots of closet space.

Free access to ski/snowboard storage locker in the underground heated parking garage.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The pool, gym, sauna and hot tub are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Our guests can access the building's heated pool, steam room, fitness room, and outdoor hot tub year-round.

You'll also have access to our heated underground parking garage including access to our private ski/snowboard locker.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

City of Fernie Business License: #002072

reviews.comment: Very quick responses! Great location, didnâ€™t end up actually staying on the property this time but I am familiar with the condo building and itâ€™s beautiful and the location is great!
Very comfortable and well appointed unit and facility.
Absolutely loved this property, and the hosts were very responsive.
Great place and value
Very tidy, great view from patio!

We very much enjoyed this condo.  A very comfortable bed and comfortable furniture. We also found the kitchen to be very well equipped, which is an important feature to us. We also appreciated that the unit faces away from the highway.
Great spot for a weekend in Fernie
Fabulous Stay!!!
The place is cozy and has great views . Close to everything .We would definitely stay again
Quick responses and a great place. Location was amazing for riding and check in was a breeze. We would definitely come back!
Sarah & Craig's place was absolutely spotless! Great location, easy communication and effortless check in/out!
Great location, great view.

Easy check-in and check-out process and access to underground parking and ski locker were great! Condo was very clean but standard set up. It worked great for 2 people in 1 bed but would be tight to have more people. Hot tub was outside and communal but was great and we never had an issue with ok many people. Overall, we would definitely stay here again but have stayed in places in the same price range that had extra touches to go the extra mile.
Excellent amenities and lovely condo with mountain views!
Sarah & Craig's place was great! Very clean and lots of little touches to make the stay more comfortable. Would definitely stay again!
Sarah and Craig have a lovely condo and have set it up with lots of extra touches. We only stayed one night, but we couldnt get the WiFi to work.

What an amazing place to stay. We thoroughly enjoyed the condo, with its fantastic views and cool air conditioning. It is a great location to go for long walks along the river, hike one of the many surrounding mountains, or enjoy a dinner on a patio. Weâ€™d recommend!!!
Was an amazing place to stay. Having never been to Fernie it was perfectly located close to the river.  Highly recommend!

This was a great place to start my interior BC tour. Excellent location, beautiful place with all the elements your might need. Nice view from out of the balcony and a very easy check in process. Iâ€™d definitely recommend this stay in Fernie.
Place was very nice, super clean and the check-in process couldn't have been easier.
This was a great location in town and the high windows in the living room are great because of all the natural light they let in.
Great location, and a really nice and modern space . Bed was super comfy and the apartment has all the amenities you could need including a BBQ. Thanks for a great stay!

The space was beautiful and immaculate, by far the nicest AirBnB we had ever stayed in. Sarah and Craig had left a map of the area in the unit which was very helpful, as we did some mountain biking while there and also cycled the gorgeous trails around the town of Fernie. I highly recommend this accommodation.
Very clean & quiet.
Great penthouse condo, with all of the amenities. Great location, close to town and close to great bike trails.

Unit was exactly as describedand had everything we needed. 
Hopefully the cleanliness issues we had with a few kitchen items will be rectified for future guests.

The hot tub and pool area are CLOSED(which I knew going in, it does need to be taken off the description though until further notice. 
It had very little else. Zero condiments, no smart tv, one extra blanket...there just could have been a few things added with ease to make the experience a little more welcoming.
The high ceilings and soaring windows fill the unit with light. The view from the patio is up the mountain. Itâ€™s a beautiful place.
Great place to stay.  Will again if need to come back. Too bad amenities closed.
The accommodation was very clean, convenient to town, extremely quiet and the underground parking was an appreciated bonus! I hope to stay there again!
Booking, checking in and getting settled was a breeze. This place has an awesome location and has all the amenities. You wont be disappointed!
Great place to stay when in the area!
Highly recommend!!! The view from the balcony and the master window is amazing.  You can see the whole ski hill.  Spacious place for 2 and super clean.
We made our reservation in very last minute as we passed through Fernie & we were happy with how easy the check in was. The fireplace was the highlight of our stay here.

Really great place and really well located, Sarah and Craig were amazing to deal with and responded almost immediately which was awesome as I was a bit last minute looking for accomodation.   Was a nice touch to have the fire going for our arrival!
Super clean place and very close to Fernie ski resort.
Nice and quiet building. Close to everything in Fernie.  I would go back.

We loved our extended stay at this adorable apartment. Beautiful views and a quiet building. We enjoyed being close to the ski hill as well as downtown .
We will be back! Thank you!
Great location!

Close to the ski hill, great views from the bedroom. As a heads up, there was pet hair on most fabric surfaces, including dining table chairs, duvet on the bed, and spare blanket in the closet, despite not allowing pets. Not necessarily the hosts fault, however nice to know in case you are allergic. Really appreciated the accommodation for a lower rate for a late check out
Fantastic!
Sarah and Craig are very accommodating, as I had to extend my trip at the last minute and all went smoothly. The place was very clean and spacious, and conveniently located.
Clean and quiet accommodation. Hosts are very nice to book with. Thanks for the stay.
Awesome spot with a great view :)
The place is vey nice and quiet. Everything you need for your stay is there for you. Already booked for my next visit to Fernie.
We had a great stay, location was perfect and the place was very clean with everything you need. We will defenitely come back if we are ever back in Fernie.
First time staying at an Air BnB it was great to have a place to call home while working out of town

We had a great stay and Sarah and Craigâ€™s place is well designed and appointed... nice to have a place with champagne flutes! The location is great, close to downtown and the park and a nice quiet building. We had no issues, check in was smooth and the communication was great, the Covid mask reminder was really appreciated. We will definitely come back as we really enjoyed our time in Fernie, thanks to some of Sarah and Craigâ€™s recommendations. Great hosts!
My stay at the Silver rock is always a pleasant one.  It's close to everything, Quiet and comfortable.

data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfection service included in cleaning fee.

This cozy 2 bedroom condo has upgraded furniture and is located on the ground floor. You will have access to all the building amenities including underground parking and gym. Extra-large HD TV's in the living room and the Master Bedroom. With 24 hour check-in, a well-equipped kitchen and modern furnishings you are sure to enjoy your stay!

reviews.comment: Great location, easy access to the unit, beautiful, clean amenities. We look forward to coming back!!

Fantastic condo.  Very quiet as indicated in the listing.  Kitchen was fully stocked and all appliances were in great shape.  Extra towels in each bathroom were great.  The beds were likely the most comfortable "away from home" beds we have ever slept in.   This little deck fits 4 chairs comfortably.  Will absolutely consider using this condo again in the future.
Great place to stay!
Andrew's place was great. Loved the pool/hot tub and steam room in the building. Just a 5 min drive to the mountain for skiing. Can't wait to come back someday.

We stayed at Andrewâ€™s for a ski vacation and the place was perfect. We were halfway between the town and the ski resort. Nice views out the windows and the best stocked kitchen with cooking equipment that I have seen.
Super clean, everything youâ€™d need from your own home.

Andrew is the perfect communicator.  Quick and fast response to any issues or questions.  Bedroom and bathrooms are spotless clean, love the bed as it is firm.  Thereâ€™s a difference in water pressure in the main bathroom shower.   We had an Indiana Jones kid staying upstairs, the sound proofing of the building could be better. Other than that, our stay was perfect.  Highly recommended.
The place was very clean and had a well stocked kitchen! For the price it was a great place to stay
Beautiful condo in fernie with great homey with an amazing host. Andrew is very quick to respond and makes sure he can accommodate you anyway he can. Definitely stay here if youâ€™re in fernie.
Nice space, well stocked kitchen, and proximity to both the town and ski hill was good.  It was just a 20 minute walk to town which we appreciated.  The communication with Andrew was excellent.

Stayed here for 4 months and was a great place for my stay. Had some minor issues come up but Andrew was easy to communicate with and always responded quickly. I would recommend staying here and I would return in the future!

reviews.comment: This condo was great! check in was super easy, the condo was clean, comfortable and quiet. Had all the stuff needed to cook a meal as well.
Great place for my week there.
Stephenâ€™s place is great. Close to good trails, quiet, well stocked kitchen, and comfy king size bed. We really enjoyed our experience here.
Great place! Lived here for 3 months and we all loved it!
Great place! Clean, easy check in and out. We will be back!

A beautiful spot with all the amenities you could ask for! From the stocked cupboards to the comfy beds, we definitely loved this condo. It was great having underground parking for our truck and having the option of the elevator was appreciated when bringing stuff up.  A quick walk to downtown, if you don't feel like driving, was just what we like. I highly recommend Steve's condo, and will definitely book this again when we are in Fernie.

The condo has everything you need for a long-term stay. It served us well while working in the area, however it was on the high-end of our price range. Probably a better spot for short-term accommodations. The Wi-Fi was quite slow, and we didn't have access to the pool, gym or hot tub while we were there due to COVID. The host did not tell us about this before we booked so were surprised when we arrived. When we asked for a partial refund due to the listed facilities being closed, the host got confrontational and we had to resolve with AirBnB. Overall, the condo was great however I cannot say the same about the host. If you're there short-term and don't anticipate interacting with Stephen much, this should do just fine.
Great condo
Great spot, great host, tons of room, and very clean. Perfect for a family or  for two couples.
Was very pleased with this place! Staying here was very cozy. We loved the fire place! The location is great too, super close to the ski hill! :)

Clean, close to the hill, price is great

great place to stay while in Fernie

Dope pad. Lots of room, great building, clean and modern. Will stay again.

Darryl's nice two bedroom condo was clean, spacious and in a good location. I appreciated his quick communication including remedying a small appliance issue in a very timely manner - it was appreciated.
Our group did have a few frustrations with respect to the house rules listed and the 'building rules' which should have also been listed in the house rules. I encourage all future guests to read the separate link for the Silver Rock as we were surprised to find a $1,000 fine would be given to anyone bringing sporting goods into the building. This meant us having to find bike locks last minute to leave expensive mountain bikes in the parkade overnight. 
There was also some discrepancy with the mask mandate. The day before checking-in we were told of a strictly enforced mask mandate that would result in a $200 PER OFFENSE fine to anyone seen in the building without a mask. We complied with this mandate however found that a very limited number of other guests and visitors to the building also wore masks.

data.name: Cozy Riverside Getaway
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

Cozy condo is a short stroll to the river, close to both town and ski hill. Spacious and comfortable, this is perfect getaway for couples, families, and bigger groups. Winter hikes and river strolls are just out your door. Summertime rides on the mountain bike paths and zipline thrills beckon from the slopes . Downtown cafes, shops, and nightlife are a quick 3 minute drive. Beautiful mountain views from the porch for the days you just want to relax. Come to explore...come to rest.

We hope you love this place as much as we do! 1900 sq ft of living space ensures there's room for everyone. There are 2 Bedrooms upstairs, one king bed and one queen, each with an ensuite. The King suite includes a cozy reading nook with a comfy leather chair. The upstairs living area is an open concept where you may cook dinner, dine or simply relax, all while being warmed by the gas fireplace. Sliding glass door opens to a spacious porch with table and chairs and a propane grill. Downstairs you will find a bedroom with 2 twin beds and a large living room, equipped with 2 sofas, one of them has a comfortable queen memory foam hideaway bed however bedding is not supplied (which is why it is not listed as an amenity), large flat screen tv and a mini fridge. A bathroom and laundry room are also on this floor.

The whole place is available for you to relax after your day of exploring. A large deck in the back has a table and chairs for you to enjoy breakfast with luscious mountain views to savour with your coffee. Let your little ones play in the giant sandbox while you decompress or grill your dinner.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The beautiful Elk River brings you world-renowned fishing in the warmer weather. There are access points to the river, just a short jaunt from the condo. Across the highway are winding trails through enchanted forests that fairy dreams are made of. A short drive to the ski hill brings you plenty to do in all seasons...ski hill by winter and zipline park by summer!

Our condo is a half flight of stairs up from the parking lot. We have 3 (unassigned) parking spaces and 2 ski/snowboard lockers to store your gear. Town is just a short few minutes drive, with, as is the ski hill and all that it has to offer.

reviews.comment: A nice, comfortable, conveniently located condo with all the basics.
Amazing Stay ! Will stay there again on my next ski trip for sure !
Great location with lots of space. Perfect for families and overall just a great long term stay for us. Definitely would be a great spot for both summer and winter. Close to river, ski hill and town.
This is a great spot for a stay in Fernie, location to trails, provincial Park and ski resort was terrific.  This is our second time in these condos and we will be back to them.

It was perfect!! I give your place 5 stars. Only problem is our stay was not long enough. Lots of room for the kids, able to eat from our own kitchen and great location were some of the highlights ðŸ˜Š

Davids place was beautiful, very clean and conveniently located for a variety of activities. David was quick to respond to all communication and the place was stocked with everything we needed, including a binder with various hiking trails and maps! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Davidâ€™s and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Fernie!
this place is terrific it had everything we wanted it was nice it was clean it was close to town close to the trails you can't go wrong with it.
Great place.
Fabulous place close to town and the ski slopes. So much space to relax and lovely warm fire upstairs to relax by after a day skiing

Very nice space, super comfortable for 4 adults (with privacy) and even 6 people with the pullout couch. 
Super short drive to town or the ski hill. 
As the pictures show, there are stairs to access the property.
David's place was very clean, organized, straight forward and he was very responsive.
Would book again.

Great place to stay. Lots of room and the layout is perfect to rest and entertain.
Location 7 minutes from the hill makes it easy to maximize your stay and time on the hill. Can't wait to visit again.
Great place, great host!
Nice place and ample room for 4 people, great basement area with big TV and comfy couches. The beds were small and very hard, and the back deck faces the highway and gas station.

Nice place , good location

data.name: King Bed Riverside Lock Off
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

This updated king suite includes a cozy reading nook with a comfy leather chair.

This is a "lock off" room from a full condo. It has it's own private exterior entrance.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The beautiful Elk River brings you world-renowned fishing in the warmer weather. There are access points to the river, just a short jaunt from the condo. Across the highway are winding trails through enchanted forests that fairy dreams are made of. A short drive to the ski hill brings you plenty to do in all seasons...ski hill by winter and zipline park by summer!

This room is a half flight of stairs up from the parking lot. There is unassigned parking. Town is just a short few minutes drive, with, as is the ski hill and all that it has to offer.

data.address_address: Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Lock Off Room with private entrance, 24hr checkin, Netflix & wifi.

Come to Fernie and enjoy all of the local perks at your front door. Only minutes from the ski hill, bike trails and fishing access, with a ski shuttle service in the winter months. This renovated ground floor lock off suite is located right on the Elk River, and across the road from the Mount Fernie Provincial Park. A mini fridge, tea and coffee are provided, as well as a Private entrance.

Business license #002011

data.name: 1 BR Mountain Retreat | King Sized Bed | Netflix
data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfection service included in cleaning fee.

Private & cozy 1 bedroom condo at Silver Rock. Short distance to the world-renowned Fernie Alpine Resort and a quick walk to the historic downtown and the famous Elk River! Enjoy the full kitchen, king-sized bed, Netflix and balcony equipped with a BBQ. Access to wifi, pool, steam room, hot tub, gym and free underground parking. Sorry, strictly no pets!

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

This condo is equipped with a full kitchen, a king-sized bed, an extra pull-out bed, in-suite laundry, Netflix available for streaming, and a BBQ on a private balcony. The building has various amenities available such as a small gym, an indoor pool & steam room, and an outdoor hot-tub. There is also an underground parkade. Both elevators & stairs are in the building.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

GST is included in the price. The number is available upon request.

City of Fernie Business License: #002114

We stayed in Fernie for a few days of riding bikes in the mountains. The location was fantastic; easy to access trails and close to the downtown area for groceries and restaurants. Bikes are not allowed in the building, so we left ours in the car in the parking garage. It seemed pretty safe. Itâ€™s a town full of expensive bikes. The space is a good size and well stocked. The king sized bed is very soft. The building is pretty warm, so we were glad we had our fan along. It was reasonably quiet for a condo and the suite doesnâ€™t face the highway, which was nice. And in-suite laundry was an awesome benefit. Communication was super quick for any questions we had. Overall we had a great stay and would happily return.
Great stay in fernie. The place was clean and had everything we needed.

The condo is very clean and have all the things we needed.It is also easy to find,location wise.I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

Dave was great at communicating.  I doubt you could find a better value in Fernie.  The unit was comfortable,fully equipped with everything you need, in a central location.  The unit was clean and the bed was very comfortable.  I booked Dave's place as a home base for a 5 day fly fishing adventure with our son - He loved the experience!  I would definitely recommend booking with Dave.  Easy check-in and check-out.  No issues at all.

And if you think you want to go out on the miniature filthy deck forget about it-the a/c dumps itâ€™s exhaust through a giant register right on to the very small deck (again who designed these places?) Also the 2 vents for heating/a/c are right on you when sleeping or sitting in living area (who designed this?) Kitchen had many things missing and appeared to be garage sale mismatched items. Many old and sticky, etc. Bathroom very small. Summary: probably not a do over. And btw I doubt any of the units in this building would be acceptable as it is a very noisy location.

data.name: Self Contained Annex Suite
data.address_address: 1142 10 Avenue, V0B 1M5, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Self Contained, not shared. Cozy one bedroom suite in our house in the Annex, perfect for a couple. Our guests comment how comfortable and private our suite is. We have set up the kitchen for cooking w/Henckel knives, dishwasher etc. Leather couch, Queen bed, thermostat controlled gas fireplace heat, living room, full bath, high speed internet, shared coin-op laundry, walk in closet. During summer it is a nice cool temperature. Walking distance to anywhere in town!

Please read through the entire listing, nothing worse then having a guest show up and the suite is not what they expect:)

A nice quiet apartment in an older house that has been tastefully remodeled, with an Alpine rustic feel, leather couch, thermostat controlled gas fireplace, comfy bed. Perfect for a couple. We like to cook and assume that you do too, so the kitchen, we think, is well equipped, Henckel Knives, decent cookware, dishwasher, etc. Convenient location only two blocks to the Annex park, and Dike walking trails, 20 minute walk to downtown. The unit is set up for a couple only, infants that are not walking, they pretty much live in Mom's arms, are welcome at no extra charge. The gas fireplace is the source of heat and is controlled by a thermostat. The extra charge for an extra guest is $100/night. We do not allow people to sleep on the couch as it does not fit in the washing machine, :). Friday or Saturday stays are a minimum of two nights.

For you Mtn Bikers with expensive bikes we have a lockup, although when I built the closet handlebars were shorter so you may have to remove the front wheel. We also have a bike stand for mechanical work and washing stand with a hose provided.

The suite has its own entrance and access to the shared coin operated laundry room. The suite is set up just for our AirBnb guests. If you are travelling with a companion please list their name when you inquire/book or I will forget. Please tell us a little about yourself and why you are coming to Fernie, we may be able to offer some local advice to enhance your stay. Your reservation must be for the correct number of people you show up with, insurance rules. If you are new to AirBnb, welcome to the sharing community, we have met some great people this way. Each AirBnb is a little different so please read through the entire listing, nothing worse then having a guest show up and the suite is not what they expect. We do require that you are "Verified" by AirBnb with government ID and profile photo to book our suite. We will ask to see your ID at check in.

We have a WiFi Ring Camera outside with 2 way communication if we need to talk to you to assist you in getting in. If you have any troubles please give us a call or text any time of day.

Please show up and have a happy Holiday :)

There is a shared coin operated laundry room and a lockup for bikes, skis, boards, etc. The door uses a 4 digit code for access so no key is needed, the code is changed for each guest for security and is easy to remember. Free parking outside the suite. Please read house rules prior to booking. Friday or Saturday stays are a minimum of two nights. We installed a WiFi Ring Camera outside with 2 way communication if we need to talk to you to assist you in getting in. Please make sure you properly declare and provide the name of your travelling companion. If you show up with more people then you reserved for your extra guest (infants in moms arms exempted) will be denied entry and your reservation will be cancelled without refund. We are not setup to handle more then the stated number of guest. This makes everybody happy and isn't that the point of a Holiday?
With Covid 19 we have enhanced cleaning procedures that take longer to complete, so we rarely can provide early check in or late check out. Please request these as far in advance as possible to allow us to rearrange schedules if we can.

We try to greet guests, socially distanced, when you arrive or the next day if we can otherwise we may give you a call to go through a few things. We can give you local recommendations and tips to make your stay in Fernie memorable.

A short walk to the groomed dyke for X-C skiing or walking. Our favorite restaurant, Yama Goya Sushi - the best sushi in Calgary is in Fernie, is just a few blocks away. The Kodiak Lounge (best price on pints) at the Raging Elk Hostel is also a few blocks away. 20 minute walk to the far side of downtown and other restaurants and bars.

Two blocks to the shuttle bus to the ski hill. 20 minute walk to downtown, 2 blocks to the river dike trail system.

Once you arrive if we are available we can give you a rundown of good restaurants and other amenities you may be interested in. Two grocery stores in town (Save On Foods on 2nd ave downtown and Anne's Independent by Tim Horton's on 9th and Hwy 3).
We live in the house so you will hear activity, but we had insulation blown into the ceiling so you will not hear conversations or our TV, but we do live upstairs so.... Quiet hours start at 9:30 pm, I get up for work at 5 am (ugh) so we are not loud at night and we expect the same from our guests. The suite only has one bed and we do not allow guests to sleep on the couch as it does not fit in the washing machine.
During the winter Friday or Saturday stays are a minimum of two nights.

data.name: King Suite Â· King Bed Large Bachelor Suite
data.address_address: 1142 10 Avenue, V0B 1M5, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Large Bachelor suite with separate entrance, thermostat controlled gas fireplace. Super comfortable King size bed. Comfy space, great for after an active day. It is also nice and cool in the summer, great after a hot day of biking/hiking. Full bath, walk-in closet, high speed internet, shared coin operated laundry. We like to cook so we have the kitchen set up for easy meal prep. The suite is perfect for a couple, please don't ask to bring extra people. 15 - 20 min walk to downtown.

Please read through the entire listing, nothing worse then having a guest show up and the suite is not what they expect.

While the house is no architectural wonder, its a older house with significant reno's. The suite is dedicated and private, set up just for guests. The apartment gets morning sun, if it is out. Walk-in closet, large bath, full kitchen (no dishwasher), shared coin op laundry. Cozy place to be after a hard day of skiing, hiking, biking or relaxing. High Speed internet, TV, separate entrance.

Super comfy King bed. We don't allow sleeping on the other couch as it doesn't fit in the washer. The suite is under our bedrooms and we have found that if there is four people (two couples) the noise can be a bit much for our quiet hours so we limit it to two people (infants are welcome). If you show up with more then 2 people we will either not allow extra people or charge $100/person/night extra.

Please list all guests first names when you book. Infants who are not walking are welcome, they pretty much live in Mom's arms, no extra fee.

Quiet hours start at 9:30 pm, If you don't think you will be able to control yourself noise wise please don't rent from us. The suite is part of our house so you will hear that their are people above, but we had blown in insulation in the floor/ceiling to help with soundproofing, it really limits the sound transmission, but it is not absolute. We take your peaceable enjoyment seriously.

Stays over 7 days may be charged a second cleaning fee, if you are coming for a shift at the coal mine you will be charged $50 for every 7 days. The coal dust is brutal and we need to keep the suite clean for the next guest.

Absolutely NO SMOKING on the property. If you smoke on our property your stay will be cancelled immediately without refund and you will forfeit your full damage deposit to cover excessive cleaning costs and to ensure peaceable enjoyment of future guests.

Please list names of all guests so I won't forget what to call them. If you are new to AirBnb, welcome to the sharing community, however you must be fully "Verified" with government ID and a proper profile photo to book our suite. All guests will be required to show ID and allow us to keep a copy at check in. The copy will be destroyed after checkout.
We have a WiFi Camera outside with 2 way communication if we need to talk to you to assist you in getting in.

Two day Minimum for stay's including Friday or Saturday.

Keyless entry, so no key required. We have a WiFi Camera outside with 2 way communication if we need to talk to you to assist you in getting in.

We live in the house so we are available to give some local tips on restaurants, groceries, etc.

Two blocks to groomed trails for cross country or walking and three blocks to Highway 3, walking distance to restaurants and pubs. A little further to downtown but no cab needed after visiting local watering holes. Our favorite restaurant, Yama Goya Sushi - the best sushi in Calgary is in Fernie, is just a few blocks away. The Kodiak Lounge (best price on pints, great atmosphere) at the Raging Elk Hostel is also a few blocks away. Other nearby restaurants, The Curry Bowl, Fernie Pizza & Pasta, The Smokehouse at Red Tree Lodge.

The shuttle bus stop to the ski hill is only two blocks away. 20 min walk to downtown. 2 blocks to the Elk River walking and X-Country trails.

Once you arrive we can give you a rundown of good restaurants and other amenities you may be interest in. Two grocery stores in town (Save On Foods on 2nd ave and Anne's Independent by Tim Horton's on 9th and Hwy 3). There is no Uber here and only one taxi company.

data.name: Executive One bedroom King Bed - Eatsleepski.com
data.address_address: 1142 10 Avenue, V0B 1M5, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Our large, bright, upstairs part of the house has a log king bed in the master. Renting out for couples. Open concept great room, 40" stainless stove, gas fireplace. Well setup kitchen for great meals. Large deck w/BBQ to enjoy the sunshine if it is out and views to the three sisters. It is an older house that has been tastefully remodeled over the years. It will be a great, comfortable place to create a great meal after a of day of skiing. Downtown is 20 min walk, walking trails are 2 blocks

This house is a divided house and has two other suites downstairs with separate entrances. Since it is a 3 bedroom house it has 2 full baths and a large living room and a nice kitchen and dining area. Due to Covid a 3 bedroom place is not renting well, so we are setting it up (price wise) for a couple or two people with the expectation that only the master bedroom will be used. The other two suites are downstairs and have separate entrances, so you will not be sharing any living space with other guests.

The other two bedrooms will be locked off. Due to this being a multi unit house, we bill it as a quiet house. So at about 10 pm or so tone it down for the consideration of other guests. "Ski hard so you go to sleep."

Parking can be a little tight, so we have two stacked spaces out front. If you need more parking I maintain another 2 spots out back off the alley. Please be respectful of the other guests when it comes to parking. If there are no guests in the other suites will let you know so you can park two cars out front.

We have blown in insulation in the floor so you shouldn't hear the people downstairs but your footsteps will be heard downstairs, So this is a no party house and we have quiet hours from 9:30 pm until 8 am. Again please be respectful of the other guests.
Downstairs is a shared coin operated laundry, this is the only space that is shared.

If you show up with more then the two people booked its an extra $100/person/night. In other words please don't try to pull one over. If you want all 3 bedrooms we have a rate for that. it is cheaper then showing up with extra's.

The upstairs has 3 bedrooms, but only the master will be available with a large bright living room and two baths which will be yours alone, no sharing of the space. The laundry room is downstairs and is shared with the other suites. Parking is tight especially in the winter with the big snow banks. So please do not park on the street as it can affect our neighbors thus disrupting the tranquility of the neighborhood. Additional parking is in the back.

We will usually stop in once you have checked in to give you a little update on the house and little quirks it has. If this is your first time to Fernie we can give you a little run down on what Fernie has to offer.

The Annex area of Fernie is on the west side of town situated between the Highway and the river. Just two blocks away is the river, dike and Annex park. The Dike trail is groomed in the winter and will eventually lead you close to town or to one of the grocery stores. We are only 3 blocks from the highway and there are a number of restaurants with in walking distance. It is a 20 minute walk to downtown and a 8 minute drive to the ski hill.

The shuttle bus stop to the ski hill is 3 blocks away. One of Fernie's grocery store is a short 7 blocks away.

We use locks with codes, so no keys to lose. Three days before your arrival we will send you check in instructions and a simple to remember personalized code.
We have parking in front for two cars, one in the carport and another stacked behind it. There is additional parking in the back. We will let you know if any other additional parking spots in front are available. We do not allow parking on the street as it affects our neighbors, thus disrupting the tranquility of the neighborhood. There is no Hot tub but Airbnb keeps telling people there is.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

data.name: Ghostrider Loft
data.address_address: 6153 Cunliffe Road, V0B 1M5, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This quaint loft exists just outside of Fernie, and features incredible mountain views of nearby Hosmer (Ghostrider) Mountain. With full amenities, enjoy the close proximity to downtown Fernie without compromising sweet solitude. Bring your bikes, and find yourself at the nearby local brewery, before settling in to a comfortable stay beneath a glorious starry night.

Featuring a queen bed, fridge, cooking range, bathroom with shower, soothing fireplace, and beautiful balcony, this space is perfect for you and yours on a weekend getaway. Just outside city limits, this loft is close to the local golf course, grocery stores, and all other necessities while you spent time in the mountains. Fernie Alpine Resort is an 8-minute drive away, and the Elk River trails are easy to access. Lots of parking available, though slightly limited in the winter months due to copious amounts of snow.

This is your private space above garage with separate entrance access from lower garage area.

I live in the main house, but am not always around.
We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

This property is located 1 km outside the City Of Fernie limits on a rural road/ 5 area parcel of land with great 360 degree views of the ski resort and local mountains, especially the iconic Hosmer (Ghostrider) Mountain.

You will require a vehicle to access this property as it is just out of town.

Most amazing location! Beautiful views of the mountain and deck was awesome to have meals and a beer on, also very close to the brewery! 
The bed was pretty uncomfortable and loud, but other than that the place was perfect!
The view is unbelievable.  I also found the living space perfect for my needs.  The bed was not the greatest, but thatâ€™s small potatoes.  Very quiet, nice and peaceful
Gorgeous views both day and night. We enjoyed breakfast on the deck and star gazing.
We visit Fernie 4-5 timeâ€™s a year and stay at Ricks whenever we donâ€™t have the kids along.  Ricks loft is home away from home for us.  Be hard pressed to find a better place to stay in Fernie.

Rick's loft was the perfect little getaway spot with beautiful views. It was nice and quiet with good privacy. The place was clean, had a fully supplied kitchen (you could bake cookies if you wanted), and had a nice atmosphere. We were able to ride our bikes into town in 15 minutes through the back road, which connected to the bike path by the visitors center. I would definitely return for another peaceful stay!
This is a lovely place to stay. Very cozy, clean and the views are beautiful.

LOVED our stay!!  Absolutely beautiful place with incredible views. Minutes from Fernie but just far enough out so the view is mountains instead of town. It truly looks like a scene out of a Hallmark Christmas movie â¤ï¸
It is a loft space but the stairs are INSIDE so snow & ice are not an issue! There is also a small area for shoes at the entrance before you head up.

This Airbnb is a perfect choice for anyone looking for a ski holiday. Its located in a beautiful rural setting with great mountain views. Only 10 minutes from the Fernie ski resort and in close proximity to the town and many great hiking and cross country ski trails. It is a cozy loft with fireplace and a very well equipped kitchen. Rick is an outstanding host and responded immediately and effectively to any questions or concerns. Highly recommend this place and we will be back!!

A cozy rustic loft with 360 degrees of scenic mountain views. The balcony and the gas fireplace enhanced our stay at the loft. The bed was comfortable and the host communicated clearly. I highly recommend this place for your stay in Fernie.
Truly a great place to stay!  Beautiful mountain views, a lovely fireplace and a kitchen with all the necessary essentials.   Great value!

The loft is well equipped and comfortable. The location is great and the property itself is gorgeous - impressive view, large yard, bocce balls etc. We suggest proactively letting Rick know if the loft is untidy or not appearing to have been cleaned (floors, counters, bathroom) etc. and upon checkout it is in your best interest to do a thorough clean to avoid any unexpected cleaning charges atop of the cleaning fee. This property is manged by an agency, however we had the opportunity to meet Rick personally and he is a friendly guy. 

We'd typically give a 5 star rating but our experience at checkout was a bit of a drag.

We still recommend this place and would stay their again.... without our small children.

data.name: Bryant Road Homestead
data.address_address: 6901 Bryant Road, V0B 1M5, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This rural farm home has been newly renovated and is a cozy getaway only 6 minutes from downtown Fernie. Great parking for snowmobile trailers and a wonderful place to unwind after a day or skiing or snowmobiling. A fantastic place for a getaway any season!

Situated at the base of Hosmer Mountain this propertyâ€™s views alone are enough to make you want to never leave! Close to town and ski hill with ample parking, this cozy cottage is the perfect way to spend your holiday

Access to the 2 bedroom home with driveway and backyard

Host is available throughout the day by text, phone or email

This hideaway is in a rural setting. Cows and horses are often seen as well as elk, deer and the odd bear roaming the neighborhood. Quiet and peaceful and you canâ€™t beat the view!

Six minute drive to Fernie. Easy access to bike trails and close proximity to areas for snowmobiling, snowshoeing or cross country skiing. River is within walking distance. Kootenay Taxi does service this area if transportation is needed.

This space is set up for wheelchair access with a ramp at the front deck as well as wide doorways and a bathroom that will accommodate. Please let us know if you will be using the ramp etc so we can ensure proper snow removal.

reviews.comment: Very nice airbnb in a private area!

Thus bungalow is on the east side of Fernie, close to the brewery (a bonus, perhaps), and a five minute drive (West), on the highway to the Fernie tourist and information centre. For us, it was in just the right spot - close enough to wander into town (by car), and far enough away from the business of the town site. Absolutely majestic views of the mountains, that reside in your back garden. Literally every window you look out of, there is something of beauty to see. It's so quiet, I forgot about the insanity of the world around us (yes, I wrote this during covid-19). The bungalow was spotless... Like, remarkably clean - a really welcome sight. Traci answered my questions patiently and promptly (yes, I'm one of those best types with lots of questions), and was friendly throughout. Highly recommend.
A very quite and peaceful place to relax and enjoy the scenery .
The homestead is so lovely! A few mins from town, amazing views, and large space! It was a perfect adventure base and we will be back. Do yourself a favor and stay here

This place is paradise! We stayed for a week and were sad we hadnâ€™t booked longer. The house is in the middle of a large field with 360 views of mountains. The house is well appointed and very clean. Check in was easy and Traci was prompt in replying to our messages. The town of Fernie was unexpected bonus for us. We played golf at the Fernie club, which he highly recommend! Views are stunning. We really enjoyed dinner at Tamarack (at the Island Lake Lodge) and walking to Fairy Creek Falls. We look forward to coming back one day! Thank you Traci ðŸ˜Š

Traci's place is in the perfect location, surrounded by breathtaking views and the accommodations are excellent! I highly recommend staying here if you're visiting Fernie. The house was very clean, comfortable and has all you need. We had a great experience and plan on returning.

Traci is a terrific host who is very thoughtful and helpful. We stayed for two weeks and really enjoyed our time at the farmhouse.  The property is in a great location with beautiful views all around.  Well decorated and comfortable!

Even better than the pictures, instantly felt like home.
Our kids didn't want to leave
Very clean and Traci was incredible, very responsive any time we messaged
Great host and place! Came for the hikes and didnâ€™t expect to have such great views from our window.
Amazing view and so peaceful, had a wonderful stay!
Nice views
Very clean, homey and perfect location

We loved our week long stay at Traci's cozy farmhouse with its stunning mountain views! The house was spotless, private, had a fully equipped kitchen, nice linens, a convenient proximity to Fernie, and mountains to enjoy from every window. We would recommend a stay here!

Traci's home was perfect for three days of hiking.  It was very spacious which the photos don't quite capture.  The beds were comfortable, the entire house very clean and the kitchen had everything we needed.  We would stay there again if back in Fernie.
This is a charming farmhouse which has been tastefully decorated. The beds were really cozy, simple check in and Traci is a very responsive host. Location is great too!
Was nice we would go back

My daughter and I arrived at Traci's Homestead House after a long drive from the coast. We arrived in the dark during a torrential rain storm so we didn't have an appreciation of where we were.  It was such a relief to find ourselves in a clean, spaceous and warm place to call our home over the Thanksgivng week end. In the morning when I opened the curtains what a surprise. The sun was shining on the mountain tops all around us and a row of cattle were standing at the fence, a few feet from the house, curiously looking in on us. When I stepped outside rabbits darted across the yard. We had a wonderful 3 days exploring, hiking, eating out in a very COVID-19 responsible restaurant and cooking our Thanksgiving dinner. Thank you, Traci, for a wonderful experience.
We had a beautiful weekend here. The area is stunning and we spent a lot of time just in the house enjoying the space and the views! Kitchen is well equipped for cooking which we really appreciated.
it's a beautiful country stay.
Good for what you pay

Staying here and have Traci as your host is nothing less then perfection. The reason we keep coming back is due to how well she treats her guests, flexible, kind and quick with replies. 

I can not recommend renting from her more. Well worth the stay, and i hope to come back again soon.

My next trip to bc will
Be with Traci if available. Very clean . Close to ski hill . All around great host .
As always this place is what we needed and is the nicest place on airbnb in fernie all the way to crowsnest pass
A fantastic quiet place close to town.  Nice little touches

Cool little farm house with an amazing view! Lots of space to kick it back and relax. Ample space for parking a trailer right outside the door, makes for amazing loading and unloading of gear and supplies. Thanks Traci!
It's great pleace. It is so clean and very comfortable.
As always this place is top notch

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Bryant home! The setting is beautiful and the house is well-outfitted for a stay during COVID restrictions.  Our host was very responsive and we enjoyed the quiet and privacy we needed.  We look forward to returning here.
Great location, reasonable price, easy check in. House has some issues namely plumbing which should be fixed immediately before anyone else stays there.
A nice house in a beautiful isolated location with mountain views in all directions. Host communicates well and does  a good job managing the place.

Studio unit with well-equipped kitchen and a Queen bed. Sleeps two comfortably. Private balcony with gas BBQ. Fantastic amenities in the building include underground parking.
