The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

reviews.comment: Excellent place to stay place was spotless has everything you need close to row ski hill and I also landed in town early asked if I could check in earlier and they got right back to me and accommodate my timing highly recommend
Nice place, would have loved to have been there for a ski trip rather than work.
Great place and great price
One of the more stylish and cost effective full suite locations in Fernie.

Had a great 2 month stay at Billy's. Great communication! The place had everything I needed. I would highly recomend this place, and would stay here again.
Thanks again G
Great place to stay!  Very quiet, beautiful view of the mountains out on the balcony. Well stocked with all the tools to make a great meal.   I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!
The apartment is as described in the photos. Central location, with easy check in and underground parking is available. The space is cozy but appropriate for our stay. We enjoyed our stay.
Great spot! Close to everything and nice building.
A clean and cozy place in a great location!!
Nice building located within easy access to hikes, restaurants and shops.
Can't wait to come back to Fernie!
Clean, good location. Easy access to everything Fernie has to offer.
The apartment was beautiful!! The kitchenette was extremely useful and check in was a breeze!

Place was tidy and clean, bed was okay! Check-in and out was easy. Bit loud between neighbouring apartments, but only in the morning. Everything worked well. Decently close to town! Billy was very easy to communicate with.
Very nice building.  Pay attention to access information, may not all be in one email.

reviews.comment: Great place!

Great quiet place to relax after a long day at work. A few guys from work also stayed in the building. They all said it was great.  Allot better than a hotel. Thanks billy. Iâ€™ll be in contact next time I need to head that way for work or play. Thanks for everything.
Really enjoyed my stay.
Great place to stay, very clean, quiet, and everything you need
The apartment was clean and well stocked. Billy was quick to answer any questions. Will stay again.
Stayed for nearly an entire month. Place was as advertised and well equipped. Highly recommend.
Very nice accommodations, quiet good location

The condo was bigger than what we could figure out looking at the pictures and we were really surprise by how well itâ€™s located
All was over our expectations

Thanks Billy
Awesome location, really clean and well organized.

Billy's place is great! Bed is so great! Big king, so comfortable and clean. Lots and lots of dishes, pots and pans - you need nothing because it's all there! Place was quiet and clean. I would stay again. Thanks Billy
Clean and in overall good shape.    Good value.
Clean great space and great location Easy in and out
Great place to stop in our way through town
Had a great stay at Billy's place. it was clean , comfortable, and well equipped. Ideal location with easy access underground parking.
Disappointed that we werenâ€™t informed that the pool is currently closed, but otherwise as expected.
Comfortable place to stay the night while driving through the mountains, thanks Billy!
Well-appointed and perfectly located unit! Very comfortable stay and super clean unit. Thank you!

Very clean, well stocked kitchen, great location, and very easy check in. We were disappointed about the pool being closed due to covid which was not made very clear. Had it been open this would have been a perfect stay!

This is definitely the place to stay in Fernie!  If youâ€™re looking for a home away from home, this is it. Everything you need is included in this well kept condo. We canâ€™t wait to return to Fernie for another visit and stay at Billyâ€™s place!
Great location close to everything Fernie has to offer.  Billy is very responsive and great to deal with.
ðŸ‘
This is a great place and had everything we needed to feel at home for a our stay.

fair price, very clean and well appointed. 
if you cook, you will be pleased with the cookware here. Kingsize bed in the bedroom with a hideabed in the living room sofa. the hideabed has memory foam, which makes it comfortable.

Very nice and cozy place. Loved the fireplace after a day snowboarding... Convenient location to go at the resort and downtown. Everything you need is in the apparement to cook. 
Billy is very helpful et super quick to answer any question. Had a great time there
excellent place to stay, convineintly located and clean as a whistle.

Billyâ€™s condo was clean, quiet, and fully equipped. The check in and out process was very straightforward. Billy provided clear and concise information for our arrival and departure. Small touches, like a book book and lovely local soaps, made it feel like home. We will keep this space in mind for future Fernie trips! Thanks Billy!
Great, clean place to stay. Easy check in, highly recommend
A beautiful, fully stocked apartment! Highly recommended!

Billy was great with answering questions and had superb communication throughout our stay! He suggested great restaurants to visit. 
Condo is clean and easy to access. Really good location in Fernie. 
Only suggestion would be is that we would have liked more towels.

Access to all the building amenities including underground parking.

reviews.comment: Great location for what we needed and the place was very nice and clean! Nice decor and great amenities!
Wonderful place to stay. Close to everything you need.
Great stay. clean! great kitchen amenities!
Great spot for a great price. Couch is super comfy and the bathroom is huge! Would definitely stay again. Thanks Nick!
Great communication from the host, easy check in and check out, location was perfect for biking all over the area. Furnace is really loud, bring earplugs for sleeping.
Very clean and well equipped condo in a great location! Loss of one star only due to the fact that the furnace/AC unit was quite loud the entire stay. Would still recommend.
Very much enjoyed the stay at Nick's condo. Quiet and private with mountain view, easy access with minimal 'touch' points. Would definitely stay there again. Had a great week.
Nicks place was clean, close to amenities and he responded quickly to our questions.

What happened during our stay was unfortunate. The unit was listed to have AC but it did not. It happened to be a couple of the hottest days in Fernie and the unit got up to and stayed at around 28 deg C. Not a single bit of sleep happened on the first night. A very loud portable AC unit was dropped off on the second night which helped. 
The unit itself is very nice. I just wouldn't stay here in the summer.
Well stocked kitchen!  Clean!

Great location, less then 5 minutes away from downtown Fernie. Easy to find, easy to come in and out. The unit is a bit enclosed so lacks natural lighting however in the summer it works because it stays cool. 

Place is super clean and spotless. 

Overall, great place for the value.
Nice clean place with a huge bathroom!
We had a fantastic stay. The place is clean and has everything you need for a great vacation. All the rooms are larger than we expected.
Good spot for two people visiting Fernie.
Clean and good location, nice quiet side of the building.
Nick's place is spacious and very clean, equipped with everything you need for longer stays. I would highly recommend it.
canceled due to weather and road conditions, but nick communication was fantastic

Nick's place is top notch and his communication is the best I have every seen from a host. I was in  Fernie fat biking and had the work a bit too; the heated garage felt secure to store my bike and the internet was plenty fast to remote into work.  I loved the fire place and large TV.  This is the ultimate place to stay for an active solo traveler and plenty  big for a couple.  I'll be back and you should consider it too.

Nickâ€™s place was perfect! Much larger than I anticipated. The kitchen is very nice and fully stocked. The bed was extremely comfy, couldnâ€™t have had a better sleep in my own bed! Great location, very clean and comfortable! Would definitely stay here again!
Great condo in silver rock. Quiet and well equipped. Would recommend!
Way bigger than expected, with fantastic amenities and a very helpful host. 10/10 would recommend!
Great place to stay!!
Great stay, comfy bed, very clean! Will definitely stay again.
Great place... we loved the big comfy (firm) bed, the large sectional, the roomy bathroom/ tub, and the beautiful local soaps.
The bed is very firm

The stay at Nickâ€™s place was outstanding. The condo was very clean and in an excellent location. Nick was an excellent host and made the process very simple and quick. Would definitely stay there again!
Clean, spacious spot with all the amenities you need. Comfy bed!
I had an amazing stay! The apartment was cozy and clean, and the kitchen was well stocked (important for me since I was on a work trip). Thanks for a great stay!

reviews.comment: great place to stay. convenient.
Great place to stay. Convenient location to town and hiking trails, etc.
Allison was very accommodating to our late booking. Super helpful in a tough time. Place was great as well.
Great location and place! Thank you Allison!

This place is perfect for a ski trip of 5 people looking for something close to the mountain! There is lots of dishware. The short drive to the mountain was perfect for our group who likes to sleep in

Unit is well located between city and ski resort. Having the pool/spa/sauna at the end of each ski day was quite a treat. The kitchen has more pots/pans and cooking utensils than found in most Airbnb places we have stayed. It made eating in very convenient.

We had a lovely stay at Allison's place in Fernie.   We enjoyed a 4 night stay while skiing in Fernie.  The property was spacious, clean, inviting and had everything we needed for our 4 night stay.   We would definitely look to come back for another visit!!  Thank you so much Allison!
Good place to stay in Fernie. Allison was very quick to respond to the wifi issue we had in our room, and any questions we had before our stay.
A great place to stay in Fernie.
Great place to stay
Very polite host. Great place.
Great place to stay. Allison was quick to respond and allowed us to check in early.
A beautifully furnished property, with easy parking, close to town, and friendly residents.  We enjoyed our short stay st Fernie.
We enjoyed our stay at Allison's place! It was close enough to town and to the mountain. For 4+ people it's definitely worth the price.

Allison is a great host and super responsive. The location of the unit is fantastic, close to the mountain and close to town. Itâ€™s also very clean and well maintained. We had some challenges with the WiFi and the beds werenâ€™t super comfortable but otherwise it was a good stay.

Our stay at Allison's condo was just perfect.  It has everything you could need, and it's location is perfect. Walking distance to the river and downtown was great.  And the air conditioning was fantastic in the +30Â° fernie temps. 
Communication was on point, replies within the hour was great.
Our next trip to Fernie we will absolutely be in touch with Allison.
It is a very nice clean place to stay, 6 adults can easily stay in this place.

This place is a luxury bargain that is well situated for exploring the town of Fernie, and for the independent traveler. 
Great building facilities, great kitchen for cooking and a nice space for hanging out in a group. And good wifi! 
There is wear and tear not shown in photos, and the fireplace wasnâ€™t working. I agree with another reviewer that the cleaning fee is high given that we were asked to take out garbage and put on laundry, but for our purposes, it was a great stay.

Cute place, kids loved the pool. Conveniently located between the town of Fernie and the ski resort, not as close to the ski hill as expected but still a great location. Nice and clean and very comfortable.
Good location, very clean and Allison was a great host who had exceptional communication.
Clean place.  Amenities complete. Accessible. We had a great stay.
Definetly get this place beautiful and quiet
Great spot as it is close to the hill and to town, on a rainy day our family loved the use of the indoor pool.
Super place
Great host loved the amenities and the location! Definitely will come here again when we visit Fernie
Everything went as expected, clean and comfortable

Nice location, easy access to the ski hill and close to all Fernie amenities.  Some upgrades could include added kitchen items, new pull out couch and only had one small screen TV but did have Netflix and In general, is a quiet end unit and we had a nice stay.
Nice clean place and very close to Fernie ski hill. The room fits 3 couples nicely.
Was great
Great place to stay in Fernie!

Good location, clean, close to town. A bit disappointed with the lack of basic ammenities, no tea, coffee, sugar or conditioner provided. I would not recommend staying here if you have children, ten minutes after we arrived the neighbour downstairs knocked on the door and complained we were â€œwalking too loudâ€ and asked us to keep it down. We have a very quiet 4 year old. There were also wires coming out of a hole in the wall in the lounge room. The fireplace also didnâ€™t work. Very overpriced for an average condo. Also was not keen on paying an $80 cleaning fee and being asked to take our own garbage out.

Great place to stay for skiing at Fernie. About 5 min drive to the bottom of the hill. The outdoor hot tub and indoor pool were both great to enjoy after a  day of skiing. Communication with  Allison was quick and easy, as was check-in.
Excellent stay.  The condo was clean, and well furnished. Definitely need a car as itâ€™s midway between the town of Fernie and the ski resort.  Under ground parking was great.
great slope side accommodation.  pool and hot tub an added bonus

the apartment is a great unit and has a lot of room, huge kitchen, and is very close to town  (2 min drive) and the ski hill (5 min drive). The building also has a great outdoor hot tub, that surely is needed after a day on the hills. it gets busy so you may have to wait, but in the mean time there is a great pool right beside it and a steam room. there is parking inside and storage lockers for your skis and boots (bring your lock with you) 

Only reason we gave 4 stars instead of 5, the mattresses are uncomfortable and the place didn't have any salt or oil and it was really hard to find those items on Christmas day to cook our dinner.
Great accommodations!  Very clean and amenities were ðŸ‘ŒðŸ».
This is an amazing unit in a great location. Building has an awesome hot tub and other great amenities. And the checkin/check out is as smooth as could be ðŸ˜Š
Had a great stay.
Quiet, comfortable stay. Communication was excellent. There isnâ€™t any food items other than salt and pepper, so you will have to bring your own coffee, filters, etc. Would recommend to others.
All around great stay

This was a great weekend getaway spot for us! Allisonâ€™s property was right on the edge of town which was amazing for going out for food and hikes!

The property was just as described - nice balcony with a decent view out the back, two big rooms and bathrooms with a pull out couch as well! We had all the cooking utensils/appliances we needed and the amenities in the building were great - we spent a lot of time in the pool and outdoor hot tub!

Allison was quick to reply with all of the information we needed and was very nice :) 

We had a really great time for a really great price! We would definitely come back.

You will enjoy your stay at Allison's place!  The location is simply beautiful, and an easy walk to down-town.  Sip your coffee on the balcony as you gaze up the mountainside!  Allison's housekeeping is excellent- such lovely fluffy white towels!  The kitchen is well equipped for cooking and eating in.   A very cozy place- thank you, Allison!  Do double check with Allison to make sure the pool is actually open when you will be there- we were very disappointed to find it closed due to the pandemic.

This was one of the nicest condos Iâ€™ve ever stayed in. House was sparkling cleaning, Allison was so quick at responding to me! The community was friendly and it felt like home. Definitely recommend staying here! :)

The location is very good. The condo was clean. Thereâ€™s plenty of space and pretty much everything you need for a short or longer stay. Swimming pool is not open. Air conditioner is a little loud and thereâ€™s a train that goes through the town nightly blowing itâ€™s whistle.
Awesome place.
Great stay!
Incredibly clean, neat and tidy place! The location is perfect and nearby everything you need.
Comfortable accommodations, lots of underground parking available, super clean, and beautiful views of the Fernie ski hill.
Very nice place and very seamless communications and check-in!
Good value and very clean. As advertised and host was very prompt on responses, would recommend!

data.name: 1 Queen Lock off,  walking distance to ski hill
data.address_address: 4559 Timberline Crescent, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
1 queen bed Lock off with ensuite bathroom. Walking distance to the ski lifts and ski back to the condo.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The sauna and hot tubs are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

The suite is private with its own entry. There two recliner chairs, a comfy bed and nice bathroom with underfloor heating.

Hot Tub and Sauna available for use (shared) closed due to Covid
Game room - closed due to Covid
Shared Great room lounge - closed due to Covid
BBQS on ground floor for use.
All shared spaces close at 10pm

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Timberline Condos are located at Fernie Alpine Resort. They are a ski-in complex, with a short walk to the lifts.

Fernie's historic downtown is an 8 minute drive. During winter months, you can also use the ski shuttle to town which picks up just a short walk away.

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

The main condo unit is locked off and not accessible. It may have guests and noise does transmit easily between the two units.

reviews.comment: Great location on hill in Fernie.
Nice little place to stay right next to the mountains.
Great location and friendly hosts
Good spot to stay on the hill if you're looking to hit the slopes for a couple days. Karina was great to communicate with and the check-in was smooth.
Small but did the job well! Great value!
The location is perfect! Great room with access to a shuttle for a ride to downtown.
Great place to stay! Just keep in mind the extra fees involved.
It's very close to the cable car. You can walk for five minutes to get there. The outdoor hot spring is very good. It's great to take a bath and take a sauna in a day!
Very comfortable beds close the the mountain.
Amazing little place to stay minutes from the lifts.

Excellent location right on the hill with very nice mattresses.  There was a mini fridge even though a previous review said there wasnâ€™t.  The room was clean and the hot tub was great.  Highly recommend this room.

Great location! 10 minute walk to the lift. Basic but up to date with a  brilliant heated bathroom floor. Big complex with one address so took a few minutes to find our suite in the dark. Check in is easy ,I would stay again.
We enjoyed our stay at Karina's place in Fernie! Check in was easy, and her place was clean. Karina was quick to respond with any questions as well.
Clean and newly renovated. It's the size of a hotel room. No mini fridge and no ice. Enjoyed the hot tub.
Great clean place and a very good location
I would highly recommend for a comfortable, well appointed place to stay walking distance to the ski resort.
This is a clean comfortable room. There is a coffee pot and kettle but no coffee or cups so bring your own. Noise from other rooms could be an issue.
Liked location for hikng and biking in summer. Loved that they had all the cleaning products you would need . Quiet, spacious for one or two. I would  return:)

Karina made awesome accommodations for me being there for work with the extras I asked for. She was quick to respond and the team they have behind them are professional and timely. 5 star and will be back!
Very comfortable bed and easy access and parking. A microwave may make a nice addition.
Nice place
Great location.
This place was really amazing. The view was great, the owner made it super simple in every way, and it was really clean. Would totally recommend for a getaway! :)
Well appointed accommodation in a great location!

Karinaâ€™s place was perfect. It was equipped with all essentials, very clean and much quieter than I had anticipated which was nice. The check in/out was so simple! 
Thanks so much for the stay!
Great place to stay. Karina was quick with communication and the place was very nice and clean!

Absolutely fair pricing, other hotels are charging 250-380 per night and you cannot book less than 3 nights. Heated floors were a good touch and it was completely clean. Looks just like the pictures. Hostess communication was very kind and helpful! Would recommend :)
Clean and cozy stay for your next ski adventure! The heated floors in the entry way were great. We really appreciated the small touches like Epsom salts. It is quite warm inside even in the winter.
Just perfect

Everything you need in a ski place. Perfect size for two people to stay and easy to get up to the ski hill. The chairs are really comfy to relax in after skiing, internet was good for working on the table, and the bed gave a great sleep. Can hear a bit through the connecting door / walls, but neighbours were quiet. Heated floors in the washroom were wonderful. Very easy to coordinate with the host, fast responses.

Great spot for the value. Place was extremely clean and a short walk to the hill. Exactly as pictured and fully private. Sound travelled quite a bit through the units but everyone was respectful of the quiet hours and we didnâ€™t hear anyone overnight. Comfy bed. Bring your own coffee grinds (there is a coffee maker) and cutlery etc if you are planning to make food and bring your own shampoo. Great stay at Fernie and I would recommend!

Very nice room and has some extras such as fridge, microwave, coffee pot and kettle not in the description. 
Can hear people next door and unfortunately we had parties but the host was great with communication to help shut it down. Overall I would definitely stay there again.
As expected, close to ski hill, buildings did a good job with covid signage, one suggestion would be to have a few more sanitizer stations like on way to barbecue
Very nice place very comfy bed I enjoyed it
Great place, super clean, great location
Beautiful place steps away from fernie ski resort! Easy access & great bang for your buck.
Wifi was in and out constantly. Webpage login needed so can't connect any device other than phone or laptop.
great location. easy to contact host.
Great location - about a 5 minute walk up to the ski lifts, super easy, and bars and restaurants right on the hill nearby!
Very clean room, close to the ski hill.
Great communication, clean and comfy bed.
The place was great clean walking distance to the hill and the homeowner or manager was very prompt and her responses.
Great stay, great location, great host and great price! Would definitely recommend!
Good place to stay for a night or two. Had issue with checking but Anne responded promptly and someone was sent to help out with the situation.
A wonderful place with a wonderful setup and atmosphere!

data.name: New mattress! Hotel room, HDTV, Heat Control
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.
Affordable, air conditioned, New HD Smart TV with Netflix (your account)

Basic hotel room with all the basic hotel amenities. Note that this room is located at the top of a decent flight of stairs that can be slippery in the winter. It is also a "lock off" suite. Fully private, but their are guests in the adjoining unit you may hear.

Access to HDTV, Shower, Towels, Iron, Mini Fridge and Hair Dryer. All the basics.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Perfectly located half way between town and the ski hill. 5 minute drive to each.

This is a lock off suite of an adjoining 1 bedroom condo. Fully private access. This is an upper level unit with a flight of stairs to access.

City of Fernie Business License# 001974

reviews.comment: Good place for the money.
Great stay! Great place!
It was everything as advertised. Worked perfect for what I needed. If I had to make a suggestion, a small table to eat at would be ideal .
This suite is comfortable and good value, but please be aware that it is a bare bones accommodation.
Had a great stay, will stay again when next in the area.
Value for your dollar.  Basic amenities.

Location was good however there is no desk or chair. Only place to sit is the bed so if youâ€™re planning on doing any work here or having a meal or anything like that youâ€™re going to have to do it on the bed. Had some issues with the wifi not working and the host was able to get me connected to a different network but it was quite slow and did not meet my needs. Overall it wasnâ€™t a terrible experience but it wasnâ€™t great either. It was very clean however so that was nice.
Thanks for hosting us.
I think I have been clear.
Nice and quiet location. 5 min walk to skibus. I didn't have a car so I had to take the skibus to the mountain and to town.
I absolutely loved my stay at Ryland's. Cozy and comfortable. Very clean which is much appreciated! Ryland was easy to communicate with and pleasant. I hope to stay again in the future.

This was exactly as described and shown in the pictures. It is a small room but comfortable and clean. It is a short drive from town. Also great note is it a very short walking distance to the tandoori grill restaurant which had fantastic Indian food and service! I would stay here again.
Great location , great price
Perfect for what I was looking for
Nice, clean, hotel-style room.  Everything you need for a great stay in Fernie.  Gorgeous view of the alpine resort right out the front door.  Would definitely stay again.
Great host and great location.
Very nice place
Good value, quiet location

We stayed here in the summer when it was very hot. Though the unit is advertised as having air conditioning, it was broken the first night and is located in another room where we couldnâ€™t access it so not only could we not control the temperature but the other guests could change our settings. It resulted in a very poor first night. The host was quick to respond to messages and accessing the unit was easy. Itâ€™s a few kilometers from any shops, restaurants or the downtown but closer to the ski hill. The host says the walls are thin as a warning in the ad and they are. You can clearly hear the other guests and smell their cooking.
The walls are very thin.
Great close off suite for when you only need a room to sleep in and bathroom. Although I had a slow wifi connection.
Always my first choice of a place to stay while in Fernie, used several times over the years and has always been a perfect experience.
Small room but very clean! Nice view of mountains
The place was as advertised. Great cheap place to stay in Fernie!
Great place for short stay! Between ski hill & the town. Better to have a car. Very clean. Tv with big choice of movies. We had really good stay and can recomend it to everyone. Good for couples.
Awewome place. Clean and tidy and in a grreat location.
THE PLACE WAS CONVINIENT AND great
Amazing value - super basic, could use some additional hooks for hanging wet ski clothes, but otherwise just what we needed for a quick couple of days.
Great wee spot near to the ski hill. Cheap and Fast responses, also very accommodating allowing a late check out.
This place is small but gets the job done. Close to Fernie skiing, and the town.

Great little spot, especially if skiing is your main goal for a weekend in Fernie! Clean room and great location (about 5 mins from the resort). I would recommend earplugs though because the walls are very thin... I'd happily stay there again in terms of convenience and value. Hosts are easy to get in touch with via email.

Great location in regards to the hill! A bit outside of the downtown area but still a great place to stay! You get a comfy bed, TV, ensuite and a fridge. We had everything we needed and enjoyed our stay and honestly the cheapest place we could find and you got the exact same as you would anywhere else :) Thank you!
Wonderful stay. Great location near the ski resort, and suitable for 1-2 people staying for a few nights.

Great room! Quite small, but has everything you need - we asked for a coffee maker and it was happily provided for our use. Super close access to the hill and a short drive into town with all amenities. Slight noise from the adjacent/adjoining room could be heard but was no bother for us. Smart tv with Netflix access was a nice perk as well! Awesome field just behind the property which was a great place to walk our dog. Thanks for a great weekend away in Fernie!
Quick and easy Hotel like room.

This house was awesome.
location, service, price etc...
everything is perfect for me.
to be honest I arrived at 4:00am but they let me know how I should do!
thanks Ryland for everything.
Excellent location, clean and comfortable. As a surprise, the room does not have a table. Proceed with care up and down the stares to the door
Perfect!
Clean affordable place to stay close to town . Quiet and comfortable nights sleep
Quiet, clean, comfortable hotel like accommodation.  Perfect for a stay where you'll be enjoying the outdoors and a few meals out.  Thanks for the coffee!!

Rylands place was exactly what we expected, simple and clean.  The communication was punctual and clear, check in was easy.  We have stayed at one of Rylands places in the past and have now had two great experiences. Great stay!

Ryland made my first airbnb experience easy!  Great value for our night in Fernie!
Thanks again!

Ryland and team had excellent communication and were easily reachable if we needed anything. The room is exactly as described and very clean. 4 minute drive from downtown Fernie. Would definitely stay again.
The room was as advertised. Elk river and fishing right across the street. Easy cycling to downtown and a variety of tasty bistros. Beautiful scenery.
We had a great stay here while in Fernie for a wedding. Check in was easy and everything was very clean. Great place to stay!
It was great! Exactly as described.

Ryland's Fernie "hotel room" is a great place for an overnight stay. The room is clean, the bed comfortable and it has all the basic necessities. This is a quiet area which makes for a good night's sleep.  It's a quick drive into town to shop or eat. A good little spot in Fernie!
We've stayed with Ryland multiple times and everytime he makes it so so easy to come for a visit! Definitely recommend it!

The communication and check-in was super easy and perfect for us.  The room is very basic, but perfect for what we needed.  I would recommend this place to other people.  The cleaning fee seemed steep, but would likely be more worth it if you were staying more than one night!
Easy 24hr checkin. Great host communication. Simple cozy apartment.

Ryland was a great host! Very professional, quick to respond to our questions and offering us local suggestions and helpful hints. The room is small - but if all you need is a bed and a shower then it is the perfect space! Also, it is not super close to downtown (not walkable) but it is very close to the campground, hill, etc! It all depends on what your plans are in fernie!
Everything we expected! Great for a few nights in Fernie. Thanks :)

Thanks ryland for the room the night before my big Sinister 7 race. Just needed a nice clean comfortable bed to sleep in and the place was exactly as expected and depicted. Easy checkin (lock box code).
Great place for the value! Beautiful scenery!  Not very private though.
Ryland is very accommodating. We needed to check out a day early and he worked with us. I would be aware that the bed linens are not the cleanest. There were stains on ours which was unsettling.
We had a great stay. It was simple, clean, easy to find. Thanks Ryland
Ryland's place was clean, scenic, and spacious. Ryland is a consistent communicator, and instructions for check-in were very clear. We enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend!

Ryland's condo was awesome! We booked the one (smaller) room, but he allowed us to use the whole condo for the night because he didn't have anyone in the other part. He said he didn't mind if we did a load of laundry as well - which we really appreciated. The condo was clean and exactly as described.

The room was clean and comfortable and just as listed. Shower was great, basically 2 beds in 1, so it was great for 2 guests. Lots of pillows, warm blankets and fresh towels were great. Check in was so easy and communication was A+. Will stay again.
The place was great. The view was amazing... it rained the night I got there, but cleared up the next morning. I would stay here again.
Ryan is an excellent host. He takes care of his visitors and he even agreed to let my small dog in the room with us.
We enjoyed our stay here, everything was clean and tidy. Ryland was very easy to communicate with. Nice to explore Fernie like this.

I really needed a place with 24hr check-in as I wasn't arriving until very late. Ryland's lockoff suite was perfect - I could let myself in without having to disturb anyone. Very clean, comfy bed! I would definitely stay here again. =)

There was a small snag with check in and the room wasn't ready when I arrived (I also booked last minute) but Ryland was able to quickly fix the issue by upgrading me to a bigger suite at no extra charge. Thanks again!
Ryland's place was clean, he communicated  well. It was close to the main highway and the bed was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Quaint, cozy spot and just as advertised. Thanks for the nice stay!
Great place and great value but paths and trails in the area, including sidewalks, were very snow covered.
Really nice area, river right there to explore, and a moment's drive to town and the ski hill. Very quiet at night for the number of rooms and cars. Room is basic, no frills, adequate. Clean enough.
Everything was exactly as advertised. Perfect location as we where there for a ski trip and it's close to the ski resort. Perfect for a couple or solo person.

Ryland is a wonderful host! His communication was fantastic several days prior to our check in and thus we had no problems upon arrival as we were aware of the procedure. The wifi was sent to us through email and was easily accessible. The amenities were great...netflix, all of your essentials including towels and shampoo. The room was very clean and perfect as a private small space! We will surely be back. Thank you Ryland!!
Unit was as advertised and fine.
Great value. Much newer unit than the photos show.
Clean comfortable room in a great location. Great value.
Ryland was great, allowed me to check in early and has great place just minutes from the mountain.
Wonderful location. Located about half way between town and the ski resort. Room is clean and described accurately. Great communication with host.

This room looked exactly like the pictures. It's a great value for money and a great place to spend the night on trip West. I could see how it would be a bit noisy if you had loud neighbors, but ours were very considerate. It was a great stay overall.
Location in between Fernie resort and town. Good location very easy check in.

Ryland was an awesome host! After a small accident where I booked accomodation for the wrong day he was able to accomodate the place for us an hour before arriving! The apartment is small but perfect for a couple staying a few days, spacious for its size and still has a giant bed and shower was awesome would definetly stay again if there another massive powder day in fernie :D thanks very much !
Lovely place

It was a very nice place to stay with great views of the mountains, very close to the resort, and nice amenities.   Ryland was great with communication. 
I was fortunate the other unit was vacant, so he gave me access and I was able to cook and enjoy the fire place.  I would stay again next time I visit fernie.
Stayed here during our trip to Fernie alpine resort. Ryland's place is very clean and a great room for a place to sleep.
Great pad! Super close to the hill, clean and comfortable. Ryland was very easy to communicate with.
Check in and stay went according to plan and we had no issues. It was clean and a good check point for us on our trip
A quant, clean and quiet little space, perfect for a little weekend get away! Would definitely recommend :)
Easy, warm and clean. Would stay again

Wonderful tiny place for two! It's super close to the fernie ski hill! It's exactly five minutes away as said by the host description. Easy access easy check out. The bed is ok comfy but for that price at holiday season, I'm hugely satisfied.
The room was exactly as described and  very clean

The place was super convenient after a day of skiing. Close to the hill, very clean and Ryland was easy to communicate with. He was very helpful with check-in and any other questions we had during our stay. We would be happy to come back!
Ryland was very helpful and the place was comfortable and exactly as described

Great value. The room is spacious and clean. We really enjoyed our stay.
We will be back for sure!
Ryland was very helpful and friendly, and the place was nice and clean!
Great deal, simple place with all the basics, great views of the mountains at your front door, easy check-in and all that. Will definitely stay here again when back in Fernie.

Ryland's place was the perfect crash pad after a long day of skiing.  It is warm, cozy, quiet and spotless.  The location is very handy to the mountains and the lovely town of Fernie, less than a five minute drive to either.  As a host, Ryland couldn't have been better.  He was accommodating, quick and clear in his communication and super helpful.  For example, we needed help in finding a place to store our travel trailer for a week.  Ryland was quick to give suggestions and offered further help if needed.  Well above and beyond.  I would definitely stay in this, or one of Ryland's other properties, again.
Great clean quiet place. Close to town, mountain, and river. Would stay there again.

We felt very welcomed by Ryland.  The room was as described, but he also let us use some extra space during our stay for no extra charge.  Highly recommend, especially for those wanting to stay near the ski resort.  A short 5 min drive to downtown Fernie and close to the turn off for the ski hill too.
This place was amazing. Bigger than we expected and very clean. Ryland and Blair went way above and beyond to make sure our stay was comfortable.

Trying to get into contact with Ryland was very challenging. The stairs were steap and covered with ice and snow, making them very treacherous. When I told him my concerns that were valid safety issues he was very defensive and rude. The bed was extremely uncomfortable as well as the very noisy outside resulted in my only getting 2 hours of sleep, the heating took at least 2 hours to turn on and when it did, it was not very effective. There was some sort of splatter on the bathroom wall, the baseboards were very very dirty exct. I feel completely ripped off and am very, very unimpressed, he could have handled the situation better but was unbelievably rude. There are much better/affordable places in town with very lovely hosts.
Host was very friendly and responsive over messaging! The listing was accurate and very clean and cosy! Would definitely recommend to friends!
This space is PERFECT!!!  It is clean, quiet, close to town, the views are amazing and it overall is just a great place to stay.  Wonderful communication with Ryland.  I will stay again soon <3
Ryland is a great host, the room was impeccably clean. I quite enjoyed my stay and I'll be back again
Perfect little place at a great price.

Not a single thing went wrong, came in late on the first night and code worked to get in everything is what you see in the picture no false advertising :)

100% recommend if you want your own privacy at a very good price!

My mother and daughter stayed there.
Ryland communicated through text with my daughter for anything they needed, and was very friendly & helpful.
good communication, good clean rental unit.
Great space for a great price. Was perfect for what we needed. Ryland was helpful in making sure we had the info we needed to get settled.
Ryland and Blair were very accommodating and very helpful and easy to get in contact with, not that we needed to, everything was fantastic. Would definitely stay here again.

Ryland was a great host and was in constant communication in the lead up to our stay and during.  The location is picturesque and tucked just outside the downtown core with easy accessibility to all the dining locations in Fernie.  The place is small, but well worth the value.  I would definitely recommend this place to any future guest wishing for a lovely spot in Fernie.

I stayed at Ryland's place for 5 nights, everything is just as it looks in the photo's with no surprises, Ryland was an excellent communicator and very fast to reply and help out if needed. The last two nights i didn't get much sleep because the absolute worst tenants renting the space next to this one (joined by a locked off door)were screaming and jumping on the ceiling  and smashing things and fighting. However I texted Ryland and he immediately texted the other renters and told them to be quiet. (Even tho they didn't listen to him), I really appreciated Ryland's quick response to my inquiries and his attempt to solve the problem. As it turns out this area has an 11 pm quiet time bylaw, and the people in the room next door jumped up and down on the ceiling and screamed at the top of their lungs till 10:59. Im glad the insanity eventually stopped but i was at wits end by 11pm trying to sleep and repeatedly had to curb the urge to call police...it was that bad! My suggestion would be to not allow those renters at your property again and i sincerely Hope they didn't wreck the place as Ryland you seem like a genuinely nice person who tries very hard to facilitate a good experience for those who stay. This is not intended to be a bad review whatsoever as Rylands customer service was impeccable, just wanting to share my experience honestly as without honesty this system of peer to peer review doesn't help anyone. I would stay here again and just hope that his was a one off negative experience as the value is overall quite good for the price.

Unfortunately our appointment was postponed again last minute so we were not able to make this reservation.
We will book with Ryland again next month

Great little getaway spot! Loved the location, just outside of downtown Fernie, near the provincial park. It was clean and cozy. Ryland made sure that I had good instructions for finding the place and getting inside. Would stay again.
Awesome little spot and right across the street from the provincial park. Check-in was super easy and flexible. Everything was clean and ready upon arrival.

Was everything we needed.  Clean and comfortable.  The neighbors (or guests in other rooms) were a bit loud when we stayed the first morning.  The other mornings were just fine.  Sleeps 3 very comfortably and everything was clean.  Thanks for the stay!
Awesome place. Convenient and clean. Can't ask for better hosts, they make it easy to get away from the city for a day or two.
Was a perfect place for what we needed which was just a one day stay. Loved how it smelt clean and was reasonable in price:) we will def come back!
Great location right off the highway if you want to get up to the resort.  A short drive to town.
The place was nice and everything was clean. Ryland was quick to respond to messages, and was helpful.

Ryland was very accommodating and helpful with the check-in process. The suite was exactly as pictured and very clean. It was exactly what we were looking for and are happy we decided to stay at one of Ryland's accommodations. Definitely would recommend to anyone!

This is our second time staying at a Ryland and Blair Airbnb and we'll keep coming back! They make airbnb-ing sooo easy! The room was awesome with its own entrance from the house, it was clean and comfortable. The pictures are quite accurate. Our hosts made sure our comfort was important, they did quality checks to make sure we had everything we could possibly need. What more can you ask for!
Perfect simple place to stay for a couple days in fernie. Halfway between downtown and the resort works pretty well. Super happy with the experience. Thank you!
Ryland was accessible at all times before and during the booking. The listing was EXACTLY as described and it was perfect for my needs! I will definitely stay again and recommend to my mates.
It's exactly as described, a small room with a bed and bathroom attached. Exactly what we needed in our quick overnight stay in Fernie
The apartment was as described. We only stayed for one night as the first stop on our road trip, but it was ideal for what we needed. Ryland's communication was great

Email communication was convenient; Ryland was courteous and professional and I will stay again! 
We drove about 21+ hours from the U.S, so I needed wifi to communicate and this was easy to do with Ryland's prior communications.

The condo is cozy, the bed comfortable, and the amenities for an overnight stop are perfect.
Unfortunately our meeting was postponed last minute so we never made this reservation. We will definitely be booking with Ryland again at the end of the month

Great place to stay! Communication with Ryland was great. His responses were always quick and very helpful. Room was exactly what I was looking for. Nice bike ride from this room to downtown. Easy access to nearby hiking trails and walking paths. Would definitely stay again and would recommend to any friend!
Good clean room and great views!

I was so happy with our trip to Fernie, Ryland was more then helpful and very kind. There was a little misunderstanding and we ended up in the wrong room which Ryland was very understanding and got us in the right room without a problem.  I highly recommend staying here, it was one of the most relaxing weekends and I'm so thankful for Rylands help.

Our stay was great. Arrival and accessing the room was easy even though we were arriving quite late in the day. The room was clean and comfortable, everything we needed for our quick stop through Fernie. Would definitely stay again when back in the area.

Had a great stay here! The room exceeded our expectations. Really nice, clean, modern en-suit. Ryland responded immediately to all our questions and was really friendly. Would definitely recommend this place.

Due to a change in plans, we were not able to make our reservation.
I called Ryland to let him know our meeting was cancelled so not to expect us. I was not looking for a refund due to me calling at the time we were to check in.
He offered me a refund, and tried to put it through for me but it was something I had to do through my account. I was not able to sign into the website on my phone so was not able to do the cancellation. I didn't mind as we had a really good deal on the room.
I will definitely book with him again when our meeting is rescheduled as he was great to talk to on the phone and the check in information he sent was great!!

Perfect overnight stay . Very clean and comfortable. Provided coffee, tea, shampoo, soap and wifi. 
Will stay again if passing through the area, great value for money. Loved the keypad entry.

This is the second time we have stayed at Ryland's place. What we like about is:
we can arrive any time, sleep immediately, wake up early, and not speak to anyone. There is a key pad on the door and we are often late due to our long drive after work. His place is just off the hwy. It's clean and there is coffee in the morning. It's priced well for what we need.

I was very impressed with the lovely room and the beautiful location.  It was exactly as advertised and very clean.  Ryland was there asking me if everything was in order within 15 minutes of arriving.  I would definitely stay at this location again.  Thanks for everything!

Ryland was a great host and made us feel welcome. He responding quickly to our inquiries and was most courteous and kind with the booking procedure.  The room was clean and neat, the bathroom spotless and the beds comfortable. He provided nice amenities: coffee pot and coffee, hand soap, body wash and toiletries.  The location was easy to find and key code access to the room was very simple. Great value.  We were very pleased.
The space was clean and inviting, perfect place to stay the night on our way home. Would definitely stay here again.
Passing through Fernie on my way to Calgary and Ryland's room was a great place to crash for the night. Super convenient keypad access!

Ryland's place was perfect for our needs. His directions and room instructions were spot on. It was clean and had everything we needed for one night. We will stay there again as we often drive from Edmonton to Nelson after work on weekends. This was an excellent value for accomodations.

I extended my stay by one evening and wrote a review for the same stay previously. As mentioned, it was very lovely and Ryland and Blair are great people to share space with. The home is very close to the town center, and you could ride your bicycle to it, if you had one with you. Also, it was quiet and peaceful and the bed was comfortable. I was very happy with my stay. 

Thanks!
Great value. We had children that were pretty noisy in the morning. But all in all a good stay.

clean but small space,  a 7ish minute drive from downtown Fernie. if you are looking for something quiet, this isnâ€™t the place. could hear everyone above us and beside us, including people outside as there is another door right beside this one. overall wasnâ€™t a bad stay!
Cozy stay, basic but was exactly what I needed for a couple days in Fernie
clean and comfortable
Great place to stay in Fernie!
Very nice and private. Great spot for solo female travellers.

data.name: Spacious condo with Fireplace BBQ, Deck, Views
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

Upper level loft unit, 1 bedroom, Kitchen, Deck, Fireplace, A/C

This condo has 3 beds. It features a big back deck with a natural gas grill.

Convenient electronic keypad to access the unit and check in at any time. Full access via two separate entries, washer dryer, kitchen, big back deck.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

We are located conveniently between the ski hill and town on the river!

This unit does NOT include the "lock off" suite. Check out my other listing "2 bedroom plus loft" to book the entire unit. If you do book this unit please be respectful that their may be guests in the lock off.

There is a hideabed, however bedding is not supplied. Use at your own risk.

City of Fernie Business License # 001974

reviews.comment: Perfect location for the ski hill!  Lots of space to sleep and comfortable beds.  Kitchen was well stocked with utensils and needed items.
Nice little place, simple and clean.
Great place. Great value. Lots of space for kids and adults to have their own space. Equipped with everything you need and then some. Super quick responses. Thanks for a great weekend.

Our group of 6 people had a great time staying at Ryland's Airbnb property. I would highly recommend staying if you need a place in the Fernie area. Airbnb posting is very accurate to the property in person.
Great service and an awesome place to stay!
Excellent location; close proximity to the ski resort. Easy to find and nearby an excellent indian restaurant
Great place to stay !

Great location between town and the resort!

Rylandâ€™s place was clean and cozy, yet spacious enough for us to host guests. Ryland was very quick to respond and helped us extend our stay at the last minute, which was greatly appreciated. 

We wouldnâ€™t hesitate to book here again!
Great location & cool spot, make sure to book it with these guys!
Lovely stay! Easy check in/out and quick responses from Ryland. Great location as well. Would stay again! ðŸ˜Š
Cozy place and good price!
3 mins to the ski resort and a really cute, spacious loft.
Great condo! I would stay here again
Had a great time. Amazing place

Good place for a biking or Ski trip.  
Close to the town, ski hill and endless bike trails right from the door.  
Apartment is showing signs of age but is warm and comfortable and the gas fire give the place a cosy feel. 
There is only one bathroom and itâ€™s off the master bedroom.  Itâ€™s accessible from the living room and bedroom.  The kitchen is perfectly serviceable with microwave and dishwasher.  
There is little to no road noise but as with most of these mountin pass towns the train comes through a few times a night.
Rylands place was clean, spacious and exactly what we needed for our trip. If you don't mind being just out of town this will work for you.
Great place to stay in Fernie! This cute little condo has every thing we needed and then some.
Great location, great value and lots of space!
A great place to stay in Fernie and excellent value.  Highly recommended!  Thanks again for hosting us!

Ryland's place is in the best location, always quiet, and great use of space!  He has it well stocked and ready to go!
Our second stay here!
Thanks Ryland!

The condo was clean and the kitchen was well-equipped. It is a great location; Fernie Provincial Park is just across the road, and town was about 1 1/2 miles away. It is right on the Elk River, so my husband could walk down to the river to fish.  The day  before were were to check in, we received an email telling us to be sure not to park in the construction zone at the condo. It turned out that roof replacement was still going on ( a review in July had mentioned construction noise), and a couple of the days that we were there, the workers were on the roof over our heads and and it was quite noisy. That was the only downside of our visit, and it would have been helpful to have been prepared for the construction noise when we were given the alert about parking. I understand that these projects need to happen, but it still would have been nice to know that we might have been inconvenienced by the noise.

This is a great place! Really clean space with great views. The loft space is the best part. FernieBnB is a relly great management company as well. They responded immediately when I had a question about getting in. The only downside for us was that the deck is not toddler friendly (there's a big gap in between the bottom railing and the deck that our toddler could fit through and fall off - he tried!) so we couldn't use the deck. All in all, great place!

Quiet and space location. Cannot hear train at night. In the future, it would be really helpful if operation of the AC unit can be explained to guests as it can be very finicky, and another unit is controlled by the same thermostat.

The description of the place is pretty accurate. Why I could only give 3 stars was due to active construction on the roof for our entire stay. We were only told that construction was being done the day prior to our arrival. It made no mention that the place we were staying was going to be involved just said not to park in certain locations and that the construction was 0700-1900 hrs. The construction was right over our heads. Sounded like the roof was going to come down. We had men up on our balcony and I was actually not keen to go onto the deck because there were ropes from the roof coming down onto it. We were in an active construction zone that did affect our stay and what we did. I sent Ryland a note and all I got back was an apology for the inconvenience. We have stayed at other places where we were warned about the construction with ample time and given options to either stay some place else or given a 15% discount. Considering this place was booked 4 months ago and to do any type of construction in a condo/townhome with board approval takes months to plan, I do feel we should have been given more warning and other options. How it was handled was unprofessional and disappointing.
Great place to stay.

We really enjoyed our time at the condo and would recommend it. What you see is what you get. The property is a little tired but great location for MTB in the provincial park. The air con was appreciated on hot days. There was only 2 of us and we felt the price was good value, with more people it would be a bargain. The photos don't show how big the main loft is, large enough for 2 queen beds, a couch and tv with floor space to spare. We would stay again if we returned to Fernie.
Great location and superb value.
Excellent value, lots of space, AC was a bonus!

Great value and fast communication! The host made booking and requesting updates friendly and easy. The unit is equipped with all essentials and extras needed - great touches with the espresso machine
Great place. Definitely reccomend!
Nice quiet accommodation about a 5 minute drive from the hill.  We really enjoyed walking along the path towards the river in the evening with our dog. Weâ€™d happily stay here again.

Rylandâ€™s place in Fernie was spot on, so close to the mountain, beautiful and clean for our snowboarding trip and Ryland was so helpful and quick to respond.

If your in Fernie check out Rylandâ€™s
Excellent location only a few minutes from Fernie ski hill. A little outside of downtown Fernie but everything was within a few minute drive. Beds were very comfortable!

We really enjoyed our stay in Fernie and these accommodations made it easy to relax. The location is great, offering walking trails and is close to the river. A quick 5 minute drive to downtown. The condo was clean, the bed was comfortable. The kitchen was fully stocked for cooking meals. Ryland was great about checking in with us as well! Overall a wonderful stay that I would recommend.

Great location in a quiet area of town. I stayed for a month in November for work and the price was pretty reasonable for a furnished condo. Very clean, well kept home. Owner/managers were very quick to respond to the couple minor issues that came up.

I would recommend this property to anyone visiting Fernie.  A short drive to the city or ski hill.  
This is a comfortable place to stay and I would have to say the beds were very comfortable.  Great bedding made it a great sleep.  I would certainly stay again!

We spent a week at Ryland's condo. It was a beautiful place to spend our vacation. Very clean, spacious, beautiful views and our communication was exceptional. Location between the ski hill and town was perfect for us. Amazing value and a definite destination for your to-do list !!! Thanks so much
An extremely beautiful place - only 5 minutes away from the resort, close to the town and were more than accommodating!
Just as advertised. Ryland was very communicative. The suite was very quiet, and comfortable. Thanks and we wished we had time to stay longer!

The place is just as stated. Plenty of space, close to the river for nice walks. A short 5 min drive to shopping and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay and may return with the rest of the family for a winter trip. I would definitely recommend. Good value for price.
Great location and great place. Very nice to have a coffee on the patio looking at the mountains. Would like to have stayed longer!

We we attending a wedding at Long Island Lake Lodge near Fernie and opted to stay at Ryland's to extend our vacation for a couple days. We travelled with our children, 4 years old and 18 months old. It was great to have the loft for them to play and have a space for their afternoon nap and to send them to bed early. The kitchen had e everything you needed for making meals. The bbq was an added bonus but we had to buy a BBQ lighter as we couldn't find one. We were able to bike to down town Fernie from this location with the kids. Some of the biking needed to be done along the busy highway but was manageable. Overall we had a great experience and Ryland was always quick to respond to any questions that we had. A great location for our family to explore Fernie and the surrounding area.
Ryland's place was very clean and comfortable. Check-in was hassle free and communication was quick & easy. Location was ideal for hikes and outdoor activities. I would recommend this place.
Nicy cozy spot in Beautiful Fernie BC.
Nice place, great communication.  We'll definitely use again.

Ryland's place is perfect for families. The kids slept upstairs while we had a quiet room on the main floor. The pool table was out of order which was a little disappointing, but the place was in a quiet location with gorgeous walks. Checking in and out was easy as can be.

What a great place to stay in Fernie! The condo is clean and spacious, with a lovely private deck. Our 2 teens enjoyed their privacy in the loft. Ryland gave us good, clear information about tubing through town on the Elk River, and was kind enough to lend us tubes. We launched the tubes at the bridge by the Canadian Tire and got off behind the Stanford Hotel,  just a few minutes' walk back to the condo. My husband used one of Ryland's bikes to go back to where we had dropped off our vehicle. It was the highlight of the trip! Ryland was quick to respond to any questions we had via email. We would highly recommend his place!
If you travel to Fernie you should definitely stay at rylands place. Well equipped, clean and spacious.

Ryland was a great host and easy to get in touch with. The unit was clean and in a great shape. Was hoping the billiards table was operational, but not a big deal breaker. Would stay at Rylands unit again.
We had a wonderful stay, thank you.
Great place to stay!
Great place! Awesome views!
The location is idea. Close to the ski hill and right along the river.

Great location! Close to town and close to the Mount Fernie provincial park and the Alpine ski resort. Great mountain view from the patio. Clean accommodations and has everything you need. Great place for bringing pets. Reasonable price for what you get. Would definitely stay again.

Ryland's place was great all round-clean, conveinient and well set up. Ryland was an excellent host, east to communicate with and really helpful accommodating our extra requests. This is an awesome place to stay in Fernie, thanks Ryland!!
Great value for a quiet and spacious place. Would definitely stay here again

Ryland was wonderful to communicate with and gave easy instructions on how to get to the place and access the unit. This condo is very close to Fernie ski hill about a 3 minute drive away. Unit was clean and comfortable. There is also a cute friendly outdoor cat that roams the area! Would highly recommend this unit.
Great stay. Really enjoyed the pool table and ping pong table.
So close to the mountain for skiing and snowboarding! loved the place, perfect size for the 3 of us to sleep, cook, relax after the ski day and play pool/ping pong. Highly recommended!
great place, wonderful experience
We had a nice stay in Fernie, the rental was clean and had everything we needed. Rylan was very responsive with coordination of our stay.
Un sÃ©jour parfait dans un grand appartement parfaitement amÃ©nagÃ©. Au calme, juste Ã  quelques minutes des pistes et quelques minutes de la ville.

Great place. Spacious and the pool table was a great added feature.
Very close to the ski resort...5 minutes drive!
Would stay again!

I really appreciated the constant communication with Ryland. We were given thorough instructions, and were made to feel very welcome. The photos don't do the property justice - it was much larger/roomier than we expected, with great views! The location is minutes from town and the ski hill. Outdoor stairs and sidewalks were promptly cleared of snow throughout our stay. We would definitely consider staying here again! Thanks, Ryland!
Great place. Pictures don't do it justice.
Everything was great! Thank you!!
Great place in a nice location. Ryland made sure we had everything we needed. And we were able to have our dogs stay there too which was huge. Would definitely recommend to a friend.

It was so nice to have a very personalized receptive host. The condo was exactly as described but the description was more modest than expected. We love our stay and any questions we had were received, answered and dealt with quickly. We will certainly recommend and hopefully return

Ryland's place was perfect for what we needed. Warm, spacious, clean and comfortable. We enjoyed playing nightly table tennis and having use of a few bikes was very handy as it is a little far from town but come winter it couldn't be much closer to the mountain! If we have family come to Fernie we'd recommend this place for sure. Cheers boys!!

Ryland provided very nice accommodations at a very reasonable cost. This condo was perfect for my needs and had all of the necessary basic amenities for a comfortable stay. This location is very convenient to Fernie and to all services one might need. Ryland was available and checked often to ensure that I had everything I needed. I would certainly look to stay here in the future upon return to Fernie.

Had a great stay at Ryland's place in Fernie. It's so close to the provincial park, and if you enjoy fishing you can walk down to the river in less than five minutes. Easy check in, place as described and very clean. Has a kitchen with all the amenities if you want to cook. Ryland is an excellent host who replies promptly and is always making sure your needs are met. Awesome place to stay in Fernie, especially if you have a group! Wouldn't hesitate to book again in the future. Thanks Ryland!

Good communications. Hence, no problem in getting to the place and into the apt..
Clean & spacious apt. with excellent view of the mountains from almost all windows and while sitting on the balcony.
Good kitchen with good supply of dishes, glasses, cutlery, pots & pans.
Quiet and peaceful location.
To top it all, there is a billiard table or one can cover it, and it converts to a table tennis table. We enjoyed a few games of table tennis.
Enjoyed the relaxing time!
Ryland's place was very clean, had everything on the list, and he was excellent with communication as well. We loved Fernie, BC too.
Just perfect. Great communication. Easy of access. Suited perfectly for all 6 of us. Best place we've stayed in Canada so far!  Highly recommend.
Great stay.  Comfortable and clean. Perfect for our stay- very accommodating and pet friendly host.  Location was close to ski hill and town. Highly recommend.
Quick responses and accommodating to our team that stayed.
A great location if you want to check out the provincial park.

Spacious unit, very clean, well furnished, a little dated interior (par for the course in a mountain town) might be an issue for someone expecting true 5-star accommodations, I would definitely stay here again.
Steve's place is fantastic that has everything you need. Itâ€™s close to everywhere. Quite and peaceful. Steve always quick response. We had a wonderful time in Fernie.

We were supposed to stay at this location but the day of our departure we were told that the there was a water pipe leak and we couldn't stay there anymore. He gave us a link to the alternate place which was good, but wasn't what I was originally hoping for, but thankfully we had a great first family trip with our 5 month old.

My husband and I recently enjoyed a 6 day vacation here.  We loved the location and  how much space it offered . Overall, the unit was very clean, quiet and comfortable. 

However,  we were a bit disappointed to discover the views from the deck were blocked by overgrown  trees and that the unit had significant wear and tear .

Everything worked well in the unit and the beds were extremely comfortable.  Steve was a very responsive host and provided excellent customer service!
Very much enjoyed our stay
Pretty much as-advertised. Good location, very clean and comfortable living space.
Really nice space and a great host! Thanks for having us
Good space with amazing views. Ryland was accommodating and easy to work with. Would gladly return.
This was a great place to stay while skiing in Fernie. We enjoyed the beautiful views from the loft and the beds were very comfy!

Let me start by saying that I have never had such quick and positive responses from an Airbnb host! I sent at least four or five questions both before and during my stay, and Ryland responded within minutes and was very helpful with all my questions. 
The condo was perfect for my family of five. We used the BBQ for dinner and cooked on the stove for breakfast, and found everything we could need for preparing our meals. We loved the back deck where we could enjoy time outside (even in April) and take in the view of the mountains. 
The loft area was perfect for my three children. It gave them their own space to hang out and relax a bit before bed. 
If you are expecting luxury this condo might not be the one for you, as it is a bit tired and run down. That said, if you just need a quiet place with lots of space, fabulous views, and all the basic amenities, this place is perfect. 
The one and only complaint we had is that the wifi was terrible and we kept getting kicked off. To be fair, we did not address this with the host, so maybe there was something that could have been done about it if we asked. 
We would definitely stay here again.

Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.
2 bedroom plus loft condo with Deck.

This 2 bedroom plus loft has 4 beds and features a big back deck, BBQ with amazing views.

Convenient electronic keypad to access the unit and check in at any time. Full access via three separate entries, washer dryer, kitchen, big back deck.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Perfectly located half way between town and the ski hill. 5 minute drive to each.

Strictly enforced quiet time of 11PM - 7AM. $200 fine for contravention.
There is a hideabed, however there is no bedding supplied (which is why it is not listed as an amenity)

City of Fernie Business License: #001974
