reviews.comment: Ryland was an amazing host for the time that we spent here. The place was clean and everything was exactly like we expected. No issues with checkin or throughout the entire process.
Great week in fernie
Great location. Ryland is a friendly and diligent host.
Great place with lots of space and close to everything you would like tondo in Fernie.

Ryland was an excellent host. This home was clean and so spacious. Beds and pillows were comfy. Perfect location close to ski hill and other activities like pick up spot for white water rafting. 

Communication was so easy, and he really cared to make sure we got to Fernie safe and had no problems.
Would stay here again for sure.
Perfect stay, nice clean house, central location, easy check-in.

Great location just outside of town for all our family adventures. We loved the easy access to the Elk River (for fishing and playing) and being just across the road (5-minute walk) to numerous trail runs and mountain bike rides.
The accommodation is good and versatile.  It was fine for our one night stay.
Clean and spacious condo with great access to the local area. Stayed here with the whole family and had a fantastic time. 10/10 recommend!
Great location and Ryland was a great host. The place is slightly run down, but is clean and is the right price!
A great place on west end of Fernie for group 6-8 to stay close to ski area and not far from downtown. Host is good communicator. Small balcony with BBQ nice in summer.
Great value! Easy to communicate
The space accommodated our group perfectly, and is located in a great spot. Would happily stay here again!
Great spot close only 5 minute drive from the ski hill!
Great place to stay! Super close to the lovely town of Fernie and close to the hill.
Overall good place to stay. Quiet and easy access to river and green space behind you. Only one bathroom if just the loft and one unit is booked.
Definitely a five-star place to stay. Great communication. Very clean. Fantastic views.

Loved this place! The host also communicated very well and made our stay super pleasant! Easy self check in process. So much space and a beautiful view with a deck to sit out on. 100% would stay here again!

The condo was clean, quiet and well equipped.  The walking path for our dog was very close to the condo which we really loved.  Parking was close and easy to find. Iâ€™d recommend this accommodation for a quiet ski weekend or a family holiday any time of the year.

We loved our group Ski trip to Fernie! This condo was perfect- right between the Mountain and town. We had all the info we needed and the spaces were clean, beds were comfy, condo was perfect for a chill group. Would definitely recommend. Thank you!
Great place to bring your dog, lots of space for them to free run about.  Quick drive to FAR as well.  Very open and spacious place.
Ryland's place has everything you need! It's clean and very spacious! We enjoyed our walks along the Elk every night. If you love Fernie this is the perfect spot.

Ryland's place in Fernie was very well equipped, clean, and spacious for the 4 of us. We especially enjoyed the quiet, equally spacious deck and the potted herbs that graced our supper.  We highly recommend his place!

A beautiful house with an amazing view and basic facilities provided. Hosts were prompt in providing information regarding the check-in.  A pleasant experience overall. Wish we had more time to use the pool table!
Great place to stay. Lots of space.
One of the best properties you can rent in the Mountains for the price.

This is our second time to stay, We enjoyed our stay even more this time. It was hot outside, but we felt very comfortable with air conditioning. 
Great host, great communication, great house.

Ryland's place was a perfect home-base for us while we staying in Fernie for the long weekend. Great townhouse, clean and comfortable. Easy access to the condo, ample parking, and prompt communication from Ryland made our stay a breeze. The townhouse is super close to the river for a nice dip after a long day of riding bikes and was a great way to end the day. We are already trying to plan a return for September!
Very clean good size lots off space morning sun on back deck
Ryland's place in Fernie was awesome! Super spacious and very clean. I would recommend it if you are looking for a nice condo in Fernie. :)
Our group enjoyed staying at Ryland's condo. The place was clean, and there was plenty of space for 6 people.

The location of the house is very close to the highway and the views of the  mountains are exceptional, both from the front door and the balcony. House was kept very clean and nicely arranged. Above all the interiors were nicely done and looked beautiful. Ryland was very accommodating when we told him that we broke one of his kitchenware. All in all I would definitely recommend this place to any one looking for a relaxing stay and with quick access to Fernie downtown.

The condo was exactly what we were looking for. Large space allowed for six of us to stay very comfortably, and the Ryland was as accommodating as they come. The only thing missing was a hottub to soak it after a long day of skiing.

The condo is in great location, spacious, clear and just as described. The host is great in communication we want to cancel the booking earlier due to whether condition not best for snowboarding, communication to proceed with the host is a breeze, will come back!
Great value!
Great stay. Very close to the ski resort
We really enjoyed our stay. The place was as described and in a great location. Good communication and very easy check in. I would stay here again.
The condo was perfect! Plenty of room, and very clean! I would definitely stay here again.

Ryland. Thank you for making me feel welcome in Fernie. The place was as advertised and as expected. It has seen a bit of wear and tear, but was comfortable and well worth the cost. I could see myself staying there again come ski season. I also appreciated that you made yourself available by email to answer any questions I had while staying in Fernie. 
Thanks again.
J.P.

The experience is fantastic. The living room is very spacious and comfortable. The bedrooms and bathrooms are very clean. The loft with pool/table tennis is bonus, we enjoyed playing pool game. The two beds at Loft are very comfortable with great view. 
Even though there is no cooking oil at kitchen and no body wash soap at bathrooms, we can hand it with one night stay. 
Overall, 5 of 5. We will come back again!
ryland s place is very clean. the rooms are well prepared before our arrival. great communication by the host. we would recommend the place to anyone who's coming to fernie

Beautiful spot-- PERFECT for my dog and me. We were able to walk close by and zip into town easily. Great mountain biking right from the front door.  Very comfortable condo too-- we played pingpong and ate all our meals on the deck.  We'll be back for sure.
We had a great stay in Fernie. The place was clean and spacious enough for small group of us to be very comfortable.

It was exactly as described. Very nice, clean, beds were very comfortable, and the property was in a great location, being only a couple of minutes from downtown Fernie. Had a great time and really enjoyed the place!
Ryland's place is homey, spacious and has everything you could need. The arrangements were straightforward and everything we needed was there. Perfect!
Great communication with Ryland. Awesome modern house with terace, bbq, billiards and table tenis. We loved this house. I hope that next time we could stay more nights.

Ryland place was fantastic! It had everything we needed to make our family stay perfect. Each room was set up really well with nice bedding and plenty of storage.  We had more then enough room to have a family supper around the table. This place has everything you need to make your next stay in Fernie a great one. Would definitely stay again if we go back!

Excellent accommodations! First stay at an airbnb, won't be my last. Clean unit in a nice location.

Just as presented in pictures. No disappointments.
Great site close to town. Lots of space. Clean and modern and great price. Would certainly stay again.

Ryland was an incredible host. My family and I Had a wonderful time. The condo was clean, in a great neighbourhood, with beautiful views of the mountains.
My family already wants to book again for next year!
Thanks so much to Ryland for making my families stay so wonderful.
Nice place

- Great amenities
- Very clean!
- Well equipped kitchen
- Great patio for eating
- Easy check-in
- A/C was great for 30+ weather
Great location, near the alpine resort and sweet place overall. Ryland was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Check in and check out were easy. We truly enjoyed our stay.
We had a great stay at Rylandâ€™s town house. Great location between the ski hill and town.  Great communication. Clean place, loved the local soap in the bathroom. Thanks, hope weâ€™ll be back!

Highly recommend this accommodation. Very close to down town and the ski hill. Ryland was very quick at responding, and accomdated us with a last minute request. Everyone was happy with the comfort of the beds. The fireplace is a nice cosy touch. If we were ever to come back to Fernie, we would re-book with Ryland. Thank you for having us!

Ryland's place was excellent and he was a great host too. He was quick to respond and made sure we had everything we needed. If you're looking for a spacious and affordable place that is perfectly located between the ski hill and town, this is the place for you.
Good location, house was very clean and Ryland was fast to respond.
Exactly as expected. Room to park sled trailer on the street nearby.
Great location, well equipped and comfortable. Quick responses on questions as well. Thank you.

data.name: Classic Historical Fernie Home
data.address_address: 861 5 Avenue, V0B 1M0, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This classic, beautifully restored historical home in downtown Fernie will make you never want to leave on your next trip to the Rockies. The open-concept living and dining space, comfy living room with wood burning fire place, and a family room with large TV, makes for easy entertaining and a perfectly wonderful family stay.

Arrive and enjoy. Everything you need for your visit, including large TV for younger guests, outdoor space, off-street parking, and all appliances, wifi and cable. The large windows offer tons of natural light, making it easy to enjoy a morning coffee before your five-minute walk to historic downtown Fernie. Feel at home in this brightly-lit, beautifully architected space.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

This home is a short walk from cafes, restaurants, bars, grocery and liquor stores, movie theatre, aquatic centre, hospital, medical clinic, pharmacy, playgrounds, the golf course and Fernie's elaborate trail network. A 7-minute drive to Fernie Alpine Resort, and close to the resort's winter shuttle bus stop.

City of Fernie Business License: #002181

reviews.comment: Todd's space is beautiful, bright and located perfectly to walk into town.  Our visit was short as we were sidelined by Corona and had to head back home. That being said if you need to ride out a pandemic this is a good spot.  We hope to be back in Fernie next winter and will definitely stay with Todd.

Very modern remodelled older house thatâ€™s well laid out and in a fantastic location.
Todd was an excellent host who couldnâ€™t do enough to make our stay in Fernie one never to forget.  Well done!
I can highly recommend staying here.
Clean and very spacious house.

This is a lovely, historic home in a great location.  We loved the fireplace,  beautiful spaces for reading  (lots of room for a family to spread out in), cooking with lovely appliances.  It was a great stay.   We will definitely be back!

Great home, stylish and spacious for sure. Important things like the beds and showers were great! The kitchen is fairly well stocked with all the pots, pans and utensils you would need. I loved the furniture in the living room and den. The master bedroom is awesome. That said, the other two bedrooms are small but in light of the amount of living space downstairs, this is still a great house with a great location. I would stay in town versus on the mountain at Fernie, in this house, everytime.

We really had a fantastic time at this home. It was very comfortable and spacious and the location was spot on. We stayed here with our little boy and found it be a very kid friendly home. The fireplace made for great evening hangout and board game time during our winter stay. We were able to walk to the main downtown strip easily and all the skiing in the area was a very quick drive from the house. We loved our time here and it made for a really great vacation to Fernie. We'd love to stay here again whenever we return.

Toddâ€™s place was a great stay. Fantastic location, close to the ski resort and very close to downtown. 
The beds were super comfy and had all the facilities we required.

Get location and really nice house. The master bedroom is big and can easily fit a family of four and the other two rooms are a little on the smaller side, but still really good and cute. Couple of pull out beds in the den and living room, that with the closing doors to the den makes for an easy 4th bedroom. Few key items were missing from the kitchen, but messaged Todd and they were delivered right away. Overall great place to stay with a group and so nice to be able to walk to town and only a five minute drive to the hill. Thanks Todd!

We highly enjoyed our month long stay here in Fernie! The house was beautiful and centrally located. It was very bright and had all the amenities we needed. The mountain view was spectacular and visible from every window. The hiking and biking trails were wonderful!
Great location, excellent value. I will definitely try to stay here again.

Had a wonderful stay at Toddâ€™s gorgeous house! Great location, very close to the downtown strip, shops and food. The beds are so comfortable and the space was beautifully decorated. Todd was always very quick to respond and help us with anything we needed. I would highly recommend staying at Toddâ€™s if you find yourself in Fernie.
We spent the weekend at Toddâ€™s place, it was an amazing house with an amazing location! Would 100% recommend!

Really great space in the middle of town! Stylish, spacious heritage home with space for everyone. Biking/walking distance to all shops and services. Great pump track and splash park around the community center.
Nice clean place. Great Bathrooms. Nice outside area with BBQ. Easy to use appliances and thermostat. Overall great place!
Great house with up to 5 beds if needed. Awesome downtown location for walking to all amenities and easy to hop on trails etc.
The house was very clean and the decor was very nice. Staying in Fernie downtown was very convenient and I enjoyed the neighbourhood.

Really nice property in beautiful town. We were able to enjoy a short walk to get groceries, dine out, or do shopping.  The house was setup great for our family of four.  Fernie is a great vacation spot, and this house is ideally situated. We particularly liked the relaxed feel of this house - plenty of room to relax, read a book, listen to music, or play a family card game.

Unlike some places weâ€™ve stayed, this rental house was updated, the appliances were modern and fully working. Neighbours were quiet. We enjoyed the back yard, deck and bbq.  Perfect vacation house for us.
Great location and very kid friendly!
Excellent location and a great host. Place was as advertised!
Amazing location and a great place. Lots of space, great outdoor space for meals, hanging out and letting the kids get some energy out. Short walk to downtown Fernie for some patio time/shopping.

Toddâ€™s place suited our family well.. a lot of space for kids to play .. house was in an excellent location. Within walking distance to downtown area!
House was not the cleanest. Could use a thorough cleaning throughout. 
If I am in the Fernie area again I would rent Toddâ€™s place again for sure !
Nice and comfy stay. Had a great experience

This is a good sized house only a few minutes walk from the old downtown area of Fernie.  The living areas downstairs are perfect for hanging out, plus there is a good sized back deck with dining table.  It was perfect for a summer break with our family of six.  There's great mountain biking, hiking, rafting and stand-up paddleboarding close by.

Charming and comfortable home, close to downtown, paths and river.
We really appreciated the outside front and back decks.
The back yard was private and quiet.
We enjoyed morning coffee on front deck with beautiful sunshine over the mountains.
Todd was very quick to provide information and responses.
Very easy to check in.
We would stay at Toddâ€™s home again when visiting Fernie.
Great location, extremely easy check in and check out. Would stay again.

We  were definitely happy with our stay at Todd's home.  I was impressed with how clean everything was and we appreciated his quick responses to questions.  Was a great location for our biking weekend.  Will stay there again.
Such a beautiful home! In the perfect location, was sparkling clean, we had the best time! The beds are also so comfy!
Place was generally what we expected. Was disappointed by the response to some inconveniences we experienced when at the house. Otherwise, it was an ok place to stay.

Toddâ€™s house was fantastic!!  We were 5 ladies who were getting together for our 41st consecutive fall trip and we come from all over - with Covid, we needed separate beds and lots of room - this house gave us  that - very comfortable, well appointed with thoughtful (ie masks) touches - very clean and lots of dishes, pots and pans, etc - everything worked and we were very comfortable and felt very safe which, currently, was very important- we will be recommending Toddâ€™s house to all our friends.
Great stay, nice house with a great layout. Kids enjoyed the playhouse in the back :)

The house was beautiful, very clean and spacious for our family trip to Fernie. It was centrally located and we could easy walk anywhere in town. Some kitchen supplies were limited but otherwise this place was absolutely perfect for our family trip!
Super clean character home in the heart of Fernie.

It is a great location and extremely comfortable house. We loved it and would return.

Just note that there is no off street parking and being from out of town, we didnt know when recycling and garbage collection. Lack of glasses and few kitchen utensils, but nothing you that cant get from canadian tire affordably. 

We loved our stay- THANK YOU TODD
Beautiful place and great location. Enjoyed everything.  I will be back !
Toddâ€™s place was very, we nice had a great stay and was in a great location. I look forward to staying here again!
Everything was perfect for a group of 6 and would easily accommodate more. Everything as described and good communication from host.
A unique and beautiful space with a stellar location on a quiet street but still close to the action of Main Street. We will be back!
Todd has a beautiful  home. I would recommend this place to familyâ€™s itâ€™s in close proximity to town very convenient. We had an amazing stay.
Great location and property, perfect for a family.
Awesome place my family had great time
Had a wonderful stay, Todd was a great host! The house was great and we will be back :)
Great place to stay in Fernie!
Very beautiful home, great living room spaces and cozy with the fireplace! Nice and bright with everything we needed for the weekend, great location

Todd is a great host and his place is a wonderful mix of classic, modern and personal touch for Fernie. Location is also prime with short walk to centre of town with moose sightings and the charm that is Fernie. Recommended. My son said it was the most comfortable bed he'd ever slept in. Thanks Todd.

Toddâ€™s house is a good size for our family of six and has a great layout for everyone to have their own space.  Itâ€™s a comfortable place to stay, just a short walk of a couple of blocks to the town centre and an easy drive to the ski hill and other amenities.  Definitely recommended!

Lovely home! 
Cheers!

Todd's place is absolutely gorgeous! 

An elegant historic building with all the modern amenities you could need. Large and spacious, but still warm and cozy. 

We loved hanging out by outdoor firepit and bbq, and we all had a great sleep in the big and comfortable beds.

You also couldn't ask for a better location being right in downtown, walking distance from everything that you need and only a very short drive to the ski hill. 

And with great value for money, we can't say a bad word about this place!
Definitely Definitely Definitely planning on staying again for our next trip to Fernie!

This was a great place to stay. We enjoyed it a lot. Our trip is going to be an annual one and will preferably be at this Airbnb if available. The place was clean and tidy and had a lot to offer, the location was great.

Beautiful place in a great location walking distance to the historic downtown Fernie.
We will be back.
This place is amazing. Itâ€™s very cozy and well maintained. It has everything you need and is close to everything!!!

Todd was an excellent host. The house was fantastic location to downtown. Cool layout and classic architecture. 
Amazing stay!

This place was very beautiful. The master bedroom was very spacious and the living rooms very fantastic.  Overall , a very enjoyable spot for a family. Communication with Todd was very easy, consistent and responsive. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Our stay at Todd's place was fantastic.  We especially appreciated the fans in each of the bedrooms which helped cool the house off at night so sleeping was no problem.  The location is ideal (close to  downtown and Save On Foods), the backyard is set up great for outside dinners and hangouts and lots of space inside. Would highly recommend staying at Todd's and we look forward to coming back!

data.name: The Barn
data.address_address: 112 Sparling Road, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This upper floor suite in West Fernie has amazing views of the Elk River valley. The rural setting is moments from town and a 5 minute drive to the ski resort. Cruise back to The Barn from Eric's Trip mountain bike trail and secure your bike in the locked shed. Have a BBQ on the deck or hang out in the large yard at the edge of the forest.

Newly built unique suite with many custom finishings. Enjoy the Natural Gas grill on the deck while soaking in the views of the mountains around Fernie.

Large yard, bike storage shed and upstairs suite with deck. The lower level garage area is locked off and private.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The lower suite may be occupied by the owner.

This quiet area backs on to parkland.

Plenty of parking in the driveway. Located at the top of the hill above Dairy Queen and the Silver Rock condos, it is a quick bike down the hill and into town. A slightly longer bike ride on the way back up the hill.

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

City of Fernie Business License: #002111

reviews.comment:
Fantastic place and location for Fernie! My partner and I stayed for the week and was everything we couldâ€™ve wanted. Comfortable set-up with a lot of privacy + a quiet place to retire to at the end of the day. Gord has done a great job of soundproofing the barn, even being above the main floor we felt like the whole place was ours.

Gord was a great host, quick to reply to any questions and easy to have a chat with about anything Fernie. 

The barn was extremely tidy and had all the essentials for a great week of riding at the mountain. Just a quick drive to town, easy access to shops, restaurants and about a ten minute drive from the resort. Thank you for hosting us Gord!
The place was just as pictured, with a great kitchen, good socializing area and a cute bedroom.  Excellent value.
This cute and spacious apartment has a great location, beautiful views, good amenities, comfortable bed and timely communication! Our favourite Fernie stay!

Gord's place is nice. It is a 7 minute drive to the ski hill, 4 minutes to downtown, and has all of the necessary amenities. There are plenty of places to hang clothes, a washer/dryer, and the kitchen is really well stocked. The view from the place is pretty as well. The only note to add is that if you care a lot about privacy, you can easily hear the host downstairs when he is around, so I'd assume he can hear you as well.
Great place! Very cozy with a nice view.
Extremely well-appointed unit close to all that Fernie has to offer. 10/10 would stay there again. Thanks, Gord!

Overall this was a good AirBnB find in Fernie. It's a tiny town, so you're about 5 minutes drive away from all the action of downtown, and maybe 10-15 minutes away from the ski resort. The location isn't as secluded as we thought- rather nestled in among other tiny homes and single family homes. But it's right at the top of hill so you catch great views of the mountains. I don't know if more than 2 people would be comfortable staying here, as it's more of a tiny home than a big barn. However, it was sparkling clean and there were plenty of amenities to make yourself at home. The biggest reason I couldn't give this place more stars was the mattress- very thin and uncomfortable. People with back issues or who are just plain picky should be mindful. Our host Gord was an excellent communicator and checked in several times via AirBnB messenger to make sure we were doing okay!
This is a truly relaxing place - we felt immediately at home and look forward to staying again.

Gordâ€™s place is amazing. 

Beautiful views. Cozy space. private. Easy access. 
Close to downtown Fernie. 

Canâ€™t really get much better for Fernie Iâ€™d say. 

Enjoy.
The Barn was a very comfortable and cozy place to stay. I loved the view. Kitchen had everything I needed and it was a great place to stay. Would stay again.
Very peaceful and comfortable place. Accurate description, well-provisioned, spotlessly clean and very homely. We are currently on our second stay!
We had a wonderful stay! The place is absolutely beautiful, quiet, and is very welcoming! We also had a great view of the mountains all around us! We would love to stay here again!
This is a wonderful place. It is great for two, local to the town, with some amazing walks (eg the Goldilocks up at Island Lake).
Gord's place is exactly as pictured. I was not sure if there was another resident below the Barn, but I believe it is just a garage, so you truly have the place to yourself.  I could live here :D
Great place

Amazing suite
Location is phenomenal
Nice deck and bbq to enjoy 
Gord was a great host, offered tips on where to go visit and was very quick to respond if anything came up
Recommend this one. Great place close to everything

John and I loved our stay at the barn. It provided everything we needed with a well stocked kitchen, amazing views and just a quick bike ride away from all activities and the town. We hope to return again soon.

Stayed here for 7 nights for our honeymoon. Gord's home offered exactly what we were looking for. We enjoyed how close it was to Fernie to go and eat, but also enjoyed cooking for ourselves. Gord's kitchen had everything we needed. Gord also hooked us up with some music festival tickets since he couldn't use his. Overall, very pleased with the experience. Would do again. My husband hopes to come back to Fernie alpine resort to finish the downhill mountain bike run he crashed on haha. (He was alright).

Loved our stay at the Barn!
Gird was very responsive and accommodating! The views in the house of the mountains and nature was amazing. Loved the big comfortable bed and kitchen area. We will be back!
Great place, cool location. Private but yet very close the never ending things to do in Fernie.
The apartment is spacious, very clean, well equipped and has everything you need for a relaxing stay.

Very nice rustic cabin, spacious, clean, bright, lots of seating and very comfy recliner. Kitchen is fully equipped, nice warm shower. Amazing views from the living-room. 
We loved the deck and the BBQ. 
You are close to the nature just as much as to the town. 
Very easy check-in. 

The Fernie ski resort is very close by. I highly recommend to take the chairlift and enjoy the views from the observation deck. Also - Silver Spring Lakes hike by Elko is amazing! 

The town has a lot of options for restaurants, coffee shops, grocery shopping. 

This is an ideal spot for someone who likes to enjoy the mountains/countryside but also likes the convenience of the town.

One suggestion that has nothing to do with the cabin - Bring the earplugs as the trains are whistling through Fernie in the middle of the night. 

Highly recommended listing, I would stay again.
Awesome place and great value. GreAt location too

TrÃ¨s bien situÃ©, trÃ¨s privÃ©, relaxant, trÃ¨s bien Ã©quipÃ© sauf pour ceux qui veulent une TV et un air climatisÃ©. Pour le reste câ€™Ã©tait super, nous avons mÃªme prolongÃ© notre sÃ©jour.  Merci Gord ðŸ˜Š
Nice location, nice balcony and BBQ, nice destination after long day of riding

We fell in love with the barn as soon as we walked in! Itâ€™s truly a home away from home with some incredible views of the Fernie area. 
Everything that we needed for our stay was there plus some which made it really hard to leave the beautiful Barn.

The barn is a great spot that feels like home away from home with everything that you would need for a weekend away. We especially liked the kitchen, patio and bookshelf. The location is perfect being close to the highway but feeling like itâ€™s in the mountains.
Great place place. Perfect for a trip to the mountains. Cozy and charming.
Used this Airbnb for our morning of the wedding getting ready and photos and it was the most beautiful place. We are so happy we chose this and I would never stay at any other Airbnb in Fernie!
Beautiful little place, cozy and rustic. Great views and well equipped with all the essentials.

Lovely clean space in a great location that is close to Mt. Fernie Provincial Park. We loved our stay there. Communication, check in, check out, and cleanliness all were great. Would highly recommend staying here.
Nice quiet cozy place in superb location

This is a beautiful space up on a hill with magnificent views of the mountains and a short bike ride to downtown Fernie and you can be on a mountain bike trail within minutes. This is our second time staying here and we love it. Thanks Gord and we hope to stay again soon! 
The Warins
J

This place is perfect to recharge and enjoy the peace and quiet and views of Fernie. Even had some fresh raspberries on the bushes right outside the front door to start our days :) Grab a book, enjoy the views and a beverage and just soak in the beauty of the surroundings.

We had a restorative and relaxing stay at The Barn when we were visiting Fernie. The place is exactly as pictured, gorgeous views and natural light. The tub is a deep soaker style tub which was a lovely surprise and the kitchen was more than stocked with spices etc for cooking.  Our stay exceeded expectations and we would absolutely rebook it in the future. For the price, you can't find better accommodation in Fernie!

My goodness, this was probably the best airbnb we've ever stayed at. So happy we got this place, and we are 100% coming back to the barn. Such a nice place with a beautiful bedroom and comfy bed. So close to town, literally a 10 minute walk. Dont think twice about Gords place!
Very clean and quiet place. Beautiful location and a great host. A very positive experience
The Barn was clean, quiet, and very well appointed. A wonderful place to call home when youâ€™re away from home.

Gordâ€™s place is a perfect place to stay while youâ€™re in Fernie. Not hard to tell why he is rated as a Super Host. Everything you need for a great stay is provided.  Very clean, comfy bed and a full kitchen with everything you need to make a meal. Gas BBQ and a deck with a  beautiful treed back yard were a nice bonus on our sunny stay. Great star watching at night. 
 Mountain views from the large living room window are amazing.
Check in and out were easy. Great communication. Gord was a perfect host. We look forward to staying there again the next time we are in the area. Thanks for a great stay.
Very cute little cabin that is far enough away from things to be private, but is still close everything else in town. The first night we were there we watched some deer graze from the balcony.
5 stars
Had a great experience, the place was wonderful, and the communication couldn't be better!

Perfect spot for outdoor lovers. The view on the mountains is amazing and this place as everything you need to enjoy your stay in Fernie. Full equipped kitchen, heated floor, very comfy bed and rock solid internet!

This is the perfect little home for a coupleâ€™s retreat! Beautiful space, clean, very prompt clear communication, and so many lovely touches like a coffee grinder and French press, lots of spices to cook with, and a deep soaker tub. The views are amazing, and itâ€™s in a perfect location on the hillside overlooking the mountains and valley, but just minutes from everything in town. In every way this  home is an excellent choice!

Clean, comfortable, and most important, quiet!  
Will stay again on my next trip through
The house feels like home, very peaceful and clean. I will for sure come back.
Lovely private house with beautiful views. The kitchen was well equipped, and the layout of the unit was lovely.
Excellent spot, would stay again.

Lorenne and I had a wonderful stay at Gordâ€™s place. The place was very quiet and comfortable and we enjoyed hanging out on the deck. Being a short walk away from town, but still feeling rural and surrounded by views of the forest from the deck was perfect. Definitely hoping to stay here again.
The Barn is a charming place with everything you need - perfect for a single or couple. My favourite part was the private deck!

data.name: Mountain View Two Queens Condo
data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This clean and well-maintained unit at Silver Rock is just the right place for your stay in beautiful Fernie. Just a few short minutes walk to historic downtown Fernie, the Elk River, and a five-minute drive to Fernie Alpine Resort, your stay at SR 207 at Silver Rock will leave you wanting to return, and soon.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

This unit features two comfortable queen beds, two full bathrooms, all kitchen amenities, along with a quaint dining and living room space with gas fireplace. Use the building's pool, hot tub, gym, and underground heated parking to make your stay perfectly complete.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

reviews.comment:
Beautiful condo very clean and very well equipped. The y thought of everything for our comfort. Well located and 7 min from Fernie ski resort. I highly recommend it. 

Denis

We had an amazing stay in Fernie! The space was incredibly clean with absolutely everything we needed. Matthew and Nancy were wonderful to communicate with and made check in a breeze. Would stay again!

Nancy was an amazing host with quick responses and helpful. She also let us check in an hour early as we ended up arriving early. The place was clean and very comfortable. Great amenities. Perfect location as itâ€™s in the middle of the ski hill and downtown ( about a 25 min walk). Definitely would stay here again!
Great location close to both town and the ski hill! The condo was exactly what we needed and Matthew and Nancy were very easy to deal with! We would highly recommend their condo to anyone.
TrÃ¨s bien situÃ©, Ã  quelques minutes de la station de ski, tranquille, propre, plaisant de pouvoir avoir accÃ¨s Ã  la piscine en fin de journÃ©e.  Sans hÃ©sitation, je recommande cet endroit.
Very comfy, clean, hosts were wonderful!

Matt and Nancy's place is perfect for 2 couples or a family. It is centrally located between town and the ski hill. The complex offers a gym, pool and the hot tub was always a social gathering spot. We would highly recommend staying with them at Silver Rock.
Very nice unit. Quiet and hot tub, pool and sauna quiet and very good.
Great place to stay very nice and clean.  There is underground parking a locker for your ski gear and  the Hot tub was great after a day of skiing.
A great place to stay for a ski trip. Very convenient location between the mountain and downtown, plenty of room, excellent amenities, and very responsive hosts!

We loved this unit. It was perfect for the three of us. The unit is lovely and had everything we needed. Communication and check in was very easy close to town and skiing. We will definitely stay again.
Thank you

Matthew and Nancy's place was the perfect gateway for our mini ski vacation. Conveniently located 10mins away from Fernie Alpine Resort, it made our travels to and from the hill really quick and easy. The access to the pool and hot tub facilities also helped with those sore ski muscles! The place is very clean, and the two bathrooms definitely make it easy to share the space with multiple people. Matthew and Nancy were quick to respond to our messages and provided very clear instructions and directions to their place. Thank you for having us!

I recommend Matt and Nancy's condo in Fernie.  It is perfectly situated with many amenities including underground parking.  Our hosts were very responsive and made our stay 5 star.  The beds were very comfortable which was important as we were there for two weeks.  Thank you Matt and Nancy, we would definitely stay with you again!
Amazing stay it was clean and close to everything. They were incredible hosts and very helpful!

The condo was in a great location. Right across the street you can connect on to walking and biking trails. Short walk to downtown Fernie. The place was very clean and communication was great with Matthew. The amenities were not available during this time. Would definitely stay here again and highly reccomend.
Exactly as advertised. Comfortable condo in a quiet building, walking distance to town if you like (10-15 mins). Easy to access, good communication, just what you need.
We loved our stay here!  Place is extremely clean, comfy beds and great linens.  We cooked all our meals in the condo and had everything we needed.  We definitely recommend this condo.

Matthews place was exactly as advertised! Location was right off the highway which was convenient and the condo was very clean and comfortable. Absolutely would recommend to anyone looking for a great stay at a great deal!
Great space, clean and cozy with a well stocked kitchen.

Nice and sparkling clean apartment, has everything you might need. Location is great: quick bike ride to ski resort, downtown and all the bike trailheads in town. There are plenty of bike racks to lock your bikes inside the garage. Would definitely recommend Matthew's place to other travelers and will be happy to come back during our next visit to Fernie.
Really comfortable stay. A problem with one of the amenities was dealt with very quickly and courteously - the mark of true hospitality.
Great place to stay in Fernie. Close to all spots of town and great area.
We had a very comfortable stay and everything was exactly as expected. Thank you for the easy communication and responsiveness to help make our visit to Fernie smooth.
This condo was very clean. The beds and linens were very nice, and the kitchen was well-equipped. Great location in Fernie.
Nice condo in a great location! Would recommend.
Very clean, spacious, great location (walking distance to downtown), underground parking, no issues checking in/out as instructions provided were clear. We would definitely stay here again!

We had an extended stay here while my husband was working in the area and I worked remotely. We also had some family stay with us sprinkled throughout our time and the space fit us all well. It has everything and more than we needed, I was super impressed to even find a French press and coffee grinder! Our hosts were very quick to reply to any questions. Would recommend 100%.
Very clean space, as described. Matthew was very helpful and will 100% stay again.
Great hospitality, cleanliness on point, good location!
Our stay here was great!

Beautiful cozy place to spend your getaway, itâ€™s close to stores, restaurants and ski resort 
We will definitely go back

The place was clean,  the linens and towels were nice quality, as was the soap. Plenty of kitchen utensils. Entrance we easy. Matthew was always attentive and quick with the communications. However despite the attention to these details, the fireplace was not working. It was  annoying to have to fiddle around with the fireplace to light the pilot light. It didn't light straight away and took a number of attempts to get the pilot light going, but as it turned out we could not get the fireplace to work.  Matthew said they would have to get a gas fitter in.  Too bad. It would have been nice to have the fireplace going as we were for the end of Dec. The doors were squeaky and in need of a good spray of WD40.
Great clean place. Matthew was a great host. We will be back.

Great location, close to the ski hill, easy self-check in with underground parking and additional outdoor parking if needed. Felt very cozy, spacious, cute decorations, very clean, and quick responses from owner. Highly recommend and will stay again. Recommend bring ear plugs as the walls can be a bit thin sometimes and weekends can get noisy with other visitors in the building.
Perfect location! Great access and parking. Super clean and was a awesome stay! Would definitely come back!
Matthew is a great host, he answers very quickly and is very helpful through the booking and staying experience. Location is good. Itâ€™s convenient to use the facilities prepared.

Booked Mattâ€™s condo for a couple day ski get away with my daughters.  Place was perfect for that.  Less then 5 minutes to the hill.  Condo has a warm, like being at home feeling and has all the amenities you need to be at home away from home. Right on the edge of town, so close to enjoy all that Fernie has to offer as well.  Matt was quick to respond to any of my questions, and made it super simple to book and have all the information you need for arrival.  Will be booking this place again for sure.
Great place with everything you would ever need.  Great spot to get away and visit Fernie!
This is go to! Donâ€™t miss out!
Great location and easy access and quick responses!
Very comfortable and well stocked condo. It's well located and quiet. The kitchen has all the appliances, pots and utensils you can need. We felt at home!

We loved our stay at Matt's condo while down in Fernie for a small get away. His place was very clean and comfortable - Home away from home. Matt was quick to respond with any questions. Thank you and cannot wait to stay here again in the future ðŸ˜ƒ

Great place with excellent access to the ski hill (only 5 minutes away) the kitchen was very well equipped and the bedrooms were very good sizes. Matt was extremely organized and very good at communicating.

data.name: Renovated Haven at Fernie Alpine Resort
data.address_address: 4559 Timberline Crescent, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
The best ski-in/bike-in location on the ski hill in Fernie. This unit features epic morning views of the Lizard Range, and provides a beautifully renovated space for you and your loved ones to sit back and relax while spending time in the mountains. Just a few minutes drive to town, Timberline is perfect for that weekend getaway all year round.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The sauna and hot tubs are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

This renovated condo features two full bedrooms with queen beds, and two full bathrooms, along with all amenities. Guests also have access to a pool table downstairs, and can stay on the hill for dinner at the nearby Rusty Edge Bar & Grill. A hot tub is also available for guests to use following a full day of adventuring in the mountains. Close to cross country ski trails, mountain bike trails, and the ski hill.

The entire unit plus a shared hot tub.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Timberline Condos are located at Fernie Alpine Resort. They are a ski-in complex, with a short walk to the lifts.

Fernie's historic downtown is an 8 minute drive. During winter months, you can also use the ski shuttle to town which picks up just a short walk away.

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

reviews.comment: Great place made for an awesome weekend in Fernie! Thanks so much!
Nice views, good location, peaceful. Really enjoyed staying here
Very nice condo and good location.  Condo has been updated and is very comfortable.  We enjoyed our stay and recommend it to others.
The condo is withing comfortable distance to the ski lifts.  The unit is nicely renovated.  The kitchen is truly amazing. Beds and bedding are very comfortable.  Nice place to stay!
Great location for Fernie skiing, clean unit.
Fantastic Fernie ski condo, in all respects. Amazing location, gorgeous views of the mountain, nicely furnished...everything was great. We will definitely stay here again.
Great location, excellent amenities
A very comfortable, spacious, and well equipped condo very close to the resort. Only about 5-10 minutes of walking to lifts. We had a lovely couple of days of skiing here.
Great spot! Great location (5-10min walk to ski lifts, or a very quick drive). Beautiful view of the mountain! Comfy beds, couches, cozy fireplace. Easy check in.

Everything you need for a successful mountain stay is at your fingertips. Clean and comfortable condo thatâ€™s only a short walk to the mountain and also only quick drive into town. Loved hanging by the fireplace after a long day skiing. The hosts were helpful and responsive and I definitely recommend a stay here for anyone who is thinking of it.
Very nice place very close to the ski hill with comfortable beds and a cozy kitchen
Great place! Highly recommend! Very convenient if you are headed to the mountain! Also, great view from the living room windows!
The place was perfect for two couples- it's nice that we could each have our own room and bathroom. The fire place and communal hot tub were both great after a snowy day on the hill!
Matt and Nancy's place was great! Clean, spacious and within a 10 min walking distance to the chairlift which was really lovely! Would stay again.
Extremely clean and comfortable. Hosts were great at communicating and many amenities were welcome.

Matthew and Nancy's apartment is comfortable and nice and close to Fernie Ski Resort.  The apartment is well appointed and commands a great view of the ski hill.  Matthew and Nancy provided many thoughtful touches and we found the kitchen well supplied. Overall, we enjoyed our stay in the apartment and found Matthew and Nancy to be very welcoming hosts.
Great base for Fernie adventures.  The place was super clean and kitchen was well equipped to make meals. Overall, great pet friendly rental!
Great accommodations at a reasonable price. The place looks exactly as shown in the pics. Very clean, modern, and well equipped. Will definitely stay again.
Sweet view
Great place to stay, very clean and well appointed - would definitely book again.
Great communication. Dealt with a couple requests quickly and efficiently.  Awesome location. Loved that itâ€™s quiet and no partying.

The location is great! Nice family oriented little area. The host was very prompt at responding to messages so it made communication very easy. Definitely a spot you want to hit up in the winter as skiing and snowboarding will be at your fingertips! I definitely recommend visiting this location and staying at this cute little condo!
Perfect location and wonderful home! Thanks for having us !

A beautiful condo with great views. 
Very quiet and comfortable unit. 
Matthew was excellent to deal with. Very quick responses to any questions or concerns we had. We would stay here again.

Nice apartment! 2 bedroom with 2 full bathrooms. Great for 2 couples. Kitchen area is very nice and can tell itâ€™s been newly renovated. Very easy to make a few meals in the kitchen. Basic cooking supplies are provided (oil, salt and pepper, etc) which was super helpful for us. Place is exactly as described. Really loved that it was pet friendly and the location right at the base of the ski hill was lovely.

Our stay at Mathew and Nancy's place was excellent!  (the only negative was totally out of their control - the wildfire smoke ruined the views!).  The condo was clean, cheerful and loaded with all the things to make our stay simple and worry free.  We wouldn't hesitate to return!

A beautiful space, very comfortable. I want to move here! We traveled just as a couple but we loved having 2 bathrooms. We only cooked breakfast in the suite but it was a great kitchen with tons of â€˜basicsâ€™. We were happy to find a fresh press! Matthew was quick to respond to any questions and we would definitely recommend this space!

Amazing stay!! The condo was unbelievably well stocked; they had all the basics and SO many other fun things like Starbucks coffee, a cookie mix, avocado oil, etc! The condo was in an amazing location; beautiful view! Super clean and had a great layout!
Spectacular view and location at Fernie Alpine Resort. Stocked with some kitchen staples which came in very handy for us. We will be back!
Great location, and cozy warm space.
Perfect little condo on the hill

reviews.comment: Matthews place was very clean and the kitchen had everything we needed. We would recommend!
All good, I recommend the place for sure as we have booked again for a full month next week.
Very spacious and clean place! Host replies very fast and is super helpful!
All good we stayed there for 2 months and would stay again.
Had an amazing 2 month stay at this beautiful condo, close to amenities, great communication with hosts, highly recommend this place if you are deciding to take a vacation to Fernie.
Very nice and clean. Everything you need in the kitchen

Perfect condo for a small family or two couples! Location is highly accessible from the highway and yet still very close to downtown.  Matthew was extremely accommodating and quick to respond to any and all of our inquiries. Ample parking for vehicles, less so for trailers but still very manageable. Due to COVID-19 we were unable to use the pool or hot tub but we did take a peek at it and it looks nice and inviting. Good amenities (i.e. coffee pot, washer/dryer, fast-boil kettle, natural gas fireplace, BBQ, local soaps in the bathrooms, etc.), with the exception of glassware, so I'd recommend brining along some red solo cups. There is a beautiful little hike about a 5 minute drive called Fairy Creek Falls - I highly recommend this for a short jaunt in nature if time permits! Overall I'd recommend a stay here if you ever find yourself in Fernie!
Wonderful host, very quick to respond and easy to deal with.  Will stay again when we return in April!
Great support and responses from the owners!
Good location close to Fernie Alpine Resort. Place was very clean when we arrived and had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again!
Very clean nice place to stay
As advertised. Clean and well organized. Lots of space.
Matthews place was gorgeous! Great location, super communication and easy to check in and out. So clean and great amenities! Thank you Matthew!
great place, great location. had everything we needed for our month long stay.

The communication from Matthew was excellent, we were made to feel very welcome. The unit was spotlessly clean, and contained everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  We especially appreciated the fact that the air conditioning was on when we arrived, as it was a very hot day.  The location is great, and the underground parking was also appreciated on hot days.  We enjoyed our stay, and will definitely be back.
Great stay!

data.name: Luxury and Comfort King Suite
data.address_address: 1500 McDonald Avenue, V0B 1M1, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This easily accessible, quiet condo is exactly what you're looking for when you stay in Fernie. Within walking distance to downtown's wide-variety of unique restaurants and nightlife, and nearby to Elk River trails and mountain view patios, this condo at Silver Rock has everything you need for your stay.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The gym is closed indefinitely due to Covid.

A super comfortable, king-size bed, full bathroom, all amenities in the kitchen, and access to Silver Rock's swimming pool, hot tub, gymnasium, and underground heated parking. Condo is accessible via lockbox for your convenient arrival.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Silver Rock is located just off of Highway 3 by the Dairy Queen.

Ski shuttle picks up nearby in the winter.

reviews.comment: Great place and good location close to everything fernie has to offer would recommend to stay here
Loved our stay - beautiful condo: clean, bed was fantastic and hosts were great. We look forward to staying there again!
Comfortable condo well located for both the ski hill and downtown Fernie.
Great location, the apartment was sparkling clean, the bed was very comfy and it included all the amenities! any question was responded promptly. I would love to stay there again :)
We had a great weekend away in Fernie and really enjoyed the cozy unit.
Very convenient for biking!
Great Location. The underground parking was an excellent perk. It's a nice place and Matthew was super efficient at responding to my questions.
Great location in Fernie.  Close to everything but very quiet.  Well equipped and functional but not fancy.
The apartment is clean and communications are almost instantaneous! Thanks for a restful stay--I got lots of work done at the table.

I have had some issues getting things going, after contacting Matthew he replied very quickly with precise information that resolved any issue right away.
The bed squeaked a little here and there but nothing you won't be able to handle. 

I can definitely recommend the place and I'd stay there again.
This place was perfect for getting away for a few days, and Matthew was always quick to respond to our questions! Some local soaps in the bathroom was a nice touch
Good location at silver rock
Easy to communicate and navigate the instructions.
Spacious one bedroom minutes away from the mountain. Matthew was a responsive host and easy to get a hold of. Would stay again

Matthews place is exactly as advertised. 
Clean, comfortable and a good location.
Great value. You won't be disappointed.
Excellent location, halfway between the ski hill and town! Matthew was very quick to respond to any questions. The place is very clean, welcoming. We wouldnâ€™t hesitate to stay there again!
Quiet, (patio faces side street) comfortable and relaxed suit, clean, and great response time from host.

The location was great and the condo is on the back side away from the highway. While the listing says luxury, is say it's comfortable. If you are planning to do your own cooking, you'll need to bring everything for cooking. Spices, oils, sugar, coffee, tea. I've never stayed at an airbnb that didn't have a little welcome package with a few items to start your first morning. Even hotels give you coffee! Hopefully the host will look into the very squeeky bed! It's been mentioned a few times in the reviews. Lastly, communication is very prompt and efficient. It's too bad the amenities were closed due to covid.

This top floor 2 bedroom condo in the Juniper Lodge has high ceilings and some of the best views of the ski hill. Wake up and scope your fresh lines from in front of the fireplace, or while getting fresh air from the covered patio area. Full access to multiple hot tubs, ski storage, BBQ's and Sauna.

Nice place
A great, well appointed apartment close to the slopes. Very clean with all amenities. Walkable to ski lift and a short drive into Fernie Town itself. Would stay there again.
Unit was just what we expected, amazing mountain views. Short walk to the lifts. Host was always quick to respond. Highly recommend this condo!
Beautiful views and a wonderful place to stay!
Lovely place. Air conditioning was only in one bedroom and the other areas and bedroom was very hot. Other than that, it was a great place to stay.
Juniper lounge was great place to stay it was Located at base of Mtn Fernie and offered great amenities and views.
We had a great stay. Lots of space for our family and we enjoyed sitting on the balcony and taking in views of the mountains.
A beautiful spot with breathtaking mountain views. The place was sparkling clean and the air conditioning was an added bonus !

This is a great place to stay. Ideally located on the ski hill with amazing views. Very functional space with lots of essentials at your disposal to make cooking easy but still clean and not cluttered at all.
Great place to stay in Fernie, superb view and the place was very clean and had everything you need for a family vacation . Would recommend it to anyone !
This condo is located in a very nice area with spectacular view of the mountain. Only a few minor items in the property should be fixed. Loved our stay in Fernie.
Overall a nicely equipped condo with good amenities.

Nearly 4000$ a month with no wiggle room after booking for two straight months. Beds are average if that. Couch and chairs are very uncomfortable. TVs are literally the smallest TVs in the world. Heated flooring works in 1/4 of the floors itâ€™s been installed into. Water takes forever to get hot. Great location terrible amenities
This was my second time staying here and Graham has made some nice improvements to make the place even better than it already was.
Great all around condo, excellent location, 5 minute walk to store and 10 to hill.
Great place

Would go back in a heartbeat! Condos offer everything you need, it s spacious and well furnished. So appreciated to have sone of the food basics there ( sugar salt vinegar oil coffee tea...) the heating floors in the bathrooms are a plus! Perfect location. Close for the slopes, but not too close, so it s very quiet. Great stay!

The place was clean and as described. The kids enjoyed having a room to themselves with there own microwave, bathroom and mini fridge. They felt independent. 
The views of the hill when you wake up in the morning are great. 
Communication was great and check in is simple. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks
Great space with an awesome view of the hill!
Amazing place to stay while in fernie! Extremely clean, organized and very simple all well receiving great communication. 5/5 would recommend!

It features a spacious master bedroom with walk in shower in a private ensuite, HD Smart TV's, Fireplace and a large sectional couch to relax on after a long day on the slopes. You also have access to the multiple hot tubs and saunas of the Timberline lodges.

PLEASE BE ADVISED:
The sauna and hot tubs are closed indefinitely due to Covid.

Modern, Fresh, Clean and well equipped. The mountain views are stunning!

Full access to the entire condo and all of the Timberline Lodges amenities (not the King Fir Lodge Pool though)

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

Beautiful place!
This place is perfect very clean and well located
Great! Place only down fall is no air conditioning but the windows left open it will cool off!! 10/10 would recommend
Beautiful place.... We will be back ðŸ‘
As advertised. Great value.
Apartment was nice and clean.  costumer service was very good .Thanks Brian
Amazing condo! It was perfect for our golf getaway!  We will definitely be back!
Beautiful space! Lovely location with great access for skiing. Quiet too!

Great place with a stunning view! Brian is a very thoughtful host. The condo is equipped with literally everything and anything that you can think of. Brian responds quickly to messages. The condo is as advertised , beautiful, very clean, cosy and quite.
Brian was very helpful and efficient! Fantastic place, looking forward to staying there again in the new year.
Clean. Comfortable. Convenient. Two minute walk to ski lifts - was great that we could come back to condo for lunch instead of navigating the busy lodges and restaurants.

Thank you so much for the awesome stay!  We had such a great holiday amidst the craziness of this Covid-Christmas season.  Your place is perfect!  Great location (short up hill walk to the lifts, but very manageable), so comfortable and clean.   We had one small issue with the ski locker, but Brian fixed it right away.  Everything else about our stay was perfect.  We especially loved the large seating area in the living room, and all the little touches (salt and pepper, Saran Wrap, cooking oil, very well equipped kitchen).  Thanks again for a great stay!
Thank for offering your unit ... fantastic location, views, accommodations
Beautiful view. Great kitchen and living area. Very convenient to the hill.
Lovely condo, very spacious and stylish, with amazing views of the hill.
Well appointed and stylish mountain retreat with unobstructed view of the hill.  Quiet unit with large comfortable rooms for a family of 4.  Minutes from the hill. Would book again.
Great place.  Very nicely remodelled.  Quick drive to base of mountain to drop off skiers.  Could walk there in about 7-10 minutes, but easier to drop off.  Can ski home.
Awesome place! Great ski in and out, helped us make the most of our Fernie experience!

Brianâ€™s place is an excellent choice in the Fernie Alpine Resort area. My family stayed for a month and the condo was a great home away from home. The modern upgrades were well done and made the space feel comforting. The views from the living room are unforgettable!

reviews.comment: This place is awesome. Comfy and super quiet. Kevin was easy to communicate with and so friendly.  We loved having the living area and the kitchen.  5 stars all around.

If you are traveling through Fernie, this is the perfect place to stay. It is located at the base of the ski hill surrounded by mountains and nature. The unit is on the main floor so it made for easy loading and unloading of our gear. The building was quiet and the space was perfect for our little family. The living room was cozy with the fireplace and the bathroom had a deep tub to soak in. We loved the local all-natural body and hand soaps available for use. Kevin was a pleasure to communicate with, quick to respond and checked in from time to time to make sure we had everything we needed. We would definitely come back next time we are in the area.

We canâ€™t say enough nice things about our stay in Jenniferâ€™s condo. The condo has all the comforts of home and you have a fairly short walk to the lifts. data.name: 3 bed 3 bath Riverside Condo
data.address_address: 1300 Riverside Way, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Disinfectant treatment included in cleaning fee.

One of the nicest floor plans at Riverside; with a short set of stairs to the front door, 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms and a large bright recreation/media room. Brand new queen mattress in the master bedroom.

The main floor has 2 master bedrooms, each with 4 piece en suite bathrooms. The kitchen, dining room and living room area has a river rock gas fireplace with a log mantle. The dining area has patio doors leading to a private covered deck with magnificent views of the valley. This space is equipped with a gas BBQ and seating for four. Down the log railing staircase is the recreation/media room, another bedroom, bathroom, large den/storage, laundry & mechanical room. This unit even has air conditioning. Plenty of room for 2 families!

Full access to the entire condo.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Riverside Condos are located conveniently between the ski hill and downtown Fernie, right along the Elk River.

Ski shuttle picks up just down the street at the Hotel.

Strictly enforced quiet time from 11PM - 7AM. $200 fine for contravention.

reviews.comment: We booked this to celebrate my nephew's 12th birthday. The space was great. The upstairs level had a nice fireplace and the bedrooms and bathrooms were large and comfortable. The downstairs level had another full size bathroom as well as another bedroom. The entertainment space was immense, with a massive couch that we all lounged on and played games. It was great having the smart TV's upstairs and downstairs, as it allowed us to easily put on some movies. Lots of parking and the location to Fernie itself was nice. A gas station was nearby as well as a number of restaurants and playgrounds. The only negative we really had was the bbq wasn't clean and we couldn't find anything to clean it with. Otherwise it was a great spot and one we'd definitely look at staying at again.

Two entertainment areas for families to enjoy their own spaces. Kitchen is well appointed for cooking. With 3 sleeping areas and 3 bathrooms/showers as well - it was overall a great space. Laundry units are in the space as well but bring your own laundry detergents if you want to do laundry.

reviews.comment: Good bed super clean, would stay again

Not horrible, but there are better places to stay in Fernie. We only stayed there because the other place, where we wanted to stay, got booked for our dates. And we decided to stay in this place because of better pictures and that we assumed there will be all the necessary cutlery, but there is nothing. Only microwave and empty boxes. My mistake that I didn't contact the host before booking and asked if they had any cutlery and kettle in the room, but I assumed that if they have a microwave and cutlery cabinet in the pictures they must have everything inside. Anyway, I want to leave this review for other people who might make the same assumption. There are no cutlery, kettle, or anything else except microwave, soap in the bathroom, towels, and TV
Awesome location just a quick drive to the ski hill!

this place is a great bang for your buck. although it lacks some amenities (kettle or coffee pot) as long as your prepared your stay will be great. I've stayed in other suites in this same complex and my general consensus is the rooms run warm so you will be toasty warm. The yard lights are a bit bright so bring a eye mask if you need pitch black to sleep. But location to the ski hill, cleanliness and price are totally worth it. I'd stay again!
Great stay!
Very affordable, great location!
Terrific room for a last minute stay, very clean and accessible.
Great stay! Thank you Micheal for your great communication, good spot for an affordable rate.

Clean  facility and very comfy bed but zero amenities such as dishes, toaster, kettle, drinking glasses.  Dated decor but I expect that for the price paid however not being able to boil water or make coffee for breakfast is not what I expect for an AirBnB.

Clean, affordable place near the ski hill!

Stayed here for a month while attending the college, very responsive host the place is awesome to stay at no complaints at all, I highly recommend staying here you wonâ€™t be disappointed!

data.name: Aspen walkout end unit with massive master bedroom
data.address_address: 4559 Timberline Crescent, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This isn't your standard Timberline condo. This spacious corner unit on the ground floor, features a walkout (ski up to!) deck, a massive master bedroom and double bunk room, making this ideal for families. Access to multiple communal hot tubs, sauna and games rooms (which are currently closed due to covid unfortunately)

2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and spacious living/dining / kitchen area.

Full access to the entire condo except for one closet which is locked for owner storage. You will also have access to the communal hot tubs, BBQ's, sauna's and games rooms of Timberline

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Timberline Condos are located at Fernie Alpine Resort. They are a ski-in complex, with a short walk to the lifts.

Fernie's historic downtown is an 8 minute drive. During winter months, you can also use the ski shuttle to town which picks up just a short walk away.

Must climb a flight of stairs up to the suite.

reviews.comment:
Terry and her husband Ron shared their lovely home with us. It is a well appointed 2br/2ba condo that was five minutes from the slopes. 

We cooked and the kitchen is well equipped...and we even did our dirty laundry before packing up and heading home. 

Due to COVID, the hot tubs we closed which was disappointing, but we get it. Donâ€™t hesitate to stay with these lovely people in their lovely rental unit.
Ron was a great host!  The condo is perfect!  Very cosy and clean. A big bonus that it is on the ground floor and you can walk off the deck!  Very well equipped kitchen and great soaps and shampoos

Great condo for our family visit to Fernie. Condo was really well equipped and we were able to cook all our meals with no problem. Great touches like games, and a nice welcome note from the owners on arrival. Private entrance/exit off patio provided a good alternative to the main door and hallway during covid. Although the hallway was always quiet. Nice building, not too noisy. Location is really good for skiing Fernie. Short walk or drive to the base area. We loved skiing Fernie, lots of harder terrain for the adults and great beginners area for our kid.

Great condo for the weekend and an even better location. Communication with the host was prompt and they were very easy to deal with. We stayed the weekend after Family Day long weekend, the hill wasn't too busy. Location is an easy walk to the hill which is exactly what we were looking for. Would definitely recommend to friends and family!

Ron and Terry are excellent hosts! The communication was great- a skill that is particularily in covid time times. Beautiful space, welcoming space. Great location. They even left us a card and chocolates. Highly recommend.
Ron is a wonderful host, very communicative and provides some lovely special touches for his guests. If you are looking for a cozy on-hill spot with easy access to FAR this is it!

TrÃ¨s belle place, bon spot, la division des chambres est vraiment bien fait pour avoir de lâ€™intimitÃ© si vous voyagez avec vos enfants ou couple dâ€™amis. Tout est extra propre, (petite attention trÃ¨s apprÃ©ciÃ©, les poÃªlons sont tous neufs et non adhÃ©sifs)
Beautiful condo within minutes walk to the chair lift.
A very comfortable stay.

reviews.comment:
Really clean and tidy suite â€” a small but functional space with everything you need for a short stay. Great location with easy walking distance to Fernie downtown and a short drive to the slopes. 

Only downside we found is that as the suite is attached to the main house there was a lot of loud house chatter and strong smells from the kitchen (separated by just a door) which seemed to linger in the suite. We did mention to the host and the noise level improved, just don't expect ideal conditions for relaxing in your room.
Locations accurate itâ€™s quite literally 5 minutes from downtown. Place looked modern and clean. Check in is easy and host is polite. Would stay here again!
Very clean well located Airbnb
Nice place, good location, comfy bed, excellent host.

Lovely place to stay! The space was cute and perfect. Within walking distance to downtown Fernie. Marcie made it easy to check in and keep in contact incase we needed anything. Would definitely stay again.
Great host! Love to stay with her again. Great location to walk into downtown. Easily accessible.
Marcie's place is perfect for two people. Really clean and only a few minutes walk from downtown. She was really responsive and her place was really well maintained.
Marcie is a great host. She is really nice and replies instantly to messages. Her place was super clean and cosy. We really liked to stay there and would always come back.
We had a great time staying here! It was in a good location. We would recommend this space to others travelling through Fernie.
A little tight quarters but nice and new.
Marcieâ€™s place was just what I needed :) a private, clean, and stylish room perfectly located in Fernie ðŸ˜ŠðŸ–¤

Excellent location. I truly valued how safe & private it was including the fenced yard, lighting & entrance. Parking was a big plus. I loved my stay - it was spotless, comfortable, great bathroom (brand new, power shower), excellent bedding. I had a great stay & will be sure to stay again. Marcie was very accommodating, welcoming & communicative. Perfect mini break for a solo traveller or couple.  Thanks, Marcie!
perfect little spot, walk to town, super easy breezy to deal with and access.  Thanks Marcie!
Great place and value. Was relaxing and comfortable and close to downtown.
Clean, right downtown, it's small, but worked for what we needed it for.
Cute house in a cute city. Perfect stay. Super clean!!

This small suite was nice and clean,  with easy check in and perfect location, and Marcie was very communicative. As a note, you can definitely hear what's going on in the rest of the house, but it didn't bother me and it was quiet at night. Overall solid place when you're in Fernie!

Cozy and clean space. While not a large space, the space was utilized well and it didnâ€™t feel crammed.  Perfect for a weekend in Fernie!

Minutes away from downtown and a wide variety of shops and restaurants, a grocery store, and more. 

The space was extremely tidy and welcoming. I felt very secure. 

There was some noise from the house around dinner time but I barely noticed. No noise in the evening and slept through the night. Comfortable bed and temperature. 

Would definitely recommend!

Really clean and quiet little space, good to spend a few nights while in town or passing through. All the amenities and truly a 5 minute walk from the main downtown street. Easy check in and Marcie is super communicative!
Great place to stay, I walked to downtown Fernie a couple times. Good location. Room is exactly as shown and sparkling clean!

reviews.comment: Great place! Came here for the weekend with my brother. Would stay again, the only thing that was unfortunate was no hot top or stove top, other then that, amazing! Check in was seamless and had no issues!

Lukeâ€™s place was excellent for a couple night stay , very clean and spacious . Bed was great and comfortable. Only drawback would be lack of cooking ability as it only had a microwave , but if only for a couple days and prepared for that , the stay is great !

A good base for a couple looking for straightforward accommodation for a ski trip. Luke was incredibly responsive and caring. The suite was spacious and clean. Location is good, quick drive to the ski hill or walk to downtown. Heated floor in the bathroom is a treat! Plenty of room to dry wet ski clothes. Cooking facilities are limited with just a microwave, small fridge and kettle. We were woken up once by noises from upstairs, but we were expecting to be living beneath people so sounds and cooking smells did not bother us too much.

My girlfriend and I loved our stay at Lukeâ€™s place. The space is very comfortable and super tidy, making it really feel like home. 
Everything was as expected and Lukeâ€™s communication is  terrific, always making sure we were happy with our stay. 
We hope to return some day!
Great home base for a trip. Nice quiet area, easy to check in with the separate entrance. The place was really clean and Luke was easy to communicate with. Would stay again!
Luke's place is excellent! We stayed there to ski Fernie for the weekend and it was a great decision! Close to downtown, with lots of food options.
This space is incredibly clean, is advertised with gracious hosts and quick communication. I will stay here again next time through Fernie!

Luke's place is great - lots of space and nice touches, and very clean and welcoming. It's easy to find and just a quick walk to downtown Fernie, so it served our needs perfectly. We recommend it strongly.

Lukeâ€™s place was just what I needed. Great location, quick response, super clean, and comfortable. 
The only con is not having a stove top, toaster, and some basic kitchen stuff, like teas, sugar, salt, etc. That is just a small but. 
The place is spacious, and perfect for quick stays! 
Thank you again for hosting!
I couldnt have asked for a better place to stay for the week long trip in Fernie.   I would recommend Lukes place to anyone.   Very clean. Very comfortable.  Excellent value!
Lukeâ€™s place is very spacious, clean and great for our short stay in fernie! Itâ€™s only a 3min drive from downtown! Would definitely recommend this place
Great little place for the price. Such an amazing view of the ski hill on the drive up. Easy quick walk to downtown. Luke was a great host and would recommend his place.
Great place to stay. Highly recommend to others.

data.name: Beautiful, clean 2 bedroom condo with loft.
data.address_address: Riverside Way, V0B, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This is a beautiful 2 bedroom Condo with an upstairs loft (Business License #002197). It is well cared for and very clean. It has everything you will need for your vacation. You will feel right at home. It is a perfect condo complex for families and people who want a quiet, relaxing getaway. You are surrounded by beautiful views!

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Please Note: The condominium by-law has an established â€œquiet timeâ€ from 11:00 PM â€“ 7:00 AM. This by-law is enforced and fines are issued if an incident report is filed by security for "excessive noise". The definition of excessive noise during quiet time is noise from one unit that pervades into another during this time. All fines will be paid by the renter via the security deposit if a fine is issued to the owner after your stay.
