reviews.comment: Awesome location, plenty of space, and Paul was super nice and helpful. 10/10 would recommend!
beautiful place and wonderful location! paul was very quick to respond to any questions
Enjoyed this very spacious bright condo. Great for many friends or 2 families!
Clean, well-equipped and well-set up for two young families for a weekend ski getaway.

Paul's place was fantastic! We enjoyed the kitchen and living space and were very impressed with the number of beds in the loft! Paul was extremely helpful and was available for anything we needed! Would definitely stay here again! He even let us check out late!!!!

The place was exactly as described no real major surprises other than the toaster was not working but we just improvised and used the broil on the oven. Our host also offered to replace it promptly but as I said not a big issue. Outside of that it does have an open loft so if you are trying to get someone to sleep up there whilst activities carry on in the evening and or you are getting up early in the morning and are trying to get stuff done in kitchen without waking anyone else up the open concept could be a problem but was not an issue for our group.  Good location, good accommodations & our host Paul was very thorough and responsive.
Paul's place is great for a large family, or two small families. Close to the ski hill, great mountain bike trails, and the river.
Great location.  Great communication.  And very clean.
Beautiful home.  Paul is very accomodating and even calls to see if we have any questions. I would recommend his home to anyone and would go back in an instant!
Great place for a ski weekend with friends!
Excellent place! very roomy and clean. Would definitely book again!

Great place to stay.  Very cozy place.  Extremely clean. Paul is a great host. Always available on the phone with anything you need answered.  Great location for both town and skiing.  Nice quiet area. Lots of hiking and sight seeing.  We really enjoyed our stay.   Thanks again Paul. 

Ps we had our Christmas there and Paulâ€™s kitchen is more equipped than any other kitchen in any Airbnb we have stayed at. It made our lives a lot easier!
Paul is a great host. Makes sure you are aware of all aspects of your trip.
Excellent place to stay.  We would come back again.  Paul was great to work with and he made things very easy.  Thanks Paul

Paul's place is in a great location. Ample room for our family to spread out (in terms of sleep) and kitchen seating. The two rooms on the main floor are nice and dark which is great for little ones. The upper loft gets more sunlight as it is a loft. There are some dark room dividers that can help a bit with that during longer summer days. All rooms and loft have ceiling fans and the A/C makes for a comfortable stay. Kitchen well stocked. Excellent communication. Overall, a very good stay.
Great place to stay in Fernie! Paul was great at communicating and answering questions and the place was clean and comfortable.

Such a lovely condo. Very clean, quiet, spacious, and located right in between town and the ski hill.

The two patios front and back were such a nice bonus, too.

Check in was so easy with the lockbox. Would 100% recommend and stay again!
Great value space, plenty of clean comfortable beds, kitchen worked well for breakfast, lunch to go, and simple dinners. Easy access by car to town and the ski hill.
Great place to stay in Fernie excellent communication from host would recommend to anyone.

Great experience at Paulâ€™s place. 5 min drive to town located just off the highway. Place is spacious and good value. Paul provided the most comprehensive details on the town of Fernie and all items related to a guest stay. Overall highly recommended!
Was a great space
We had a great stay! Comfortable beds, very clean, and great mountain cabin atmosphere. Would definitely stay here again!
What an amazing place to stay in fernie. Clean, comfortable and spacious. Paulâ€™s place will make you feel at home if your place had a fireplace and beautiful mountain views.
Great location, 6 mins away from the ski resort.

This condo was perfect for our family ski vacation in Fernie. The condo is clean, spacious, and well stocked. Location is ideal - Itâ€™s a short drive to both the ski hill and the town centre. Check in was straightforward and Paul was incredibly quick in his responses. Would happily book again in the future.
Paul was great to deal with. His property was a treat to stay at for our group and we would definitely recommend his listing to others.
The space was perfect for a large group.

Paulâ€™s place is great! We loved the layout and it worked great for our girlsâ€™ weekend. A Private deck and bbq onto a quiet street with mountain views was a nice spot for a drink after a day of biking. Short drive to town and quiet time policy of 11 pm. Would recommend!
Paul was awesome to deal with and the place came as advertised!

A clean space in a great location! Paul was a great host, giving us all the details we needed in a timely manner. We rented on a Friday morning and had everything worked out by mid-afternoon. Super happy with the experience.

This is a conveniently located , spacious and super-clean condo.
I loved the configuration of beds upstairs as so fun for The kids travelling with us.

Our group comprised of six adult skiers were pleased to find the perfect accommodation for our two day ski get-away at Fernie ski resort.

We prepared our daily breakfast and packed our lunches.

Everything we needed including plastic sandwich wrap to mustard and ketchup was provided.

The bedding, linen and quality of beds was satisfactory for our short stay. 

There was enough space for everyone allowing areas where people could text or use their phones with privacy and peace.

The proximity to the ski hill was a further bonus.

Paul's welcome package by email was sufficient for us to enter, use and enjoy his place.

good location. Easy access to ski hill. Lots of beds. Only 2 bathrooms is tight for 8 or 10 people. Kitchen is well stocked but missing a few items.

Beautiful condo, slept 6 of us very comfortably. Would defenetely return.

Lots of space,air conditioning, good beds great back deck .
Clean and neat . Really great place.
Great place ! I will go back for sure
Absolutely lovely spot - across the street from the slopes and 3 minute drive to downtown. Well appointed kitchen and comfortable beds...great view and the owner provides fantastic check in package.
Stayed here for two nights in a father son ski vaca, the place was perfect for what we needed. Well equipped kitchen and very homey.
Beautiful place, wouldn't mind it full time!

Our stay at Paulâ€™s place was great! We loved the added touch of a deck of cards and crib board, enjoyed a few games by the fire after a long day of skiing. Beds were ok, lots of beds makes it a great place for a large family to stay. Very clean.

This was a great place to stay for a ski weekend. Comfortable beds and enough space for everyone.

Will definitely be back next time we are in Fernie! Thanks again for a great, affordable stay!
Perfect for a couple wanting to be minutes away from the hill!
Perfect space for a course at the ski hill. Location for FAR access is perfect, clean and easy.

Such a nice, cozy, and clean place to stay! it had a nice big TV, comfy bed, fluffy pillows and a great view to wake up to of the ski hill, with three nice windows that open too, and shades for night. Easy access, great communication, will definitely be coming back! highly recommended! Thanks Farah!
Unit was cleaned and host communication was seamless, had a great experience overall. Thanks Farah!
This is a beautiful apartment in a lovely area right in the Fernie mountain resorts. Spacious and yet cozy, with a comfortable bed. Apartment is best for an individual. Definitely recommended!

data.name: Comfort Queen Suite Private Lockoff
data.address_address: 1300 Riverside Way, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This updated lock-off suite features a brand new queen size bed, an HD Smart TV with Netflix, Mini Fridge and Microwave for your convenience. Walking distance to the Elk River, a quick three-minute drive to Fernie Alpine Resort, and a few short minutes to Historic Downtown Fernie.

The perfect space for your mountain getaway. Enjoy fishing on the Elk River, a morning powder ski, or a mountain bike on the nearby Mount Fernie trail network right from your front door. Take a short walk into town for dinner, and come back to comfort.

The plush queen-size bed is ideal for a weekend away with you and yours and is located at the Riverside Condos behind the Stanford Inn. If you can't decide between the ski hill or town for your stay, this is an exceptional compromise. The suite is halfway between both, making your visit to Fernie the mountain getaway you won't soon forget.

Self-check-in. Guests have access to their own private space with its own private exterior entrance and free parking.

The small entrance patio gets great afternoon sun and has a small patio set.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Located halfway between Fernie Alpine Resort and Fernie on Hwy. 3 at Riverside Condos. A three-minute drive or half-hour walk along the Elk River to historic Downtown Fernie, and a three minute drive to the ski hill.

YOUR Netflix account is accessible here.

This room is a "lock-off room" of a main adjoining condo. You may hear guests next door, however, the suites are fully separate.

data.name: 2 Bedroom with Loft at the Griz Inn
data.address_address: 5369 Fernie Ski Hill Road, V0B 1M6, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
We are currently in the process of renovating the unit. New pictures will follow soon.

Settle in to wildly fun days matched with incredibly comfortable nights in this classic ski in/out condo hotel at the Legendary Griz Inn. Situated on the slopes of Fernie Alpine Resort, with full access to all hotel amenities - including hot tub, and an indoor pool - this is the best place to enjoy everything Fernie has to offer with friends and family.

This owner managed condo at Griz Inn is warm and incredibly comfortable. The two bedrooms and extra plus loft space make for ample room for all guests to stretch out and enjoy their stay away from home. The Rusty Edge Bar and Grill is close by for delicious apres-ski food and drinks, and the large, open-concept dining and living area make quality time together easy. Just a five-minute drive from downtown Fernie.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay. Do NOT contact the front desk.

Ski-in / Ski-Out Condo Hotel at Fernie Alpine Resort

No support from hotel front desk or hotel staff.

data.name: Mountain Base, Riverside - entire 2 bed Condo
data.address_address: 500 Riverside Way, Unit 504, V0B 1M7, Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Located in the heart of Fernie, this condo is perfectly placed to enjoy all that Fernie has to offer all year round. A 5 minute drive to the Ski Lifts for year round mountain adventures, steps from the Elk River for fishing, kayaking & beautiful walks or bike rides, and just a short drive to the town Centre. This is our home away from home, and stocked as such, filled with board games & books, it's perfect for a friend/family getaway - we truly want you to enjoy this space as much as we do.

Split across three storey's, this open plan condo will give everyone the space to enjoy as they please. The main floor is complete with bathroom, kitchen (with extendable table and additional chairs as needed), dining space & living room with Cable, Netflix & apple airplay. The basement room is fit with queen bed, armchair and tv with Netflix & apple airplay. Just down the corridor, the laundry room has all you need for your stay. The master bedroom is a large space with vaulted ceilings and mountain views. Fitted with two beds (a queen and a double), a small bathroom, writing desk & darts board for games enthusiasts! Equipped with everything you need for your stay - you won't need to bring a thing!

This unit is easily accessible, just a minute from the #3 highway. Plenty of parking is easily available outside the unit on a first come first served basis. Just a 30 second walk to the local Circle K equipped with amenities for any urgent need. One of the best Indian restaurants in Fernie is just a minutes walk away at the Stanford. Access to mountain and base trails alike just minutes away.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

The Riverside Mountain Village area is located conveniently between the ski hill and downtown Fernie. 5 minute drive to each. This condo is situated right on the banks of the Elk River with a large grassy area with benches and picnic tables to enjoy as well as walking paths along the river.

In the winter there is a ski hill shuttle service in front of the Stanford Hotel. In the summer it is a short 10 min bike ride along a path into town and to all of the bike and hike trailheads.

We love this place and are keen to make your stay in our home as enjoyable as possible. We're equipped this space with everything we think you could need but if you can think of anything we should add please get in touch - we'd love to hear from you!

City of Fernie Business License: #002345

Fully furnished 2 bedroom condo situated near the Elk River and a 2 minute drive to the Fernie Alpine Resort.
Accommodations include a large master bedroom with separate bathroom and a brand new queen size bed on the top floor. Main floor houses the second bathroom, kitchen and living room with gas fireplace. Lower level has two twin beds and washer/dryer.
Rate includes WIFI, cable/SMART TV and parking out front.

Riverside Condos is a quiet complex located conveniently between the ski hill and town, right along the Elk River. There is a 24/7 gas bar and convenience store less than a block away that is fully stock with the basics. The Indian restaurant at the nearby hotel is excellent.

Ski shuttle picks up just down the street in the winter.

The upstairs master bedroom is separated by a flight of stairs only. No door. Private, but open concept. Likewise, the lower level sleeping area is also in the open, separated by stairs only. But still private.

reviews.comment: Great place to stay for a ski weekend. Location was excellent to hit the slopes and return back home for lunch and head back out again for the afternoon. Very clean. Fit our family of six very comfortably.

This place was awesome- super comfy beds and pillows, stylish and comfy living room and more amenities than could be listed. Everything was provided that one could need and it was a great home away from home. The smart TV was an incredible surprise, and it was a super quick walk to the ski hill. Literally took 13 minutes to walk up, get lift passes and walk back. We will be back for sure, summer or winter!

It was a lovely place to stay if you plan on staying in and relaxing and be very quiet as the locals around the condo are very quiet and expect silence as well. It was clean and has a really nice view of the mountains.
Great place to stay, it was very clean and nice and quiet! Would definitely stay again
Great place to stay, right at the bottom of the Fernie ski hill.
Great spot close to Fernie and the slopes.

Our stay was delightful! The condo was exactly what we needed/wanted. We traveled with another couple and our 2 small children. The space was perfect for our 2 families. The kitchen had everything we needed to prepare our own meals. The views outside were perfect for enjoying our morning coffee â˜•.  The condo was immaculate and so cozy. 10/10 would highly recommend staying here!
Great condo with easy access and fully stocked kitchen. We would definitely stay here again.

We had a great stay. We will definitely try to book this same place if we have the opportunity next time we are in Fernie. The place was better than we expected - so many lovely things. It was very clean - which feels so important these days! Beer and cookies waiting for us upon arriva! Condo layout is very nice, everything that you need is there, bed was comfortable, views out the windows were great, ground floor patio was awesome to relax on after biking, communal green space great to find a sunny spot for morning coffee. Hosts were very responsive - checking to make sure we had everything we needed. All around just wonderful! Thank you and we will be back!

Extremely clean, quiet and beautiful mountain views all day. Very responsive to any questions we had and even left a couple treats for us upon check in.  This lovely space is ideal for the mountain get away!

data.name: 4 Seasons Mountain Getaway
data.address_address: Fernie, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Come and stay at this Beautifully renovated Suite that sleeps up to 8 Guests. You will find lots of space to sleep and to hang out in this 1800 sq ft townhome. It has 3 Bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms and the master has a cozy king bed. Fully equipped kitchen including an outdoor gas BBQ. Good Wifi with Smart TV's on the main floor and in the basement. Enjoy your days out on the ski hill, biking the trails or fishing on the Elk river or exploring historic downtown Fernie. All within a km.

The main floor is set up with an open concept kitchen, livingroom, dining and patio. It also has two of the beds and baths. At night you can hang out with friends and family in the well set up basement that has a large seating area including a games table, dry bar and mini fridge.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

This unit is located across the street from the Elk river and just steps to walking, hiking and biking trails. it is about 1/2 a km from the ski hill and5 mins to downtown.

Access to the ski hill can be by car or by shuttle bus that picks up at the Stanford Hotel down the street.

data.name: The Little Red Cabin: Unplug from the World
data.address_address: 1630 Johnston Road, V0A, Invermere, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Put phones & devices away. Imagine after a day of exploring a rec & cultural meca, finishing your day wrapped in plush robes w/wine, cozy lighting-in & out, all in complete privacy. You have your own small private cabin with outdoor hottub, camp fire pit & a treehouse. Enjoy bike & ski storage, indoor fireplace, bathroom, laundry & full kitchen. Steps away from a multi-use rec trail, lake beach fronts year round adventure from summer swimming to the Winter Whiteway!

Once you pick up your keys, youâ€™re on your own. This space is special. Its 270 sq feet of pure relaxation with everything you will ever need for an amazing stay. Itâ€™s time to disconnect & clear your mind, body, spirit & soul. Thereâ€™s parking for 2 vehicles & 1 RV. A 30ft RV is available for rent. All firewood & kindling or fire starter is included.

The cabin itself & the surrounding field are all for our guests; & our guests alone. Guests will have to share with local wildlife, however. We may access our forestry equipment from time to time in the far corner of the upper field; we try to communicate this to our guests prior to. With improvements, the cabin field will get its own fence, giving guests 100% privacy 100% of the time.

We love to socialize with our guests or completely leave them alone in privacy. We are available anytime to our guests by phone, text, message, email & we encourage our guests to communicate with us for anything they may need or need help with during their stay. We want each guest to have the best experience possible!

Privacy best describes this space. Situated just on the outskirts of town, yet a 5 min drive to downtown Invermere, everything is close, yet far away. We are right at the start of a multi-use Rec trail that is paved & spans from Invermere to Fairmont. The private outdoor hottub & shower are incredible with a full view of the Purcell Mountains all while surrounded by trees & nature on your own 2 acre parcel. Neighboring houses are each 3 acre parcels.

We are so close to the Invermere side of the Legacy Recreation Trail (25km Invermere to Fairmont) that once you are parked at your little red cabin this trail can be accessed by walking or biking(750meters) Turning north rather than south (Fairmont) is a handy sidewalk that takes you right into downtown Invermere.

We have an almost 2 year old male yellow lab teenage dog named Bailey who is very friendly. We try to keep his visits to our guests at a minimum. Please let us know if he is a bother :-)

reviews.comment: The Little Red Cabin is an absolute gem. I have stayed in many Airbnbâ€™s over the last few years and this one is the best! Ellen put so much thought and effort into making our stay welcoming and comfortable. The hot tub was amazing after a day of hiking, the tree house was fantastic for the kids, and watching the deer in the early morning from the bed was magical. We will definitely be back!
Beautiful property. Great for both summer and winter. Highly recommend. Great hosts!

It is hard to describe without seeming like we are exaggerating how lovely the little red cabin is. Everything is perfectly planned - so much so that a sudden change in COVID-19 restrictions, which affected our dinner reservations, had hardly any impact because we were just as comfortable staying in a making dinner in the cabin. I hope we are able to make it back again!
Amazing place and Ellen is a great host! Would recommend for those who want a quiet and relaxing stay; we enjoyed our time very much :)

I stayed with my two kids and we had such a wonderful stay. the beautiful, thoughtful details make the small space seem luxurious. Ellen gave us some great hiking tips and was so helpful before and throughout the stay. we can't wait to go back and feel pampered again!
Can't say anything that hasn't already been said by the other reviews.  The home is great!  Ellen is great!  It's a small space with a big impact!
This was my second time staying with Ellen in less than 6 months and I love the cabin. It's so thoughtfully laid out and it feels like home. I didn't want to ever leave. I highly recommend.

This was my first Air BnB and I couldnâ€™t have been more pleased! Ellen was such a great host of such an amazingly, perfect cabin. She went above and beyond to make our trip special to surprise my husband for his birthday. Such a wonderful and private space with everything you can need. Will definitely be back.

We had so much fun at the lil red cabin Ellen is a great host she made sure we had everything we needed and more we loved the hot tube and sitting by the fire at night and her cute lil puppy that would come down and visit so sweet we definitely will be back!!! ðŸ˜Š
Ellen put so much care and thought into our stay at the lil red cabin. There were so many beautiful small touches not just inside, but outside as well. This cabin is a year-round treat!

Ellen and Gregâ€™s place blew us away! Reading everyoneâ€™s reviews we had high expectations but she still managed to exceed those expectations! She has so many thoughtful touches and really makes you feel at home. We canâ€™t wait to back!
The little Red Cabin may be compact...but has ample comfort and the views are huge.

This was my second time at this cabin, and it was even better than the first time if possible. Ellen has thought of everything. Both the indoor as well as the outdoor spaces are absolutely perfect. I've been to many Airbnb's in my life, and this one is my favorite. I cannot speak highly enough of the personalized touches Ellen ensures are complete for each stay. We had a bonfire 2 nights, used the hot tub at least once a day, and tried to stop time to bask in that view!!! This place is exceptional, the host is exceptional & is truly one of the most generous thoughtful people. Heaven on earth. If i could give more stars I would.

This was a perfect retreat for us.  Loved the private, rural setting, yet being close to town.  Loved the hot tub, all the homey touches, well equipped kitchen and cabin, and a lovey charcuterie board upon arrival.  5 stars and will definitely stay here again!
Excellent getaway spot!

This was the second time we stayed at the lil red cabin and it was just as wonderful as the first time! 

Ellen is an amazing and thoughtful host.
Great! Ellen puts tons of effort into making the Little Reb Cabin and your stay perfect. We really wouldnâ€™t change a thing!

After reading the reviews we were confident that this place would be a wonderful little place to get away! What we didnâ€™t realize was just how perfect it could get! From the minute we stepped foot on the property and saw our accommodations we were in awe! From the greeting that welcomed us, the little personal  touches found throughout the cabin, a fully equipped kitchen, and the wonderful amenities like the hot tub and fire pit we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Would highly recommend and we know we will be coming back in the near future!! Worth every penny!
Awesome little cabin with all the amenities you could possibly need. Perfect place to relax. Ellen was a wonderful host. Iâ€™ll definitely be back again!

Private, quiet, very clean!

You will be warmly greeted with many beautiful little surprises at Ellenâ€™s Lil Red Cabin. Pay attention to the details!

We have stayed in many Airbnbâ€™s, and rate this tiny one among our favourites. It really had everything we needed and way more. 

The proximity to so many adventures was important, as was the private, clean hot tub to soak in after a day of adventuring.  

Thank you, Ellen, for your COVID project!
This place blew us away, the hot tub, the fireplace, the gorgeous view. The host was wonderful and attentive. Pictures donâ€™t even do it justice, stay here!

A truly magical getaway. The cleanest and most stylish airbnb there ever was. A real cabin feel with a little more glam than cabin. Beautiful property, kind people and so much peace and quiet. We are thrilled to be coming back over the summer.
Such a lovely stay and wonderful host!

This absolutely magical place put us in awe, it truly was everything and more! From the moment we first got there we knew we didnt book enough time at the Lil' Red Cabin! Every little detail had been thought of, it was immaculately clean, the sheer comfort and care put in to everything was incredible. I've never seen so much packed in to such a tiny little spot. We were absolutely moved by this place, it is truly unique and special. Ellen was absolutely incredible, she was made to host, she graciously answered my numerous questions and offered so many tips and suggestions on what to do and places to go including an absolutely breathtaking view point nearby that we never would have found without her telling us. I think this place will be successful for years to come and probably consistently booked out due to popularity. We are already planning a summer trip! Thank you so much Ellen and Greg for an amazing time!!!

The lil red cabin was the perfect place to unplug and relax for the holidays. Every corner of the cabin was beautifully decorated and we had access to everything that we needed during our stay. We appreciated the well equipped kitchen, it made it easy for us to stay in and cook our own meals.
We hope to be back one day!

All I can say is wow. Our expectations were quite high from the start after seeing othersâ€™ reviews and the photos of the space, but our expectations ended up being completely blown out of the water. From before we even arrived, we were in constant contact with Ellen - she was kind, helpful, and it felt like we were chatting with a friend. When we got to the cabin, we instantly fell in love with the space and felt right at home. The cabin is cozy, has everything youâ€™ll ever need, and is on a beautiful piece of land overlooking the mountains. Youâ€™ll never find a place better than this one, so donâ€™t pass up the opportunity to visit.

The lil red cabin exceeded our expectations. The perfect place to unwind after a day of snowboarding and to get away from the busy ski resort! Waking up to the beautiful snowy view was magical, and meeting Bailey was a nice treat! 

Thanks for a wonderful stay, we will definitely be back!
Just a dream! Peace and quiet in the woods, incredible host, hot tub and fire... just the perfect retreat.

This little cabin retreat was just what we needed! It's a very beautiful tiny cabin with a great view. We stayed during the winter, so the hot tub and fireplace were excellent benefits. The kitchen was fully stocked, which made cooking our own food a breeze. Ellen was an excellent host: quick to answer questions and offer tips about the area! We wish we could have stayed longer and are looking forward to returning!

This was by far the best Airbnb  Iâ€™ve stayed at! If youâ€™re looking for a place to get away from it all look no further. Ellen is an amazing host that truly cares about her guests having the best experience. The place is beautifully decorated, confortable, clean and cozy and has absolutely everything you need! You will feel rejuvenated when you leave! 
Highly recommended!

The Little Red Cabin was the perfect mountain oasis away from the city! We had a low key couple of nights hanging out around the fire and watching the sunsets from the hot tub. We will definitely be back!

I cannot say enough good things about Ellenâ€™s place! She truly thought of everything you need for an amazing getaway. The house itself was beautiful and then having the hot tub and fire pit is an added bonus. It was the perfect place to unwind for the weekend. We cannot wait to come back!

The little red cabin was an absolute gem! It exceeded my expectations completely and felt like I was at a spa weekend. The robes were so soft and the bed linen smelled amazing. The cabin was spotless and had everything I needed to spend a solo five days cooking. The private hot tub was perfect and Ellen provides sandals and towels for the hot tub. I did two nice walks around the area to a beautiful bluff overlooking the lake at Ellenâ€™s recommendation. What a perfect hidden gem right on the outskirts of invermere. Iâ€™d definitely recommend to anyone wanting a private getaway!

What a wonderful, cozy, cabin. The stay here is an experience in itself, with a private hot tub, campfire, and tree house! It is located downhill from the host, but it feels completely private and there is a great view of trees and hills.  We arrived and were able to start a fire and have a BBQ right away. Everything you could possibly need has been thoughtfully organized and prepared.  We were lucky enough to meet the dog, who came down to greet us and is very friendly! We even had a bunch of deer come by!  I'd definitely recommend taking the drive to Panorama, pull over where you see lookouts and check out some of the amazing views!  What a beautiful place, we would definitely come back and recommend this cabin!

This cabin is perfect if your looking for quite and to be recharged by nature. Ellen made are stay very special with a few special touches. The hot tub was heavenly and so were the sunsets. I would highly recommend and hope to be back for another stay in the future.

The Lil Red Cabin was gorgeous! We had a great restful time enjoying the hot tub, cutest beautiful scenery, tiny home and the most peaceful stay in Invermere! Ellen was responsive, helpful, and had everything perfectly laid out for us beyond what we could ask for. This has been one of our favourite stays in BC! We hope to return again.

The lil red cabin is a beautiful little couple's hideaway, everything you could possibly need is conveniently and elegantly in your oasis. The hosts really go above and beyond to allow you to enjoy a rejuvenating and romantic experience.
Amazing quiet location. Very clear, well decorated and extremely well organized for a smaller space. If you are looking for a relaxing experience â€œlittle red cabinâ€ is the perfect place.

The little Red Cabin has everything you could possibly need! From kitchen amenities to hot tub, camp fire  and more.... this destination will leave you feeling refreshed and wholesome. Ellenâ€™s thoughtfulness shows in her detailed decor inside the cabin and out! Not to mention Ellenâ€™s speedy response to any concerns you may have. Although our trip has ended, weâ€™re already planning our next trip back to the Little Red Cabin!

This was our first time staying at an Airbnb. Ellenâ€™s cabin was absolutely outstanding in every aspect! The cabin was spotless- everything we could possibly need was there! Being able to relax in the hot tub while watching the deer pass by was amazing. Anytime I had a question Ellen replied in a timely manner. We would highly recommend this place to all family and friends! The location was wonderful- just a short distance into town but far enough away to feel disconnected from hustle and bustle! Thanks again for making our first BC trip so memorable.

Amazing amazing amazing everything was beautiful and well thought out, from storage under the bed to a mini sewing kit in the bathroom. Was tranquil and serene lots of wildlife and an amazing view to wake up to every morning. We loved the outdoor shower to rinse off before and after the hot tub. Just a great quite and comfortable place to be.
We had an amazing stay. The cabin is wonderfully decorated and has everything you need. The views were spectacular. I will definitely be staying again!

Amazing! The Little Red Cabin, was a nice quiet spot and only a short drive into town. The cabin was clean, tidy and beautifully decorated. We had our newborn with us and it was the perfect getaway for our family. The amenities made for an easy vacation, from our own private hot tub to a fire pit right outside. Ellen answered all of our questions very quickly and was an awesome host! We will definitely be back!
has everything you need for a weekend away, feels like your completely on your one yet its less then a 15 dollar cab ride to down town Invermere
Fantastic experience all around. Ellen is a great host.

This gorgeous cabin is the perfect sanctuary space if you want to get out in nature and relax. All the details are generously taken care of. The property is easy to find and the lot is adorable. From the lighting to the robes - every detail of your  is well thought out. We loved our time as look forward to visiting again!
A much needed relaxing weekend in a fantastic location. Ellen was so helpful in answering all of our questions. The homey touches to the cabin was nice :). It was such a pleasure!

This place is perfect for a weekend getaway. Ellen as a host thought of all the tiny details so you can truly sit back and relax. From flip flops to get to the hot tub, firewood and roasting sticks or a very kind welcome- this place allows you to drop your bags and unwind.

The pictures don't do this place justice! It's an absolutely beautiful spot perfect for any occasion.  We arrived to sparkling wine on ice and a charcuterie board!  Ellen was such an attentive host & gave us great recommendations.  We really loved the out door shower and the hot tub.  I can't recommend this place enough!
Beautifully appointed, thoughtful touches, serene, relaxing with lots of fun games and a treehouse which was thoroughly enjoyed by my son! Amazing getaway in a beautiful location!
Ellen went above and beyond being an amazing host. The place has exceeded expectations. We felt right at home!
Absolutely loved this little red cabin! We had a great stay! Ellen is very accommodating and helpful. Everything was far better than we expected!
One of the greatest places we have stayed. Itâ€™s even cuter in person and the hosts are beyond accommodating. I highly recommend!

data.name: Beautiful 2 Bedrooms Condo w Mountain & Lake Views
data.address_address: 255 3rd Avenue, V0A 1K7, Invermere, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Enjoy our 2 bedroom 2 bath condo with room for 6 guests. The condo is equipped with AC to keep you cool during day. The outside terase has barbeque to cook dinner and a sitting place to enjoy the amazing mountain and lake view, complemented by sunrise to enjoy your morning coffee.

The kitchen has full size appliances . Dedicated wifi and cable is included with two tvâ€™s. In suite washer and dryer are available for use. The top floor condo features a vaulted ceiling in the living room.The two bathrooms make it convenient for families or roommates.

You will have access to the entire condo and everything in it . In the common space you will have access to seasonal swimming pool hot tub and gym. Also for long term rental you have access to one underground parking stall.

This condo is located walking distance to the lake and boat launch, and in close proximity to paths, parks, restaurants and shopping. There is also a shuttle bus which stops across the road and can take you up to the ski hill.

Lake Windermere Point is centrally located in Invermere. James Chabot beach is just a few steps out your front door. You are within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and downtown shopping. There are 6 golf courses within a 15 minute drive. You are also within a 15 minute drive of both the Radium and Fairmont Hot Springs. Panorama Mountain is 20 minutes from our condo. Invermere is also home to the worlds longest skating trail. There are hiking and biking trails at your door step.

data.name: Mountain Bijou ski hill and golf escape
data.address_address: 989 Dewdney Way, V1A 3E9, Kimberley, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Welcome to Mountain Bijou! Your Mountain escape to explore all that Kimberley and the Kootenays has to offer. Located on the ski hill with ski in ski out access, mountain biking, and up from Trickle Creek Golf Course! Your adventure awaits!

Nestled amongst the trees youâ€™re greeted with your own private entrance and parking with a gorgeous mountain view! The home has been lovingly updated throughout with a modern Scandinavian mountain feel, and includes 2 bedrooms and bathroom upstairs, with kitchen, dining, living room with 2 sofa beds, fireplace and laundry room on the main floor.

Full access to the entire main floor condo, outdoor covered parking / patio. There is a separate suite on the lower level, so please be courteous.

Iâ€™m happy to be available for any questions you may have during your stay to ensure you get the most enjoyment possible. We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local support during your stay.

Located on a quiet no thru road on the ski hill with ski in/ski out access behind the back door! See skiers, bikers, and wildlife right outside your door. Minutes from the golf course and into the heart of town with the charming platzl filled with quaint shops, restaurants, and pubs. Or explore many lakes and hiking/walking trails just outside of town. So much to do within minutes of this comfortable mountain home!

Please drive with caution for wildlife.

Follow Hwy 95A onto Ross St which turns into Gerry Sorenson Way. Follow signs for Alpine Resort and take your first right after resort onto Dogwood Drive, and your immediate left on Dewdney Way. Find your vacation home as the second last townhome on your right.

data.name: Hilltop Hive at Windermere Lake
data.address_address: 1172 Hilltop Road, V0B 2L1, Windermere, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This cozy cabin is full of rustic charm and character. Located only minutes walk from Baltac Beach on Lake Windermere, this cute little barn home is perfect for a friends or family getaway. Located only a 10 min drive from Radium Hot Springs, a 12 minute drive from Fairmont Hot Springs Resort/ Ski Hill and walking distance to bowling alley & store, you'll have access to year round activities no matter the season. This home has 2 bedrooms, a loft , full kitchen & bathroom + heated guest shed.

Guests are free to enjoy the contents of the home including games, puzzles, media, linens & housewares. The property also boasts 3 decks (2 lower, 1 upper with lake views). Back deck has a great bbq for guest use. The large back yard contains a campfire pit next to an extra small heated cabin which can be used as an extra sleeping area, hang out spot or somewhere to store extra gear. We like to use keep our ski and snowboard gear here to keep warm and dry.

Guests are welcome to use all areas of the home that arenâ€™t locked. The door next to the basement stairs is locked for owner storage.

We are available by phone or text for questions. Property manager is located near the property

Windermere is located 5km from Invermere and features a Market with amazing pizza place, antique shop, bowling alley, beach and many other amenities. Invermere has many wonderful restaurants and great shopping. Fairmont Resort is a short 12 minute drive and has hot pools, ski hill & dinning. For more advanced ski terrain check out Panorama ski resort only 30 minutes away. Radium also has hot springs, shopping and restaurants. Lots of great trails for cross country skiing, mountain biking and hiking. This valley is known for its unbelievable variety of great golf courses. Enjoy many lake activities such as canoeing, kayaking, boating, stand up paddle boarding, wake surfing and many more. In addition the private beach associated with this neighbourhood you are welcome to enjoy many of the various public beaches nearby

Unless you only plan on going to the beach and the bowling alley a car is recommended for exploring the area and multiple nearby towns

data.name: Kimberley Pinecone Hideaway located in town
data.address_address: 610 Knighton Road, V1A, Kimberley, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
"Welcome to the Pinecone Hideaway" in beautiful Kimberley B.C. Feel at home in our two bedroom condo located in town with a green space right out your back door with mature trees and wildlife. This awaits you in a newly renovated 800 sq foot ground floor condo with shared laundry which has easy access to the North Star Rails to Trails, downtown, golfing and the ski hill. Kimberley has an abundance of outdoor attractions and outdoor patios in the platzl. We look forward to hosting you.

Totally renovated condo including a gourmet kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and coffee bar. New bathroom features deep tub with full tile surround, granite countertop and stylish bowl sink. Relax in the living room on the leather couch in front of the 55" Smart TV with Netflix and Amazon. The master bedroom has a queen bed, plenty of closet space and two dressers. The second bedroom/office has a double bed and desk. Outside the patio door is a patio set and BBQ. This is a very quiet location in an established neighborhood, the condo building has 12 units.

The condo is located less than a 10 minute walk to the Northstar Rails to Trails and less than a 30 minute walk downtown. We are surrounded by outstanding golf courses, hiking and biking. A short ten minute drive to Kimberley Alpine Resort. Enjoy all that our area has to offer.

A paved trail leads you North to the downtown Platzl or South to sunny Marysville.

data.name: Base camp
data.address_address: 220 Cranbrook Street, V1A 2P1, Kimberley, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Rest and recharge in this super quiet and comfy space.

A cozy warm bedroom upstairs in my home. Very private as there wont be anyone else on your level of the house.

This is your own space to unwind aprÃ¨s ski or bike. Rest up and get back out there.

Unlimited WiFi so stream and download away. The SmartTV gives you access to all your favourite apps.

I make sure all guests have their space once checked in. If you need me I'm just a holler away though.

You have a private upstairs bedroom, bathroom directly beside the bedroom. There is a small kitchenette alcove area in the room for basic meals and for making coffee/tea, microwave meals etc.

You're expected to communicate through Airbnb messaging. Check in instructions will be provided before you arrive. Do not knock on the front door please.

I will be available via cell phone if I am not home.

4 min drive to the Platzl

Very close to walking, hiking, biking, fishing, golfing and of course the ski hill. It's hard to be bored here in any season.

Dozens of multi-sport trails around for every skill level.

4 min drive or 20 min walk to downtown.

Plenty of public transit options to Townsite and to get around Kimberley. Ask me if you have any questions.

It's a 20 min walk to the Platzl. It's a pleasant walk though. Enjoy the quiet of my lovely Townsite location.

This is a quiet neighbourhood and there will be no tolerance for any kind of partying or disrespectful behaviour. Noise is to be kept to a minimum after 11pm.

reviews.comment: First time in Kimberly and it was a very nice stay!  The Air bnb was located in a very quiet neighborhood,  as well a nice quiet and comfortable room with a comfortable bed!  And a very welcoming host :)
Great place to stay. Clean place & super friendly host
Great room to stay in with a private bathroom. Comfortable bed and all the amenities necessary for my one night stay. Very hospitable and quick replies from Tom!

Very nice place to spend the weekend. Tom was very welcoming and made us feel at home. The place was super confortable and had everything you need. 
I definitely recommend that place, for the price you canâ€™t find better.

great space, as advertised!
value is very high â€” lots of room to yourself, basically the entire top floor, for a very reasonable price. Tom is great, responsive, willing to help (though we didn't really need anything ourselves).

room has lots of space and decent light. large bright bathroom. would stay again.

Perfect place to stay if you are a couple, or single travelers that needs somewhere to stay for some time, but dont need an entire house. Really laid back atmosphere. Tom is a great host, very friendly, and made cookies and coffee in the morning for us a few times!
Room is very private, and definitely feels like your own space when you're there, never had any problems with privacy.

Tom's place was fantastic. up at the top of the hill so you can get some views and then just a really nice walk down the hill, 15-20 minutes. I highly recommended a tasting at Overtime Brewery and then hit up the Village after a day of hiking, biking, golfing or skiing. Its all right there.
Highly recommended, good location and nice place!
A great cozy getaway in Kimberly - highly recommended!
Thanks for a great place to stay and amazing tips on where to eat!
Tom is an amazing host! Everything is always clean and tidy and it feels like a home away from home. Will definitely be back!

Tom has a great space here. This house has been tastefully renovated and the room is spacious and cozy. It had everything I needed. Further, Tom was always available and was super easy to communicate with. I come to Kimberley several times each year and will be back. Thanks Tom.
Very hospitable. Great bed and very tidy.

Tomâ€™s home was a great spot to stop and spend the night in Kimberley. He and his doggies are lovely and very friendly. Room is clean, spacious and felt plenty private. Walk to the Platz downtown was about 15-20 minutes for dinner.
Casual and quiet, just the way we like it.   The bed was amazing.  Thanks Tom
Tom will go an extra mile and some for you.
Great location, clean, big beds and great hosting!
Tom's place is clean, inviting and fully equipped with whatever you could need for a night's stay. He is very kind and helpful. I would definitely recommend a stay there to a friend!

Tom's place was fantastic, great location, private area,  and has the feel like you're staying at a friend's place. Tom was nothing but accommodating for all my needs. Will definitely stay again next time I'm in Kimberly.

We were very impressed with the room.  It was even better than the pictures show.  The location is excellent and has a wonderful view of the ski hills.  We felt very welcome and Tom made us feel at home.  The room and bathroom were immaculate, the king-sized bed was extremely comfortable.  The sitting room is very large and made the space seem massive.  The layout used the area very well and we felt very much "at home".  We look forward to our next visit to "Tom's Place in Kimberley BC".
Nice set up at Tom's.  Very clean and comfortable.  Tom went extra mile for us!

You can expect a very nice and clean suite that is also spacious and cozy at the same time. Very close to everything you would want to be near and all around an amazing host. Thank you for the very accommodating stay!

Tom was super punctual, the space was neat, tidy and a great stay for the night. Tom is an excellent host; inviting and really pleasant to be around. Would not hesitate to stay here again or recommend others to spend some nights here!
I would 100% recommend this stay. The bed was so comfy and the space was perfect.
As advertised, great place for a stop over!
Exactly as advertised. Good bed, clean washroom, excellent value.
I had such a pleasant stay - Tom is an amazing host. Everything was so tidy and clean and I felt very at home! Will be back!
A very neat little place to stay in upper Kimberley! Lots of privacy and such a good price!
Great host! He even installed an AC unit for us during a heat wave this summer. Would stay with him again
Decent bnb. Maybe not quite as private as I expected but otherwise was good value...especially compared to the average prices in Kimberley at the time. Tom was quick to answer and makes a good host.

Base camp is just that, a great place to lay your head while exploring the Kimberley area. 
If you have questions about what to do in the area Tom is more than happy to answer them.
Excellent host great space and very comfortable bed and pillows
Tom, was a great host. A+ very clean home
Tom is an amazing host & has a beautiful place. 10/10 would recommend
Tomâ€™s place was a perfect landing pad for our stay in Kimberley! Would highly recommend staying here!
Tom's is a hidden treasure. If you're in Kimberley, explore the area from his place! Really cool, and great value.
Strongly recommend Tomâ€™s place. His attention to cleanliness and friendly demeanor made my stay enjoyable. I also liked the privacy and location.

A+++ plus. Tom's place is clean, quiet, and convenient.  Does anything stand out? Yes. It is literally 2mins to downtown. 5mins to ski hill. AND most importantly beds are A++ brand new comfortable.  We will be back soon!!

We stayed a Tom's place to ski Kimberly and Fernie. The place is nice and close to Kimberly Alpine Resort making it very convenient to get to. There was sheltered parking and the communication leading up to check-in was very quick and accurate. The place was very clean and well furnished with enough space to store/dry ski gear. The puppy was super cute and friendly as well! Tom was a great host, provided recommendations for places in town and made sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend!

Tom's room is the perfect place to base yourself out of while exploring Kimberley. Everything was so comfortable, and Tom was the best host! This has definately been one of my favorite stays so far, and I'm already looking forward to next time!
Great, clean space, friendly host, good location if you have a car.

Tom was lovely and humble. He was incredibly accommodating and hospitable. He went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and have everything we needed. I cant recommend Tom's place highly enough for the location, comfort and cleanliness. He even recommend a super breakfast place which we will definitely revisit if we're ever back in the area. Thanks Tom

Toms Place was located in a nice residential area of town close to skating , a park, the ski hill and downtown Kimberley. 
It is a good sized room with clever built in cabinets and some kitchen conveniences. 
Tom was very hospitable and open to suggestions about his accommodations.
Good value for money! A comfortable room with AC  is exactly what we needed after hot day spent in the area. Tom is very friendly and made us feel welcomed at his place.
Wonderful stay - room was tidy, clean and the location is perfect! Tom even had the air conditioning unit running by the time I arrived during a heat wave so the room was nice and cool for me!
Thanks Tom!

data.name: The Drop-in
data.address_address: 220 Cranbrook Street, V1A 2P1, Kimberley, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
Sparkling updated basement apartment style space!

The kitchenette for cooking simple meals before heading out to the wonderful natural areas Kimberley is known for. You will fall in love with the renovated bathroom, heated bathroom floor and rain shower.

This listing is located in a quiet area super close to bike trails, ski hills, golf, fishing, hiking, bird watching and more.

There is a separate entrance very near to your parking spot, with bike or ski storage.

You have room to sprawl here.

After a long day or golfing, fishing, or whatever you can relax on the couch and watch the 55" SmartTV and retire to the separate bedroom for a solid sleep.

You have access to the yard and deck of you feel the need to lounge.

Laundry is in the bathroom but is not included in the standard fees. If you need to use the laundry machines there is a separate cash fee to cover the hydro and water.

You're expected to communicate through Airbnb messaging. Check in instructions will be provided before you arrive. Do not knock on the front door please.

Once I show you into the space, I won't bug you at all. I will always be available in person or on my cell, but you will have the privacy you deserve.

You determine the amount of interaction me.

Occasionally I will deliver some fresh baking, or other treats but will knock or send you a text beforehand.

*Located in Townsite, up the hill from downtown*

It is a 20 minute walk or 4 min drive to the Platzl.

Nice quiet family neighbourhood looking out upon the ski hills of Kimberley one way, and the Rockies the other way.

4 min drive or 20 min walk to downtown.

It is a sliding barn door in the basement that separates you from the stairs leading to the rest of the house. Close the door and you have your own private space to enjoy.

It is a basement apartment and I have 2 dogs so if you are sensitive to a little daytime noise please let me know. I keep them quiet at night.

It is a 20 minute walk to the Platzl. Appreciate the quiet of my Townsite location :)

I love talking travel and I am an avid Airbnber myself, so I am always up to socialize if you see me around.

You're expected to communicate through Airbnb messaging. Check in instructions will be provided before you arrive. Do not knock on the front door please.

reviews.comment: Great host!!  Fed us breakfast which was great to have on our cycling tour across Canada!  We would totally stay here again!
Nice little place, quiet and cute. If we end up down this way again would definitely stay again.

A great location for me and overall itâ€™s super easy to find and access. It was nice to have a back parking spot.
Tom was easy to communicate and very prompt to reply. He ensured we had everything we needed and because Kimberley was ona boil water he made sure we had clean water.The space was as posted, clean, quiet and private. We would book again.
If you want a little slice of heaven,  stay at Tom's. Quiet, very clean, spacious, friendly- you can't ask for more !
will stay again :))
Thanks Tom for your hospitality and good spirit...nice dogs as well.
Clean, spacious, private suite with a close-ish walk to downtown. Host very responsive and helpful.

Toms basement was stylish and clean! His dogs are very cute and friendly if youâ€™re in for a visit! Tom was very accommodating with me which I greatly appreciated. Thereâ€™s an awesome big screen TV for movies.  The heated floors in the bathroom and the rain shower were really nice touches. It was a little bit louder than expected but worked out either way!
great spot to get away to for the weekend!
the rooms were very clean, it was a positive space for our staycation! Tom was super awesome and very kind! Defs stay here!
Cozy, clean space, accommodating host, Toms dogs are very friendly and cute. I needed a work space for my stay and the living room area was perfect.

Very nice studio, recently renovated located in a quiet neighborhood, close to downtown. We appreciated to meet Tom in person and he was there to personally welcomed us. Very quick to answer and super helpful!
Place was beautiful but our experience with the host was a very negative one unfortunately.
Can expect warm hospitality as well as privacy in his sizeable basement sweet. 10 minute drive to the ski hill and also close to many shops in town. Great place to stay with a few of your friends!
Tom's place is clean, private and spacious. He is a very thoughtful host and that showed even with covid restricting interactions.

Great location and about 20 mins walking distance to the platzel. His place was very clean and comfy. I would definitely stay there again and would recommend his place. Great host and very friendly and was there if we needed him
Great stay at Tom's, very clean tidy and special, would stay again!
We had a great time staying at Tom's! He was very quick to answer any questions we had and the space was exactly what we needed for our trip to Kimberley! Would recommend to fellow travelers.
Tom's place was really clean and comfy! He is available for your needs but also gives you space to be + he supplied great shampoo.
Great place to stay, loved the bike storage and the friendliness of Tom.  Good location and perfect for what we wanted.
Simple and clean place, would recommend
Great place to stay.
Great Place, Greater Host!

We had a great stay at Tomâ€™s place. He was super helpful  and a good host. The suite was super clean and had all the amenities we needed. The location is in a nice quite area of Kimberley, up the hill from downtown but still within walking distance. 
We will definitely recommend this place to friends and will hopefully stay again.
It's a very clean place, privacy isn't as private as some places might be.
We had a fantastic time stay with Tom. The place was very clean, communication was fast and easy, and Tom was a great host. I would come back again for sure.

Tomâ€™s BnB is the best place to stay in Kimberly. His hospitality, and the unit were impeccable. The unit was extremely clean with great modern touches throughout. Our stay was everything we were hoping for and thank you once again.
Great location within a couple minutes drive to the platzl in Kimberley. Tom was a great host and very friendly. Would definitely stay again!
I enjoyed my stay. The area stays nice and cool, making it perfect for a summer getaway!
Thank you for welcoming us, the place was really clean, cozy and you did everything to help make our stay smooth and comfortable. would definitely stay hear again

Tom is a great host who is welcoming and offering suggestions and tips when asked.  I asked if he coukd get us some milk for our cereal in the morning, and Tim obliged.  The space was homey and spacious and the big screen TV with Netflix was a great amenity to have, especially on hockey game night.  Tom's place is a great value for the money.

Clean comfortable friendly 

10-10 would definitely stay again.

This is a great place to stay at in the Kimberley area. Very clean and new. Close to so many fun activity places and restaurants. Tom is awesome and I really enjoyed chatting with him! Super accommodating too.
Tom is great and so is his place! Highly, highly recommend!
Tom's place was perfect for me and my husband.  It was a very nice space - comfortable and clean, and Tom was a pleasant, accommodating guy.  We recommend this place and would stay here again.
We were there for a quick weekend trip and found it to be a great value for the price.  The place was clean and Tom was responsive to our requests.
Quiet location close to downtown and nature.  Comfortable, convenient, had storage access for my bike and use of washer/dryer if required.  Excellent value overall.
Tomâ€™s place is a modern, clean basement. It is nice and cool for summer but you may want to bring your slippers for colder weather as floors can be quite cool.
Excellent host,  highly recommend
From the cookies to the cinnamon buns he made for us. The space is very clean and as always Tom is a very thoughtful and amazing host
Toms place was great and he was very pleasant! Would absolutely recommend!

Tom is a very thoughtful and great host. 
The place was very clean and everything you need is there for a great stay.
Cozy and comfortable

This was a perfect, quiet basement suite in which to hide out for the night.  The bed was great, showe had on demand hot water and thereâ€™s a modem washer-dryer.  Thereâ€™s also a place to stick a mountain bike!  Itâ€™s small, so maybe not a family spot.  Oh,  and there was ground coffee ready to go :)
Wonderful stay. Clean and cozy with nice shower, spacious bedroom and blow up mattress for my adult sons in the living room. Tom is a terrific host and great communicator.
Kimberley was HOT during our visit. The bsmt suite was a welcome refuge from the heat. Also the shower was awesome.

data.name: Cool slope side suite | Pool Access | Ski In / Out
data.address_address: 121 Summit Drive, V0A 1T0, Panorama, BC, CA
data.descriptions_description:
This modern 1 bedroom townhome stays remarkably cool in the summer, with walk out back patio that you can ski and bike right up to! Our guests have access to the Panorama Springs pool, waterslide and hot tub complex just across the street!

This cozy renovated suite has a well equipped kitchen with dining island opening up to a comfortable fireside living room and opens up to the ground level patio with BBQ!

The bedroom features a queen bed, and a single over double bunk as well as a crib. Bring the whole family!

Guests have access to the Panorama Springs pool, waterslide and hot tub complex just across the street!

The garage is not included in the rental and is not accessible to guests.

Parking for one vehicle in front of garage.

We partner with RockiesDirect to offer 24/7 local guest support during your stay.

Located in the exclusive Upper Village at Panorama. This Hearthstone townhome is located slope side adjacent the Poma lift!

One parking space in front of garage. Ski / Bike In / Out Right on the ski run!

Must walk down a set of stairs outside to access the suite.
